English: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.
Jinghpaw: But shani hta Stanford dakkasu tsi dap kaw na hpungtang hpaji ninghkring ni gaw U.S grumhpraw pyek mi nga ai hte mai mari na laika tsi hte mai shaprawt ai cells ni hpe mai garan chye ai hkamja lam jep ai jak hpe lu galaw shapraw la ma ai.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Bat langai ya shani hta, Standford dakkasu tsi dap kaw na, hpungtang hpaji ninghkring ni gaw, U.S. gumhpraw pyek mi ram hte mai mari na, laika tsi hte mai shapraw ai, cells ni hpe garan chye ai, hkam kaja lam jep ai jak hpe lu galaw da sai lam hpe ndau shabra dat ai.

English: Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.
Jinghpaw: Ndai arai hkyep gaw sinda mawng ana hpe sut su ai mungdan ni daram n lu tsi la lu ai matsan ai mungdan hkan na machyi masha ni byin chye ai mawng ana, sinwawp ana, HIV hte hkali ana ni hpe jau jau tam mu mai wa na re ngu sawk sagawn magam galaw ai ni tsun ma ai.

English: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.
Jinghpaw: JAS 39C Gripen mying ai pyenli gaw, buga gindai ten 0230 UTC hta hpaga pyenli daru hte grai ni ai shara pyenli gat lam kaw hkrat nna kapaw ga mat ai.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: JAS 39C Gripen mying ai pyenli gaw, buga gindai aten 0230 UTC hta, hpaga pyenli daru hte grai ni ai shara pyenli gat lam kaw hkrat nna kapaw ga mat ai.

English: The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.
Jinghpaw: Dai nbungli gau ai wa hpe Squadron a ning baw Dilokrit Pattavee ngu maram chye lu ai.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Dai nbungli gau ai wa gaw Squadron a ningbaw Dilokrit Pattavee ngu chye lu ai.

English: Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.
Jinghpaw: Buga shiga dap kaw na shapoi ai lam gaw, mahtai ginhtang taw nga ai shaloi nbungli daru wan sat madaw langai myi gaw lai wa sai re.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: (Hkyak hkyak) garum sa taw ai nbungli daru wan sat mawdaw langai mi, gup mat ai lam hpe buga shiga dap kaw na, shiga htawn ai.

English: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla.
Jinghpaw: Asak 28 ning kaba ai Vidal gaw lai wa sai shata masum hta Sevilla kaw na Barca de shang lai wa sai re.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Asak 28 ning re said Vidal gaw, lai wa sai duhkra ladaw masum hta, Sevilla kaw na Barca de shang lai wa sai re.

English: Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.
Jinghpaw: Catalan mare ninghpum de htawt sit wa ai kaw na Vidal gaw ginsup hpung a matu ginsup poi 49 hpe ginsup lai wa sai re.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Catalan mare daju de htawt sit wa ai shaloi gaw na, Vidal gaw ginsup hpung a matu, ginsup poi 49 hpe ginsup lai wa sai re.

English: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence.
Jinghpaw: Ninghkap hpung gaw buga aten 11:00 (UTC+1) hta Whitehall lam maw ntsa Hkingmang Daju a tara shang nga shara, Downing Lam de shang na matu makawp pyada uhpung hpe man hkrum na rawt sa hpang ma ai.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Ninghkap hpung gaw buga aten 11:00 (UTC+1) hta, Hkringman Daju a tara shang nga shara nga ai Downing Lam hte man hkrum gaw na Whitehall lam maw ntsa kaw na rawt sa hpang ma ai. Dai Downing Lam de shang wa ai shara hpe pyada uhpung ni pat sin nga ai re.

English: Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall.
Jinghpaw: 11:00 hpang kaw na, Whitehall dingdung shara kaw na pat ai shara hpe myit nhkrum ai ninghkap masha ni gaw lam hpe pat da ma ai.
Fine-grained evaluation: Unnatural translation, Inaccurately omitted information, Wrong grammar
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: aten 11:00 hpang kaw na, ninghkap masha ni gaw, Whitehall dingdung shara maga na, hkawm sa hkawm wa lam hpe pat da mat ai.

English: At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up.
Jinghpaw: Aten 11:20 hta dai masha ni hpe lam makau de sit na matu tsun wa ai, dai lam pat ai nta ni hpe atsawm lajang na matu ngu shana wa ai.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: aten 11:20 hta, pyada ni hku na, dai ninghkap masha ni hpe lam makau de sit na matu tsun mat let, ninghkap na matu ahkaw ahkang nga ai hte maren (ninghkap let), hkawm sa hkawm wa lam pat wa ai lam hpe mung, joi jang ra na matu shana wa ai.

English: Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.
Jinghpaw: 11:29 ram hta, ninghkap ai hpung ni gaw Tralfalgar Square hpe lai kau nna Whitehall lam de hka kau mayan hku hkan nna Aldwych hte Kingsway manam jarawt ntsa hku lai mat nna, mungding htung hkan mayu ai hpung ni a shanhte a machyan htawngshi ta na bawngban pawng galaw nga ai shara Grand Connaught Rooms manam jarawp nga ai Holborn ginra de rawt lung lai wa ma ai.
Fine-grained evaluation: Inaccurately omitted information, Unnatural translation, Wrong grammar, Mistranslation, Untranslated text
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: aten 11:29 ram hta, ninghkap hpung ni gaw Trafalgar Square hpe lai kau da nna, Whitehall lam de hkawm mat ai. (Dai gaw na), Aldwych hpe lai di, the Strand lam hku hkawm mat ai. Mungding htung hkan ai hpung ni a,  shanhte a Spring Forum bawngban hpawng galaw mat wa ai shara re nga ai the Grand Connaught Rooms manam jarawp nga ai Holborn lam de, Kingsway lam hku na rawt mat ai.

English: Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2.
Jinghpaw: Nadal gaw Canadian hte man hkrum ginsup ai kaw 7-2 hte dang nna ka matsing da hkrum sai.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Nadal gaw Canada mung masha hte man hkrum ginsup ai shaloi 7-2 hte dang n-na ka matsing da ai.

English: He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open.
Jinghpaw: Shi gaw ndai laman sha Raonic hpe Brisbane hpaw poi hta sha sum da ai rai nga ai.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Shi gaw ndai laman sha Raonic hpe Brisbane hpaw poi hta sum mat ai re.

English: Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve.
Jinghpaw: Nadal gaw ginsup lamang 88% hta amat 76 hte shawng lu nna dang ai.
Fine-grained evaluation: Wrong grammar, Mistranslation, Inaccurately omitted information, Untranslated text
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Nadal gaw ginsup shingjawng ai shaloi tsa lam shadang 88 (net points= sumgawn hte ni ai shaloi lu la ai amat) hte shawng ningnan (bawling) htawn jaw ai shaloi lu la ai 76 amat hte dang mat ai.

English: After the match, King of Clay said, "I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."
Jinghpaw: Shingjawng lamang ngut ai hpang King of Clay tsun ai, "Ndai ahkyak dik ai lamang re ai ninggang gashun ai de bai du wa ai gaw myit loi kahpra ai. Ngai du sa wa ai ndai ninggang hpe dang na matu re."
Fine-grained evaluation: Wrong grammar, Mistranslation, Unnatural translation, Untranslated text
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Shingjawng ngut ai hpang, King of Clay tsun mat ai, "Ndai grai ahkyak ai lamang ni a, ninggang kashun ai aten (lamang) ni hta shang lawm lu ai majaw ngai grai myit rawt taw ai re. Ndai ninggang hpe dang na matu ngai ndai kaw, du sa wa ai re."

English: Panama Papers is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016.
Jinghpaw: 2016 ning machyan htawng shi ta hta "Panama Laika pa" ngu ai gaw Mossack Fonseka a Panama tara upadi kaw na wan shi hku re ai matsing ninghting laika pa ni a ga si ga ngau re.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Panama Laika pa' ngu ai gaw Mossack Fonseka ngu mying ai Panama tara rung kaw na, wan shi hku re ai matsing ninghting laika pa re. Dai gaw 2016 ning nlum ladaw hta shiga laika ka ai ni de, shiga pru mat ai laika pa re.

English: The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations.
Jinghpaw: Matsing laika ni gaw sut su ai ni US gumhpraw wan hkying hku re lu ai hpe makoi kau nna ahkun hkangse hte kaga rip kawp tara ni hpe koi yen na matu gumhpraw dum shi mali gaw shanhte hpe karum ya ai nga madun da ai.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: lu su (sut su) ai masha ni a US gumhpraw wan hkying hku law ai sutgan ni hpe, hkanse hte kaga rip kawp tara ni hpe koi yen na matu, gumhpraw dum shi mali gaw na, makoi ya ai lam hta karum ya ai ngu ai hpe, ndai matsing laika ni gaw madun da ai.

English: British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this.
Jinghpaw: British shi laika The Guardian gaw Deutsche Gumhpraw dum gaw ndai hpe awngdang da ga ai kawp sha nga ai kompani 1200 a htam masum na htam mi hpe jum tek da ai nga na shiga shapru da sai.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: British shi laika 'The Guardian' gaw, Deutsche gumhpraw dum gaw ndai hpe galaw awngdang da ga ai, kawp sha re ai (masu n-teng ai) hpaga hpung kompani 1200 ram a, htam masum kaw na htam mi ram hpe, tek jum da ai nga na shiga htawn da ai.

English: There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned.
Jinghpaw: Mungkan ting n-gun madun ninghkap ai lam, ru hka amu hte seng ai tara jun ai lam hte Iceland hte Pakistan mungdan a asuya lahkawng kaw na ningbaw ni bungli hkring mat ai lam ni nga lai wa sai re.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Mungkan ting (n-gun madun) ninghkap ai lam ni, tara shawk shawn jeyang ai lam ni law law hte, Iceland mungdan hte Pakistan mungdan kaw na, atsuya ningbaw salang ni bungli hkring mat ai lam ni nga lai wa sai re.

English: Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident "green card".
Jinghpaw: Hong Kong kaw shangai nna, MA hpe New York dakkasu hte Harvard upadi jawng kaw sharin la nna kalang ta American kaw dingyang shanu nga na ahkang jaw lak mat(mai nga ai Card) hpe lang da ai.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Hong Kong kaw shangai ai, "Ma" gaw New York dakkasu hte Harvard tara hpaji jawng ni kaw hpaji hkaja lai wa nna, America mungdan gaw dingyang shanu nga mai ai ahkang lak mat (Green Card) hpe moi hta lu da ga mat sai re.

English: Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis.
Jinghpaw: Mungdan ningbaw lata ai shaloi Hsieh ga jaw ai gaw Ma gaw mungdan ya ai aten pru mat wa na re ngu tsu wa ai.
Fine-grained evaluation: Wrong spelling, Wrong grammar, Unnatural translation, Other
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Ra lata poi shaloi, Hsieh gaw 'Ma' gaw mungdan yak ai aten nga wa yang mungdan kaw na pru mat na ra ai ngu na tsun mat wa ai.

English: Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance.
Jinghpaw: Hsieh ninghkap tsun ai gaw sumla hta tsawm ai Ma gaw arung arai hta grau kaja ai lai shingni rai nga ai.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Ma' gaw jet ai manu shadan ai atsam ningja hta,masha ni shi hpe mu mada ai lam hpe grau nna sawn ai re ai lam hpe Hsieh ninghkap tsun mat ai.

English: Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland.
Jinghpaw: Ndai hka jun ai lam ni nga tim, Ma gaw kanu mungdang Miwa mung a htep lahti madi shadaw tsun karum rum ai lam hte atsawm dang kau lu ai.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Ndai zawn hka jun ai lam ni nga tim, 'Ma' gaw 'Miwa' mung hte grau nna htep lahti re nga ai lam hpe madi shadaw tsun karum ai a majaw (ndai hpe) atsawm awng dan kau lu mat ai.

English: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals.
Jinghpaw: Dai ni na hkrak dik htum ginsup ninghkring gaw Washington mumlum na Alex Ovechkin rai nga ai.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Dai ni na hkrak dik htum ginsup ninghkring gaw Washington muklum na Alex Ovechkin rai nga ai.

English: He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers.
Jinghpaw: Shi gaw Atlanta Thrashers hpe 5-3 hte dang ai hta goal 2 lu nna shi Washington a matu 2 lang karum ya wa ai.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Shi gaw Washington a Atlanta Thrashers hpe 5-3 hte dang ai poi hta, goal 2 lu nna, (goal lu na matu) 2 lang karum ya wa ai.

English: Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom;
Jinghpaw: Nicklas Backstrom hpe Ovechkin na dai shana shawng nna madi sadaw ai gaw dai jinsup ai lama hta dang wa na matu goal re.
Fine-grained evaluation: Untranslated text, Unnatural translation, Wrong spelling, Inaccurately omitted information
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Ovechkin a dai shana na goal lu na matu shawng n-nan karum dat ya ai gaw, ginsup ninghkring ningnan re nga ai Nicklas Backstrom a ginsup poi lamang hta dang mat wa na matu goal re.

English: his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.
Jinghpaw: dai shana na shi a goal lahkawng ngu na gaw dai num daw a shi lu bang ai 60th ngu na goal re, Jaromir Jagr hte Mario Lemieux yan dai pandung lu du ai ten, dai gaw 1995-96 kaw na goal 60 (sh) jan hkra lu du ai shang nnan na ginsup ninghkring byin wa sai.
Fine-grained evaluation: Wrong spelling, Inaccurately omitted information, Mistranslation
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: dai shana na shi a lahkawng lang ngu na goal gaw, dai ladaw hta shi shawn bang lu ai kru shi lang na goal re. Jaromir Jagr hte Mario Lemieux yen, ladaw langai mi hta goal 60 (snr) 60 hte lahta lu bang da ai ngu ai dai pandung du da ai 1995-96 ning hpang gaw na, shi gaw shawng ningnan dai pandung bai lu la ai ginsup ninghkring byin wa sai re.

English: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion.
Jinghpaw: Batten gaw 2008 hta 190th tsang madang hta nga ai, American a lu su dik 4000 jahpan hta lawm nna ntsa lam maram da ai gaw billion $2.3 nga ai.
Fine-grained evaluation: Inaccurately omitted information, Mistranslation, Unnatural translation
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Batten gaw 2008 ning hta na lu su dik American mung masha marai 400 jahpan hta, ntsa lam maram da ai sutgan $2.3 billion lu su ai hte 190th tsang madang nga ai re.

English: He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.
Jinghpaw: Shi gaw Virginia Dakkasu a Shingni hte hpungtang hpaji hkawlik jawng kaw shaning 1950 hta jan mau gup la ai re nna dai hpung a alak mi re ai gam jaw ya ai wa mung rai lai wa sai re.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Shi gaw Virginia dakkasu a Shingni hte Hpungtang Hpaji hkawlik jawng kaw shaning 1950 hta jan mau gup la ai rai nna, dai hpung hpe alak mi re ai gam jaw ya ai wa mung rai lai wa sai re.

English: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot.
Jinghpaw: Iraq na Abu Ghraib bawng masha gaw kasu kabrawng byin ai laman hta rim dat ai.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Iraq mungdan na Abu Ghraib htawng gaw kasu kabrawng byin ai laman hta, wan nat hkrum mat ai.

English: The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.
Jinghpaw: US hpyen dap ni shara la ai hpang bawng masha ni zing ri hkrum ai brawng mat wa ai majaw hkyuk htawng gaw nkaja ai hku myit kaba mat ai.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: US hpyen dap ni reng hkang ai hpang, bawng masha ni zing ri roi rip hkrum ai lam brawng mat wa ai majaw, dai hkyuk htawng gaw n kaja ai hku mying kaba mat ai.

English: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car.
Jinghpaw: Piquet Jr. gaw 2008 na Singapore Grand Prix mawdaw shingjaw poi hta Fernando Alonso a matu shim ai mawdaw hpe gan sa la taw ai aten kaw sha mawdaw adawt hkrum ai.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Piquet Jr. gaw 2008 ning na Singapore Grand Prix mawdaw shing jawng poi hta, Fernando Alonso a matu shawng ningnan mawdaw sau bang ai hte leng galai na matu hkring ngut ai hpang gaw, mawdaw adawt mat ai. Dai a majaw shim lam mawdaw le wa ra ai re.

English: As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory.
Jinghpaw: Alonso de sa taw ai mawdaw gaw shimlum ai mawdaw npu kaw na tsau bang na matu sa mat ai, shi gaw awngdan na matu dai hpe tsit kau ai.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Alonso a shawng na mawdaw ni gaw, shim lam mawdaw lam ntsa kaw nga ai aten hta sau bang na matu shang wa ai shaloi, shi gaw awng padang lu la na matu mawdaw lam ntsa de bai htawt gau mat ai re.

English: Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
Jinghpaw: Shaning 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix ngut ai hpang Piquet Jr. hpe bungli shapraw kau ai.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: 2009 ning na Hungarian Grand Prix mawdaw shing jawng poi ngut ai hpang, Piquet Jr. gaw bungli shapraw hkrum mat ai.

English: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target.
Jinghpaw: 8:46 a.m tup hta shawng nnan jet nbungli gaw mare kaba hpe azim sha lai nna yaw shada da ai shara hta hkrak tup re aten kaw bawm jahkrat mat ai.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: shawng lang na jet nbungli gaw yaw shada da ai shara hta hkrak bawm jahkrat mat ai aten hpe myit dum ai matsing hku nna, jahpawt hkying 8:46 hkrak aten hta, mare kaba ting azim sha nga di hkungga madun mat ai.

English: Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight.
Jinghpaw: Lamu de madun na matu wan shadaw lahkawng hpe shana tup sharawt tawn da ai.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Wan shadaw kaba lahkawng hpe lamu de man yawng di shana tup shadun tawn da nga ai.

English: Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.
Jinghpaw: Myit dum shingran nam pan sun hte sa chyai ai ka-ang lapran hta lamu mada wahpang manga hpe gaw gap ding yang re nga ai.
Fine-grained evaluation: Unnatural translation, Inaccurately omitted information, Mistranslation
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Ka-ang gaw myit dum shingran nampan sun hte htaw wa htaw sa shara mung lawm ai lamu tsaw nta kaba manga hpe dai htingra kaw gaw gap ding yang re nga ai.

English: The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood.
Jinghpaw: PBS lamang hta Emmy kumhpa dazin lahkawng daram jaw ai ngut nna dai gaw Sesame lam hte Mister Rogers nta makau daram sha lagat ai re.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: PBS lamang gaw Emmy shagrau kumhpa dazin lahkawng jan nga ai. Ngut na, ndai lamang gaw "Sesame Street" hte "Mister Rogers' Neighborhood" ngu ai aten galu shapoi wa ai lamang lahkawng hta loi mi sha hpang hkrat di shapoi wa ai re.

English: Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories.
Jinghpaw: Dai lamang ni gaw laika buk kaw na madung ni hpe galaw da ai ngut nna dai madung law law ngai mawng moi ni hpe hkaja u.
Fine-grained evaluation: Wrong register, Unnatural translation, Inaccurately omitted information
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Dai lamang a daw shagu gaw, dai laklai ai laika buk a ga baw hpe madung tawn di dai ga baw hpe maumwi law law hku hkan tam maram yu lai wa na.

English: Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library.
Jinghpaw: Dai madun ai shagu hta ma ni shanhte laika sa ai shaloi gara zawn re laika ni hpe tam mai ai hpe mung madi shadaw da ai karum da na re.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Dai lamang shagu gaw ma ni laika dum de sa ai shaloi tam hti yu mai ai laika buk ni hpe mung hpaji jaw tsun wa sai re.

English: John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said "Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."
Jinghpaw: WNED Buffalo kaw na John Grant ( laika hti ai ngoi latung a nta shara) tsun ai gaw laika hti ai ngoi latung lam gaw ma ni hpe hpa majaw laika hti ai, hpa majaw laika hti ai hpe ra ai - (lamang) gaw ma ni hpe laika bok hte laika hti wa na matu ngun jaw ya ai lamang re.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: WNED Buffalo kaw na John Grant (Reading Rainbow na shapoi madung dap) tsun ai gaw, 'Reading Rainbow gaw ma ni hpe hpa na laika hti ra na lam, laika hti ai hpe tsawra chye na matu sharin ya lai wa sai. (dai lamang gaw) ma ni hpe laika buk hti wa na matu n-gun jaw ya lai wa sai re.'

English: It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series.
Jinghpaw: John Grant na gumhpraw ma ai hte laika hpaji myit ai lam ni a television lamang ni shai wa ai ni+F158 gaw ngut wa sai ngut kam ma ai.
Fine-grained evaluation: Untranslated text, Mistranslation, Inaccurately omitted information
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: masha nkau mi, John Grant mung lawm ai, garum gumhpraw n law wa ai majaw hte hpaji masa hte seng ai TV lamang ni a myit mang ai lam galai shai wa ai majaw, dai series ni hpe jahtum kau ai lam de du mat ai ngu di kam ma ai.

English: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say.
Jinghpaw: Cape Verde zinlawng a sinna maga na 645 deng (1040km) ram hta nga ai, mawru gaw lamu ga shara gara hpe tim shahkri shama ai lam ndu shi yang hkoi mat na zawn re ai, nga tau hkrau tak maram ai ni tsun ai.
Fine-grained evaluation: Inaccurately omitted information, Unnatural translation, Wrong spelling
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Cape Verde zinlawng ni a sinna maga deng 645 (1040 km) ram hta nga ai nbung laru gaw, lamu ga shara maga hpe jahkrit sama ai lam n du wa shi yang n-gun yawm wa na zawn re ai, nga na tau hkrau tak maram ai ni tsun ai.

English: Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest.
Jinghpaw: Fred gaw hkying hkum mi hta ya yang deng 105 (165 km/h) nbung nga ai, dai gaw sinna dingdung maga shamu taw ai.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Fred gaw hkying hkum mi hta, ya yang, deng 105 (165km/h) nbung nga ai hte sinna dingdung maga de yawng taw nga ai.

English: Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.
Jinghpaw: Jak shagan hte sumla gayet ai lam du wa ai aten kaw Fred gaw ya ten du hkra Atlantic a dingda maga hte sinpraw maga kaw masat shadawn lai wa ai bunghpoi laru kaba kaw n-gun ja dik htum rai nga nna sinpraw maga de na 35° W kaw masat shadawn ai kaw nambat masum kaba htum ai nbung laru rai nga ai.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Jak shagan sumla dem ai lam du wa ai aten kaw na, Fred gaw ya ten du hkra Atlantic a dingda maga hte sinpraw maga kaw masat shadawn lai wa ai kahtet shara maga na bung hpoi laru kaba kaw na n-gun ja dik htum rai nga nna sinpraw maga de na 35° W kaw masat shadawn ai kaw nambat masum kaba htum ai laru kaba rai nga ai.

English: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland.
Jinghpaw: Shaning 1759 ning shata man chyhku 24 ya hta, Arthur Guinness gaw Ireland, Dublin hta St James a Gate Brewery a matu shaning 9,000 ning shap sha ga sadi laika hta lakmat htu sai.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Shaning 1759 ning, shata man jahku, 24 ya shani hta, Arthur Guinness gaw Ireland mungdan Dublin muklum hta St James' Gate Brewery hpe shap na matu shaning 9000 ning shap ga sadi laika hta lata kumla htu dat ai.

English: 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.
Jinghpaw: Shaning 250 hpang, Guinness gaw mungkan ting a bungli euro 10 billion jan (US$ 14.7 bilion) daram shaning shagu shang wa ai.
Fine-grained evaluation: Inaccurately omitted information, Unnatural translation, Untranslated text
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Shaning 250 ning hpang, Guinness gaw mungkan ting chyam ai hpaga bungli langai byin wa di, shaning shagu euros 10 billion jan (US $ 14.7 billion) ram shang wa ai.

English: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally.
Jinghpaw: Jonny Reid ngu ai A1GP New Zealand uhpung a mawdaw gau garum ai wa gaw dai ni na aten hta New Zealand a tara shang asak 48 ning kaba ai Auckland Harbour mahkrai ntsa hku lawan dik ai hku gau lai nna labau ningnan galaw la lu sai re.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Jonny Reid ngu ai A1GP New Zealand uhpung a mawdaw gau garum ai masha gaw, dai ni na aten hta, New Zealand mungdan a 48 ning nga sai Auckland Harbour Bridge mahkrai ntsa hku, tara shang masat da ai lawan dik ai hku gau lai nna, labau ningnan galaw la lu sai re.

English: Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge.
Jinghpaw: Mr Reid gaw New Zealand na A1GP mawdaw achyang hpe mahkrai sanit lang lai nna 160km/h lawan n-gun hte gau na matu galaw wa ai.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: Mr. Reid gaw New Zealand na A1GP mawdaw Black Beauty hpe lawan shadang 160km/h jan hte, mahkrai ntsa hku nna, sanit lang gau lai lu wa sai re.

English: The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.
Jinghpaw: New Zealand kaw na pyada ni gaw Black Beauty ram ram nem ai majaw shanhte a lawan ai radar sinat ni hpe lang ai hta Mr Reid gade ram sa mat ai hpe mu chye na matu manghkang nga ai, Mr Reid gaw 160km/h ram shanem ai ten she pyada ni gaw nari gade na ai mai masat ai.
Corrected Jinghpaw translation: New Zealand kaw na pyada ni gaw, Black Beauty nem ai majaw, shanhte a lawan shadang radar sinat ni hpe lang di Mr. Reid kade ram lawan di gau sa mat ai hpe, mu chye na matu manghkang nga ai. Mr. Reid gaw 60km/h ram shanem dat ai shaloi she, pyada ni shi kade ram sa taw ai hpe lu shadawn la ai.

English: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged.
Jinghpaw: Lai wa sai shata 3 hta rim hkrum ai masha 80 jan ram gaw gumhpraw dam gayet ai nhkrum ai sha Central booking madi shadaw hpung kaw na shalawt ya ai lam hkrum lai wa sai re.

English: In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner.
Jinghpaw: Ndai shaning shata man mali hta, Judge Glynn kaw na tara rung kaw na shana ai hpe nna ai sha galaw ai ni hpang aten 24 hta lai nna dai hpe chyahkring galaw na matu tara hpang wa ai.

English: The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked.
Jinghpaw: Tara madung gaw gumhpraw chyhkrat ai, sadi jaw yang, ngut nna ayang gaw dai gumhpraw hpe pyada kaw na chyhkrat ai. Dai hpang dai gumhpraw gaw mangkang ni hpe jep ai state computer system de shang ai.

English: The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.
Jinghpaw: Tara rung kaw madat la ai lam gaw ntsen ai wa a lawan ladan tara rung kaw jep yu na ahkaw ahkang hte seng nna masat mahtoi hpe ma matsing tawn da wa sai.

English: Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia.
Jinghpaw: Australia mungdan a kunhting, Petru Costello hte Liberal pati ningbaw langai re ai, awng dang dik ai masha Hkringmang daju Yawhan Howard ni gaw Australia mungdan a nuclear laknak jak rung a shingdu de shi a madi shadaw lam nla ai zawn re na galaw dan wa sai.

English: Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use.
Jinghpaw: Mr Costello gaw nuclear laknak atsam shapraw ai lam hpe sut masa hte dang lu na mai byin ai nga yang gaw, Australia mungdan kaw na dai hpe lu lang na matu shakut ging ai ngu tsun ai.

English: If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy Mr Costello said.
Jinghpaw: Lama dai gaw hpaga bungli rai yang gaw, anhte galaw gin ai. Dai sha re, nuclear n-gun hta gaw hkrang tara madung ngu ai nnga ai, ngu Slg. Kostello tsun wa ai.

English: According to Ansa, "police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession.
Jinghpaw: Ansa tsun ai hku nga yang, "Pyada ni gaw arawng aya nga ai masha nkau mi kaw na majan hpe matut manoi baw sa wa mai ai lam hpe hkrit tsang ma ai.

English: Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network.
Jinghpaw: Pya da ni tsun ai gaw Lo Piccolo kaw ntsa lata nga ai hpamajaw nga yang shi kaw Palermo kaw Provenzano's right-hand man nga ai ngut nna shi a mahkrum madup kaja gaw lawban dingla ni a hkung ka hpe lu ai re shanhte gaw shanhte bungli ni hpe ngun shaja ai hta provenzano's policy hpe manu ahpa hte sha lu mari ai majaw re.

English: These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."
Jinghpaw: 1992 ning hta Mafia a nhkru ai Falkone hte Paolo Borsellino ni a asak hkrat sum shangun ai Riina majan ngut mat ai hpang ndai sut du kaba ni hpe Provenzano gaw up hkang lai wa sai."

English: Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket.
Jinghpaw: Apple CEO Steve Jobs gaw shi jeans labu sumbu kaw na iPhone hpe shaw nna masha shawng kaw lam hkawm let dai rai hpe madun dan ai.

English: During his 2 hour speech he stated that "Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today".
Jinghpaw: Shi mungga hkying hkum 2 ga shaga ai laman hta tsun ai gaw "Dai ni na ten Apple gaw phone hpe bai gin shapraw nga ai, anhte a labau hpe dai ni hpang taw sai."

English: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country.
Jinghpaw: Brazil gaw mungkan hta Roman Kahtawlik mungdan ni kaw na kaba htum mungdan re nna mungdan kata na nawku jawng ni gaw la shada da tara shang hkungran ai lam hpe myit nhkrum ma ai.

English: The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul.
Jinghpaw: Brazil a Myu sha Rapdaw gaw tara shang byin hkra 10 ning daram ga ndang hkat wa ma ai, dai hpang mungchying hkungran ai lam langai gaw ya yang Rio Grande do Sul kaw sha tara shang shi ai.

English: The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson.
Jinghpaw: Marta Suplicy a Mare uphkang du São Paulo gaw shawng na upadi nhprang hpe ka lajang da ai re. Yaw shada lam gaw masat ngut ai shaloi Roberto Jefferson a lata hta ahkang aya lu na re.

English: Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.
Jinghpaw: Masha N-gun madun ninghkap hpung ni gaw masha wan 1.2 laimak htu tawn ai shawk shawn laika ni hpe kahkyin la nna shata man shi langai kaw myu sha upadi ka rapdaw de tang shawn lu na matu myit mada nga ai.

English: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam.
Jinghpaw: Chye ngut ai hpang dinghku nta masha grai law wa gau shapraw hkrum ai hpe ninghkap na matu tara shang karum ya na tam ai hpang, dum nta masu sha hkrum ai ni a matu Sinpraw Bay Mung shawa Upadi Zupra hta zuphpawng hpe shata man matsum 20 hta hpawng lai wa sai.

English: When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town.
Jinghpaw: Nta shap ai masha ni shanhte kaw hpa mi byin mat wa ai hpe hpaw tsun dan ai shaloi, dai hta lawm ai htinggaw law malawng gaw OHA a Carolyn Wilson gaw shanhte a tau jaw da ai jaram gumphraw ni hpe lagu la nna mare kaw na hprawng mat sai hpe kalang ta dum mat ma ai.

English: Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.
Jinghpaw: Lockwood nampan sun kaw shap nga ai masha ni gaw, OHA balit ni Oakland kaw na laga shawa nta hte seng ai arung arai ni hpe jep jen ai lam galaw nna shanhte ni mung nta masu ai lam a majaw mai rim hkrum ai lam hpe sharin la ngut ai kaw nna gaw nta kaw na gau shapraw hkum na nta 40 jan nna naw nga ai ngu nna kam ma ai.

English: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans.
Jinghpaw: Dai uhpung gaw masha 9,000 lamang yu mai ai Maui a Majan Masat dingsat Ginsup pa hta shangwi shapyaw lamang hpe dawn jay na ai, dai hpang shanhte n-gun jaw shawa ni hpe bai hpyi nem wa ma ai.

English: The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.
Jinghpaw: Dum sumpyi hpung hpe lit la hparan ai hpaga hpung HK Hparan Hpareng Inc., gaw September shata 20 ya shani shaloi lamang dawm kau ai lam hpe sang lang dan ai lam nnga ai sha hpang shani hta e htaw wa htaw sa hparan ai lam hpe lawt ga madun nna mara shagun ma ai.

English: The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption.
Jinghpaw: Greek a mying gumhkawng ai tara kasa ni re ai, Sakis Kechagioglou hte George Nikolakopoulos gaw mung masa akyang laban ai mara lu nna Korydallus a Athens hkyuk htawng hta rim da hkrum nu ai.

English: As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years.
Jinghpaw: Ndai mahtai hku na gaw, Greek tara lam hte seng ai uhpung kata shatan nhkan shiga ni gaw lai wa sai shaning laman hta tara agyi ni, tara kasa ni, tara rung tara kasa ni a tara nshang ai sat lawat ni dawng pru wa ai lam grai law wa ai.

English: A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show "Zoungla" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption.
Jinghpaw: Lai wa sai bat ni hta, Alpha TV kaw na mying kaba ai Zoungla lamang hta shiga laika sara Makis Triantafylopoulos gaw dai lam hpe shapraw dat ai hpang, Rapdaw salang hte tara kasa, Petros Mantouvalos hpe tara nshang bungli galaw ai hte kyang laban ai kaw lam ai ngu tsun ai hpe bai dawm la kau ma ai.

English: Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour.
Jinghpaw: Grau nna gaw, tara agyi daju Evangelos Kalousis gaw shi a nteng nman galaw ai lam hte mayun kumhpa sha ai lam hpe mara mu ai majaw htawng jahkrat kau ma ai.

English: Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases.
Jinghpaw: Roberts Flatley gaw ma shabrai ai lam hte seng ai arawn alai hpaji hte nsoi nsa gara kaw na hpang ai ngu ai lam ni hpe myit ningmu jaw na matu nhtap htuk ai nga nna, htai na matu ningdang kau ai.

English: He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the "settled law of the land", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings.
Jinghpaw: Shi hpa mi rai tim ndai laika hpe bai kahtap tsun ai hta Roe v. Wade gaw "Lamu ga a upadi jahkrat da ai" re, galai shai lam nnga ai Mungdan Tara rung ginjaw jahkrat masat da ai ahkyak ai lam hpe ahkyak galaw da ai.

English: He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon.
Jinghpaw: Shi mung shagrin da ai dai gaw gawai lang ai kaw na Roe a daw dan da ai hta mahta da ai laksan hku nga ai lam hpe shi kam da ai.

English: Maroochydore had finished on top of the ladder, six points clear of Noosa in second.
Jinghpaw: Marochydore gaw dai lakang a lahta maga hpe shagut sai, Noosa a lahkawng lang hta hkru shara ngut sai.

English: The two sides would meet in the major semi final where Noosa ran out winners by 11 points.
Jinghpaw: Noosa 11 amat hte awng dan wa ai shara semi final kaw shan lahkawng hkrum na ra ai.

English: Maroochydore then defeated Caboolture in the Preliminary Final.
Jinghpaw: Maroochydore ngut ai hpang shaman ai lam hpang chyhtum hta Caboolture hte htawng na re.

English: Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor .
Jinghpaw: Chyaloi nhkoi prat na dusat amyu langai rai nga ai Hesperonychus elizabethae gaw Dromaeosauridae amyu ni hte jinghku nta masha ni rai nna, Velociraptor amyu ni hte gaw hpu nau ni rai ma ai.

English: This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor.
Jinghpaw: Velociraptor zawn lamyin tu ai lagaw lahkawng hte lam chye hkawm ai dut sat gaw mun hpring hkra re matse labye u amyu hpan ngu kam ma ai.

English: Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means "western claw."
Jinghpaw: Shi a laga lamin gaw grai kaba ai, sinna lamin ngu lachyum rawng ai Hesperonychus hte galu gaba wa ai.

English: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts.
Jinghpaw: Hka ge ni ayai wa ai hta n ga lamu marang masa nhkrak ai a majaw sa hkye la ai ni a matu mung yak hkak nga ai.

English: Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week.
Jinghpaw: Pittman gaw dai mabyin masa gaw hpang na bat aten ladaw du hkra rawt jat ai lam n-nga na re ngu hpaji jaw lai wa sai re.

English: The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.
Jinghpaw: Pittman hku na nga yang hka ge htuk a shadang, htat ai lam gaw sawng dik ai, ndai gaw lai wa sai shaning 15 ram dazik shakap sha ai sha re.

English: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21.
Jinghpaw: Dai ni gaw Jeff Weise hte tsin yam hkrum masha jahku kaw na masum a makoi mayang hpawng hte shata man matsum 21 ya shi jawng kata sinat gap ai lam hte seng nna kaga jawng ma ni rim hkrum ai lam a shiga ni gaw nawng hkyen makau grup yin kaw chyam bra nga ai re.

English: Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest.
Jinghpaw: Daru magam lu ai hpung ni gaw dai ni rim ai lam hta jan ai lam ni hpe tara shang tsun lai wa sai re.

English: However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain.
Jinghpaw: Hpa wa rai tim, jep sagawn ai a machye machyang npawt gaw Minneapolis Star-Tribune hpe ning tsun ai, dai wa gaw Red Lake Tribal Tingnyang up, Floyd Jourdain a 16 ning nga ai kasha Louis Jourdain re.

English: It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.
Jinghpaw: Ndai kalang gaw hpa tara hka wa mi jun na lam daru magam lu ai hpung ni hpe shabrang wa hpang de hpa baw wa mi e shadut dat re nchye lu nga ai rai timung asak kaji tara jun ai lam hpe ginjaw asuya hte seng ai tara rung kaw gaw galaw hpang nga sai re.

English: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election.
Jinghpaw: Lodin tsun ai gaw pya da ni gaw dai ningbaw lata ai hta gumhpraw ma na hte simlum ai lam hta nhkra hkra Afghans kaw galaw ai ni hpe matut ngalaw sai da.

English: Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary.
Jinghpaw: Sumtsan kasa ni gaw Afghan a gawda tara hpe ra mung nra ai hte maren, matut shagrin daw dan sa wa ai lam hta dan leng lam law law mung nnga ai hpe mu mada ma ai nga tsun ma ai.

English: This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.
Jinghpaw: Kahtap shingjawng na jahkring sai nga tsun da ai ndai htai lai ai lam ni hpe tau na tsun shapraw ai gaw mungdan gawda tara hte nhtan shai mai nga ai.

English: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops.
Jinghpaw: Dai nbungli hpe Irkutsk de yawng dat nna kata kaw na uhpung ni gaw hkau taw ai.

English: An inquiry was established to investigate.
Jinghpaw: San jep ai lam langai hpe jep san sagawn na matu shagrin da sai.

English: The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month.
Jinghpaw: II-76 gaw shaning 1970 hkan na Russian hte Soviet hpyen dap lahkawng yan a madung dawshan langai re nna lai wa sai shata mi hta Russia kaw manu mana hkala nba kalang mi byin hkrum ga sai re.

English: On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.
Jinghpaw: October shata 7 ya shani hta pyenli pyen lung ai shaloi jak kaga ga byin mat ai raitim, ningma kap ai lam gaw n nga ai. Russia masha ni hku nna ndai shoihpa byin ngut ai hte II-76s nbungli lang ai lam hpe jahkring mi hkring da ma ai.

English: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
Jinghpaw: Trans-Alaska hka lawng ladat a deng 800 ram hpe gaw Alaska a dingdung Fairbanks kaw na sau wahtawng hkying hku hkaw mat ai majaw pat hkum da hkrum ai re.

English: A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9.
Jinghpaw: Lam manga system jep ai hta wan ngun hkrak nna matsut ai hpaw mat ai ngut nna makaw na Fort Greely seng 9 hta tsau ni yawng pru wa ai.

English: The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons).
Jinghpaw: Dai matsut gaw system hpe dip da hpe galaw ya ai re, ngut nna dik 55,000 (2.3 million gallon) daram mai hpring ai tsau ni hpru wa ai.

English: As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank.
Jinghpaw: Dam shani ka'ang kaw, tank vent kaw na matut lwi taw ai gaw tank kata kaw na kahtet dat law mat ai majaw re sam ai.

English: Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.
Jinghpaw: Kaga lahkawng ngu na sharawng bang ai lam gaw lawu na wahtawng 104,500 shang ai tank ni gaw naw nhpring shi ma ai.

English: The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect.
Jinghpaw: TV ntsa live madun ai hta myit ningmu (sh) dinglun ai lam ni kaw na ding tawng shapoi ai ni gaw Iran amyu hte seng ai dai pawt dai hpang ni hku nna galaw ahkang pat shingdang da ai lam ni gaw akyu lama ma nga taw ai ngu nna shawng nnan tsun pru wa ai re.

English: They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income.
Jinghpaw: Iranian ni a maigan gumhpraw 80% shang ai kaw na maigan sa sau hpaga ga ai lam hpe Uropa Uhpung gaw ahkang njaw ai hte ja gumhpraw pat shingdang ai lam ni shalawm ma ai.

English: In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day.
Jinghpaw: Ndai laman a shata shagu na shiga hta, nhprang shapraw gunrai magam ni gaw, lani mi hta 2.8 wan wahtawng daram hkrat mat sai lam hpe OPEC ni tsun ai.

English: The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as "a trap" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself.
Jinghpaw: Mungdan a tsaw htum ai ningbaw kaba, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei gaw wan sau a ntsa shamyet shanat ai lam gaw "mahkam" re nga ai lam hpe, 1979 Iran mungdan Islam makam masham hte seng ai rawt malan ai lam a shawng aten kaw na htawng madun lai wa sai re nna mungdan ting nan mung dai mahkam kaw na lawt lu ra ai lam hpe mung htawng madun dan lai wa sai re.

English: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah.
Jinghpaw: Tum makawp gaw mungkan ntsa du wa nna nbung kata de shang ai shaloi, jawhpawt hkying 5 (sinpraw ahkying) ram hta, Dingdung California, Oregon, Nevada, hte Utah ni a masha uhpung ni a matu gaw nhtoi kaji mi htoi taw na hpe myit mada ai.

English: The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky.
Jinghpaw: Tsi tawng gaw lamu kaw shagan gat lai mat ai zawn re.

English: The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute.
Jinghpaw: Dai tsi tawng gaw second mi hta 12.8 km deng 8 daram mai du na ra ai, minit mi hta San Francisco kaw na Los Angeles de atsawm lawan mai du ai.

English: Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module.
Jinghpaw: Stardust gaw lamu lung pyenli langai hku na mungkan ga de bai wa ai hta labau shang lawan dik ai jak ngu labau hta ka matisng lu sai, shawng kalang gaw 1969 May shata hta Apollo X bai nhtang wa ai ten dai hpe lai di nna labau shang da ai re.

English: “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.
Jinghpaw: Dai gaw dingda Kalifornia a sinna panglai de htawt mat na re ngut nna lamu kaw na jan gaw Kalifornia kaw na ka-ang Oregon du hkra ngut na Nevada hte Idaho, dai hpang Utah du hkra htoi tu na re, ngu masing reng hkang salang, Tom Duxbury tsun ai.

English: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement.
Jinghpaw: Kyoto lamu marang shiga myit hkrum lam hta Mr. Rudd na lata masat htu na matu daw dan ai lam gaw United States hpe garan tawn da nga ai rai nna, ndai gaw dai ni na myit hkrum lam hpe shagrin na matu myit nhkrum ai rawt jat taw sai mungdan langai sha re sana re.

English: Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.
Jinghpaw: Moi na Australia mungdan aup ni gaw Koyto hpe ahkang jaw na matu ndang ma ai, shanhte gaw nlung chyang sa ai bungli hpe chyhten na ni re ngu tsun ai, dai shaloi India ngut nna China zawn mungdan ni ngalaw shi yang re.

English: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history.
Jinghpaw: Ndai gaw eBay a ahtik labau hta kaba htum ai tam mahkyu la lu ai sutgan re nga ai.

English: The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.
Jinghpaw: Dai company gaw shanhte amyet ni garan nmatu myit ai ngut nna China, sinpraw Europe, hte Brazil zawn Skype ni grai galu kaba wa ai shara kaw masha grai law wa ai re.

English: Scientists have suspected Enceladus as geologically active and a possible source of Saturn's icy E ring.
Jinghpaw: Hpungtang hpaji ninghkring ni gaw Saturn a hkyen E tingwang a mai byin ai npawt langai hte Enceladus hpe ginding aga langai hku na jep maram da ma ai.

English: Enceladus is the most reflective object in the solar system, reflecting about 90 percent of the sunlight that hits it.
Jinghpaw: Enceladus gaw solar system hta grai ahkyak ai lam re, jan hkra ai sha hta 90 percent daram bai nhtang ai re.

English: The game publisher Konami stated today in a Japanese newspaper that they will not be releasing the game Six Days in Fallujah.
Jinghpaw: Daini na Japan shi laika kaw Konami ngu ai ginsup hpan shabra ai wa tsun shapraw lai wa ai gaw, shanhte ni Fallujah kaw kru ya ginsup hpan nshapraw wa na re.

English: The game is based on the Second Battle of Fallujah, a vicious battle between American and Iraqi forces.
Jinghpaw: Ndai ginsup hpa gaw "Fallujah a Nambat Lahkang Majan" ngu ai Amerikan amyu hte Iraqi amyu ni a laja lana re ai majan poi hpe yu na npawt la da ai re.

English: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website.
Jinghpaw: Matut na ACMA gaw ndai video sumla kumpyuta tsip (internet) ntsa kaw mara katut ai hta lai na "Big Brother" a internet laika man ginsu ntsa hta shawa matut mahkai rai nnga shi ai majaw, "Big Brother" gaw kaga jep jen ai tara hpe nhkan nang ai lam ni nnga ai hpe mu ma ai.

English: The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.
Jinghpaw: Broadcasting Service Tara upadi gaw Internet lawnglam ni a matu rip kawp tara shapraw da ai, rai timung internet lawnglam ni hpe hkan yu yang dai hpe server kaw nan shakap tawn ra ai.

English: The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that "extremists from Somalia" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia.
Jinghpaw: United States sumtsan salang rung gaw Kenya, Nairobi hta shara shahkrat da ai re nna, Kenya hte Ethiopia kaw sat si bawm kabaw na mahkyen hkyen nga ma ai nga "Somalia na sa dik ai ni" ngu ai sadi jaw ai lam hpe tsun shapraw da sai.

English: The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up "prominent landmarks" in Ethiopia and Kenya.
Jinghpaw: Madu hkum sat si bawm jahkrat ai ni hpe jai lang nna Ethiopia hte Kenya kaw nga ai "gumhkawng hkik hkam ai lamu ga shara ni" hpe kapaw na lam hpe mying nchye lu ai shiga npawt langai kaw na shiga na la lu ai lam US hku nna ndau shana ai.

English: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988.
Jinghpaw: Shani shagu madun dan ai lam hte Colbert ai sumtang laika ni a shawng e gaw, Heck hte Johnson gaw shan lahkawng 1988 hta UW kaw jawng ma naw re ai nga aten kaw na shiga ni hte shiga sumtang laika ni hpe shatu shakra ai laika dip shapraw na lam ni hpe shingran mu lai wa sai re.

English: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
Jinghpaw: Nnan hpang wa ai kaw na, Onion ni gaw chyhpyak shiga dap zawn byin wa ai, shanhte gaw shapraw ai laika, shata man shi kaw masha 5,000,000 daram dai website sa yu ma ai, personal ads, hking 24 shiga shapraw ai, podcast, ngut nna Our Dumb World ngu mying nga ai hpe lu shapraw wa lu ai.

English: Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat).
Jinghpaw: Al Gore hte General Tommy Frank gaw shanhte ra ai ni hpe yen kau ai (Gore gaw The Onion tsun ai shi hte Tipper shaning 2000 Electoral College ndang ai hpang grai ganawm tsum wa ai ngut tsun ai).

English: Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.
Jinghpaw: Laga laika ka sharin ai ni grai law wa gaw, Jon Stewart hte Stephen Colbert yan a shiga madun lamang hta shingkang ka-up ai lam galaw mat ma ai.

English: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis.
Jinghpaw: Yungwi lamang hpe Bucharest Muklum Gawknu hta campaign langai hku jai lang nna nsam hkum ai hte grai kaja ai mare kaba langai hku na Romanian muklum a shingna hpe bai shapraw ya na lam tam ai.

English: The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.
Jinghpaw: Ndai ning shata man kru kaw na matsat lapran galaw na mungkan na kaba dik CowParade lamang hpe galaw ai singpraw dingdung Europe kaw na shawng nnan myu re.

English: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages.
Jinghpaw: Dai ni na asuya a ndai shaning march shata hta jahpan grau jahkrat na matu lagaw sa wa na ngu tsun ai lam hpe mung ndau shana lai wa sai re.

English: An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.
Jinghpaw: Dai hta nna masha htaw ai 1,300 kaw na 300 hpe bai lu la wa sai re.

English: Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism.
Jinghpaw: Los Angeles pya da dap a ningbaw, Christopher Garcia, tsun ai gaw mara galaw ai ngu shadu ai la hpe dingsa ai hta mara kaba galaw ai a matu jep taw ai re.

English: The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the "O" to read lowercase "e".
Jinghpaw: Masat kumla gaw mala la gaw nhten shi ai; marang magap sumpan achyang ni hte simla lam hte salum masat kumla ni hpe mawn shatsawm nna "O" na malai gasi kaji "e" ngu sharai hti na matu gram jahtuk da sai.

English: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism.
Jinghpaw: Ahkyeng nsam hte hka hpung la ni gaw Karenia brevis ni hta lai jan nna myit mang dai ai majaw byin wa ai re. kaja wa panglai hte seng ai oganism cell langai kaw sha byin ai re.

English: Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically.
Jinghpaw: Shingra maka hte seng ai bying ningpawt ni gaw ra nrawng hkra kup tsup ai masa ni hpe shapraw lu hkra shada da langai hte langai dingchyai ai lam galaw lu ai. Ndai hka kara ni hpe ma dan dan leng leng law htam wa shangun ai.

English: The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish.
Jinghpaw: Hka kara ni gaw shinggyim masha hte nga ni a maju lasa nkung hkra lu galaw ai maju lasa hpe jahten chye ai gung ni shapraw lu ai.

English: Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters.
Jinghpaw: Nga ni gaw hka kaw na toxin ni hpe grai sha hkrup ai majaw chyhkring hkring tsi mat ai.

English: Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.
Jinghpaw: Hkaleng ngut nna nbung a majaw nbung kada de la ai hka gaw ntsa ai hte seng ai majaw masha hpe chye hkra ai re.

English: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) .
Jinghpaw: Dai lahta kaw, Cyclone nbung laru, Maldives ga kaw maun lap hte galaw da ai nhpye ngu ai, aten langai kaw 240 kilometers (149 miles per hour) daram nbung bung ai re.

English: By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.
Jinghpaw: Dai hpawt maga hta, nbung ni gaw 83km/h daram rai nga nna dai nbung ni bai ngya wa na ngu myit mada lai wa sai.

English: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19.
Jinghpaw: Dam shani hta, United States a Myu sha Ta din uhpung (NBA) gaw COVID-19 tsang ra ai majaw ta din ginsup num daw hpe jahkring kau ai.

English: The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.
Jinghpaw: Utah Jazz yung ngoi ning hkring na COVID-19 virus nga ai hpe NBA dawdan ai gaw hkan sa ai.

English: Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence.
Jinghpaw: Ndai namhkan lung hta mahta nna, dai ga garan mat ai gaw molecular ni a sakse ni nlawm ai tim jau tak da ai hta grau loi ai hpe ngu mayu ai re.

English: That means everything has to be put back, said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw.
Jinghpaw: Dai lachyum gaw yawng hkra hte hpe bai tawn da ra na, ngu Ethiopia na Rift Valley Sawk lak Karum hpung kaw na sawk sagawn ai wa hte Berhane Asfaw, hka ja dap na rau-laika ka sara langai tsun ai.

English: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States.
Jinghpaw: Ya du hkra, AOL gaw United States kata grai chyam bra hkra jai lang nga ai majaw de shara hta nan gaw IM gat lawk bungli naw galaw taw ai.

English: With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end.
Jinghpaw: Ginra gaw ndai zawn hkyen lajang ai a marang e ndai madu ra galaw lu ai ahkang gaw htum mat na re.

English: The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.
Jinghpaw: Yahoo! hte Microsoft hpe jai lang ai masha shadang pawng dat yang gaw AOL jai lang ai masha shadang hpe shing jawng mai wa na re.

English: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government.
Jinghpaw: The Northern Rock gumhpraw dum hpe 2008 hta UK asuya a ra ahkyak madi shadaw ya ai majaw mungdan gumhpraw dum tai wa sai lam hpaw tsun wa ai.

English: Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007.
Jinghpaw: 2007 ning na hka hte hkoi shap sha ra ai ginchyum chyat ladaw hta dai hku byin pru ai majaw Dingda Rock gaw karum kahtau ra mat ai.

English: Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation.
Jinghpaw: Slg. Richard Branson na Virgin Hpung gaw mungdan masat gumhpraw dum hpe madung galaw ai hta ninghkap hkrum ai lam loi mi nga ai.

English: In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management).
Jinghpaw: 2010 ning hta, mung ting mung shawa rai shatai la ai ten hta, "Northern Rock" laksan gumhpraw dum hpe "Nkaja ai gumhpraw dum" jahpan kaw na garan kau ai. Northern Rock (Manu dan Hparan lam).

English: Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.
Jinghpaw: Virgin gaw Dingdung Lung rawk a "kaja ai gumhpraw dum" hpe sha mari da ai, company a reng hkang lam gaw n madu ai.

English: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth.
Jinghpaw: Masha ni lamu kaw na martian arung arai mungkan de hkrat wa yang chemical hku hpa byin wa na hpe sagawn ai dai lam gaw labau hta manga lang rai na re ngu shadu lai wa sai.

English: Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin.
Jinghpaw: Sawn tak ai ram nga yang wanhkut lung ngu chye da ai 24,000 a ngam ai hte gaw mungkan ga de hkrat wa na re, dai kaw na 34 hpe gaw martian hku na madung shateng da ai.

English: Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July.
Jinghpaw: Ndai lung rawk shi manga hpe July hpang jahtum hta shagan wanhkut lung madun ai ngu sawn la ma ai.

English: Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.
Jinghpaw: Mungkan ga ntsa grai taw ai nkau nlung ni hpe gaw ja a hkrat ang ai manu hta htam shi re nga ai, aung za mi hta US gumhpraw $ 11,000 kaw na $22,500 du hkra hte dut mari taw ai re.

English: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points.
Jinghpaw: Matut nna mawdaw gau shingjawng poi hta, Keselowski gaw 2,250 masat hte mawdaw gawt masha ni a ninghkrin shingjawng poi ningbaw hku na matut nga nga ai re.

English: Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243.
Jinghpaw: Amat sanit hpang hkrat nna, Johnson gaw 2,243 hte nambat lahkawng lu mat ai.

English: In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points.
Jinghpaw: Nambat masum hta gaw, Hamlin gaw a mat hkun hpang hkrat taw ai, raitim Bowyer hta a mat manga jan ai. Kahne and Truex, Jr. ni gaw manga hte kru shara kaw 2,220 hte 2,207 amat ni lu da ma ai.

English: Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.
Jinghpaw: Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth hte Harvick ni gaw ndai numdaw hta mali lang shingjawng na naw ngam ai hte rau Mawdaw la ni a Ninghkring shingjawng lamang matu nambat shi lapran shara la da masai.

English: The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident.
Jinghpaw: US hka hpyen dap kaw na tsun ai gaw shanhte mung dai mabyin hpe san jep sagawn nga ai re.

English: They also said in a statement, "The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship".
Jinghpaw: Ndau shabra ai kaw shanhte tsun ai gaw, "bungli galaw masha ni gaw sanghpaw hpe kaja htum ai ladat hte lu gang shapraw la ai lam lu galaw na matu ya hkyak hkyak galaw taw nga ma ai."

English: An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan.
Jinghpaw: Avenger class mine countermeasures ngu ai sanghpaw shi mali gaw Palawan na Puerto Princesa de yawng wa sai re.

English: It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan.
Jinghpaw: Dai hpe U.S.Hka hpyen Dap a sanit lang na Fleet hpe Japan mungdan kaw na Nagasaki a Sasebo hta dap jung na masat sai.

English: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel.
Jinghpaw: Mumbai kasat ai ni gaw hkali hte 2008 November 26 ya hta du wa ai, shanhte gaw bawm, laknak ni law wa nna mying kaba ai Taj Mahal manam jarawp hte masha kabrawng ai Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus wanleng daru hta yaw shada lam nga nna kasat wa ma ai.

English: David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba.
Jinghpaw: David Headley a shiga lahkawn da ai lam gaw Pakistani hpyen hpung re ai Laskhar-e-Taiba kaw na sinat hpai masha 10 hpe majan awngdang na matu lu karum da ai.

English: The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.
Jinghpaw: Gasat hkat ai lam gaw India hte Pakistan a matut mahkai lapran kaw ja dingkang ai lam ni bang ya nga ai.

English: Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety.
Jinghpaw: Shi gaw ndai arawng aya lu ai du ni hte rau , Texas mungdaw masha ni a machyi shim lam a matu atsawm lajang nga ai ngu ga sadi jaw sai.

English: Perry specifically said, "There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."
Jinghpaw: Perry tsun ai gaw, "Ndai mabyin kaw na pru wa ai mayak ni hpe tawt lai na matu grau kaja ai shara ni mungkan ntsa hta nga ai".

English: The governor also stated, "Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."
Jinghpaw: Matut nna, ginwang du wa gaw "dai ni gaw jawng lung nga ai ma ni hku nna ndai machyi masha hte hkrum hkra ai lam nga ma ai hpe chye lu ai" ngu tsun ai.

English: He went on to say, "This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."
Jinghpaw: Shi gaw, "Ndai mabyin gaw kaja re. Ngam ai hte gaw byin ging ai hte maren anhte lai ladat gaw bungli byin taw ai re," ngu sa tsun ai.

English: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi.
Jinghpaw: Lama na shagrin ya ai rai yang, Allen a Mushashi hpe matsat ning tam ai lam gaw ngut kye lu na re.

English: Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV.
Jinghpaw: ROV hpe lang nna panglai htumpa lamu ga hpe hkan nna lup mat ai sanghpaw hpe mu tam la ai re.

English: One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.
Jinghpaw: Mungkan a sutsu dik htum ai masha ni kaw na langai rai nga ai Allen gaw shi a sutgan ni hpe panglai hte seng ai tam sagawn amu hta arang bang da nna, Musashi sanghpaw a majan pa na prat hpe tam sawk yu ai lam hpe hpang wa nu ai.

English: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education.
Jinghpaw: Shi gaw Atlanta aten hta grau shagrau ga ni lu wa sai ngut nna nam laika hpaji hpe galaw wa ai ngu chye ma ai.

English: In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year.
Jinghpaw: Shaning 2009 kaw shi gaw Laning myi na Amyu sha hte seng hpareng ai wa ngu ai arawng ningsang hpe hkam la lu lai wa sai re.

English: At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores.
Jinghpaw: Shagrau kumhpa lu la ai ten hta, Atlanta kaw nga ai jawng ni gaw sanpoi lu amat ni grau kaja wa ai hpe mu lu ai.

English: Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results.
Jinghpaw: Jahkring mi na ai hpang, Atlanta shiga laika npawt nhpang upadi gaw jep tawn ai mahtai hte seng ai manghkang ni hpe madun ai sumtang laika hpe ndau shabra lai wa sai.

English: The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings.
Jinghpaw: Dai sumtang laika hpe yu yang sanpoi lu amat ni gaw n byin mai na daram alawan tsaw mat ai hpe mu lu ai. Dai majaw jawng ndai gaw manghkang ni nga ai hpe chye tim mahtai atsawm n tam ai ngu shadu ma ai.

English: Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.
Jinghpaw: Mahtai madun ai laika hpe madu ngut ai hpang mu ai ni yawng gaw pawt ma ai, ngut nna 34 hpaji rawng ni hpe shaning 2013 hta madun wa ai.

English: The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation.
Jinghpaw: Irish asuya ni gaw dai mabyin masa ni hpe gram lajang na matu mungbawng rapdaw tara shang galaw ai lam ra ahkyak nga ai hpe myit li nga ma ai.

English: It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible, said a government spokesperson.
Jinghpaw: Ya gaw shawa hkamja lam hte tara tawt lai rap ra lam mu jut lahkawng maga na matu lawan byin mai ai made upadi ka jahkrat masat na gaw ahkyak ai, ngu asuya a tsun shaga ahkang nga ai wa tsun wa sai.

English: The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect.
Jinghpaw: Ya na gaw da tara galai shai ai lam nnga ai kaw na Hkamja dap a Hkringmang gaw nanghpam hte seng na hkam la da ai lam hpe hkan shadu na matu hte, nanghpam lusha ai ni hpe aten kadun tara shang ai hku shanhte dinghkrai a lu lawm lam karum kahtau lamang ngu ai lahkawn a matu myit tsang taw ai lam tsun shapraw da ai.

English: Jarque was practicing during pre-season training at Coverciano in Italy earlier in the day. He was staying in the team hotel ahead of a match planned for Sunday against Bolonia.
Jinghpaw: Jarque gaw shawng numdaw shaman na wunkat hpe Italy na Coverciano kaw shaman shakyang wa ai. Majoi shani hta Bolonia hte shingjawng na matu shanhte masha ni nga ai manam jarawp kaw nga nga ai.

English: He was staying in the team hotel ahead of a match planned for Sunday against Bolonia.
Jinghpaw: Shi gaw laban shana Bolonia hte shingjawng na lamang galaw na shara a shawng kaw na manam jarik kaw nga taw ai re.

English: The bus was headed to Six Flags St. Louis in Missouri for the band to play to a sold-out crowd.
Jinghpaw: Masha htaw mawdaw gaw yu ngwi ninghking ni lakmat mari da ai masha uhpung hpe shangwi shapyaw na matu Missouri kaw na dawng hkawn kru re ai St. Louis de sa wa sai re.

English: At 1:15 a.m. Saturday, according to witnesses, the bus was going through a green light when the car made a turn in front of it.
Jinghpaw: Majoi shani 1:15 a.m hta, sakse nga ai ni tsun ai hku nga yang, dai mawdaw gaw shawa jawn mawdaw kaba a shawng hku na gayin la ai ten, dai mawdaw kaba gaw wan tsit ai hku na lai mat wa ai.

English: As of the night of August 9, the eye of Morakot was about seventy kilometres away from the Chinese province of Fujian.
Jinghpaw: Shata ma matsat 9 ya a shana hta, Morakot jak a myi gaw Miwa a Fujian ginwang kaw kilometer sanit shi tsan ai share du lai wa ai re.

English: The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.
Jinghpaw: Bungga nbung laru kaba gaw Miwa maga de kph shi langai madang de sit sa wa na re ngu na tau sawn yu da ai re.

English: Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat.
Jinghpaw: Bu hkawm masha ni gaw 90(F) kahtet ai degree kaw lat taw ai majaw shanhte hpe hka bu jaw ma ai.

English: Fire captain Scott Kouns said, "It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s.
Jinghpaw: Wan sat ningbaw Scott Kouns tsun ai gaw, "90 ning ram hta na dai shani gaw Santa Clara hta gaw kahtet ai nhtoi langai re.

English: Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."
Jinghpaw: Roller coaster ntsa kaw jawn taw nga ai aten gaw kade mi wa re tim npyaw la nga na re, yawm htum tsun ga nga yang, shawng jawn ai wa yu na matu yawm htum aten hking hkum mi dang na ai re."

English: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa.
Jinghpaw: Schumacher gaw Formula 1 ninggang hpe sanit lang awng dang ai hpang shaning 2006 hta ningma lu mat ai Felipe Massa shara na majaw hkring sa mat wa sai.

English: The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
Jinghpaw: 2009 na Hungarian Grand Prix laman adawt hkrum ai hpang Brazil masha ni gaw laja lana baw anhtu hkra ai hkrum sha ma ai.

English: Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.
Jinghpaw: Massa gaw shau htum shaning 2009 a ngam a shata hkan gaw le wa na re.

English: Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said.
Jinghpaw: Gumsan magam Hkring mang Rodrigo Arias tsun ai gaw, Arias gaw ana kanu nau nsawng ai baw positive byin mat ai.

English: The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days.
Jinghpaw: Gumsan magam ai masa gaw azim sha naw re nga ai, shi hpe nta kaw tsan ai shara de nhtoi na na wa tawn da na rai tim.

English: Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting.
Jinghpaw: Machyi ai hte du machyi ai hta lai nna, ngai nga pyaw ai re hta n-ga nta kaw na tsun shaga ai bungli hpe galaw na ma ai.

English: I expect to return to all my duties on Monday, Arias said in a statement.
Jinghpaw: Nye a magam lit ni yawng Majoi shani hta bai galaw lu na myit mada ai, ngu Arias gaw shana laika kaw tsun da ai.

English: Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday.
Jinghpaw: Felicia ngu ai Saffir-Simpson Hurricane gaw nbung laru shadawn shachyang hta na amyu hpan 4 laru gaw Chyanun shani ndu shi yang n-gun yawm mat sai.

English: Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported.
Jinghpaw: De a angaw angam ni gaw zinlawng law malawng hta shang mat ai re tim, htenza ai lam hka lim ai lam hpe shiga kaw npru wa shi ai.

English: The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as "beneficial".
Jinghpaw: Oahu a tsa tsaw shadang shadawn rai hta letma 6.34 lung wa ai lam kajawng kaja re ai hpe "akyu hkamsha lam" ngu htawng madun da ma ai.

English: Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning.
Jinghpaw: Marang htu ai lam nkau mi kaw gaw mu laru hte jahkring hkring gala ai myihprap ni kapyawn lawm nga ai.

English: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already.
Jinghpaw: Ndai "The Twin Otter" ngu ai nbungli gaw mani kaw na Airlines PNG Flight CG4684 hku nna Kokoda mare kaw yu na matu galaw ai raitim n awng dang mat ai.

English: About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared.
Jinghpaw: Shi yu ra aten hta minit shi jau nna lahkawng lang ngu na yu wa na matu shakut nga ai shaloi mat mat ai re.

English: The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors.
Jinghpaw: Nbungli hkrat ai shara hpe dai ni mu tam la sai. Dai shara gaw sa na matu tsan gang yak hkak ai majaw pyada lahkawng hpe dai de sa nna, asak naw hkrung ai masha ni hpe tam na hkye la na matu dat dat sai.

English: The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.
Jinghpaw: Lamu marang nkaja ai hte hpawn yu wa yak ai lam byin hkrum hkra ai majaw sawk tam ai lam hpe hkum shingdang kau ra ai.

English: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak.
Jinghpaw: Shiga hku nga yang, Macbeth lam ntsa kaw na gawk nta langai myi gaw dat nsa gayun ai a majaw kapaw lai wa sai re.

English: An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak.
Jinghpaw: Dat nsa hpaga hpung na arawng aya lu ai wa gaw makau grupyin na masha langai dat nsa mawng hkrat ai lam hpe tsun shana ai hpang ndai mabyin hpe sumtang madun wa ai.

English: When the official arrived, the apartment exploded.
Jinghpaw: Balik hpyen la ni du ai hpang, dum nta gaw kapaw wa ai re.

English: No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock.
Jinghpaw: Machyi hkra ai lam kaba kaga ni hpe gaw nshana ma ai. Raitim, yawm htum dai kapaw ai aten hta dai shara kaw nga ai masha manga ni gaw kajawng ai ana kumla a majaw tsi tsi lajang hkrum ma ai.

English: No one was inside the apartment.
Jinghpaw: Wut wahpang gawk kata hta gadai mung n nga ai.

English: At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.
Jinghpaw: Dai aten hta, shanu nga ai masha 100 daram hpe dai shara kaw na shim ai shara de htawt sit kau lu sai.

English: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games.
Jinghpaw: Golf hte rugby ginsup ai lamang ni hpe Olympic ginsup ai kaw gai bang wa sai.

English: The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics.
Jinghpaw: Daini Berlin kaw mungkan ga daga hte seng ai Olympic komti hpung gaw n-gun ginsup hpan ni hpe shi a amu gun masha jep hpung a zuphpawng hta shalawm la na matu ra lata me bang lai wa sai. Rapbi, grau nna gaw Rapbi munghpawm hte goft ni hpe laga n-gun ginsup hpan manga hta grau nna Olympic kaw lu lawm hkra myit ya na matu lata tawn da sai re.

English: Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005.
Jinghpaw: 2005 manga hta Olympic ginsup hpan kaw nna shapru kau na matu ra lata me bang hkrum lai wa ai lagaw lata bawlung (baseball) ginsup hpan hte softball ginsup hpan ni hte dip kanawng ai baw, karate hte shakri hkat ai baw ginsup hpan ni gaw Olympic mahkyen kaw shang lu na matu shakut lai wa sai re.

English: The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.
Jinghpaw: Sindan pa ni hpe gaw Copenhagen kaw na shata man shi hkrum zup bawng ban hpawng hta IOC kawn hpring tup shagrin ai lam galaw na re.

English: Not all were supportive of the inclusion of the women’s ranks.
Jinghpaw: Yawng gaw num ni a madang ni hpe shalawm nna madi shadaw da ai nre.

English: 2004 Olympic silver medallist Amir Khan said, "Deep down I think women shouldn’t fight. That’s my opinion."
Jinghpaw: Shaning 2004 Olampik hta gumhpraw shagrau dazik lu ai Amir Khan tsun lai wa ai gaw, "Ngai sung sung myit yu yang num ni nmai htawng hkat shingjawng nga ai. Dai gaw ngai na myit ningmu re."
