English: Despite his comments he said he will be supporting the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics being held in London.
Jinghpaw: Shi laika hta kaw ka da timung, shi tsun ai gaw shi gaw London kaw hkyen sa wa na shaning 2012 a Olympics hta British hpe ninghkap shing jawng na ni hpe karum madi shadaw sa na ngu tsun ai.

English: The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3.
Jinghpaw: Jep jen ai lam hpe Birmingham Jan mau tara rung kaw galaw lai wa nna August 3 kaw dawdan ai lam galaw lai wa sai re.

English: The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people.
Jinghpaw: Madun ginra hta rim hkrum lai wa ai lamang jum wa gaw dinglun ai hpe nyet kau ai re nna shi gaw masha sumshi daram shi kaw kabai dat ai soi ndum ni kaw na shi hkum shi makawp maga na matu shadaw ni hpe lang wa ai re ngu na aja wa tsun lai wa sai re.

English: Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice.
Jinghpaw: Blake hpe tara rung hjpe nhkru ai nkaja ai hku galaw ai majaw tara chyahkrat hkrum lai wa sai.

English: The judge told Blake it was "almost inevitable" he was going to be sent to jail.
Jinghpaw: Tara agyi gaw Blake hpe tsun ai, dai gaw "gara hku mung koi yen nmai ai" re she hpe hkyuk htawng de sa kau sa na.

English: Dark energy is a completely invisible force that is constantly acting upon the universe.
Jinghpaw: Chyang mang n-gun atsam gaw ninggawn tawa hta ding yang galaw taw ai nmu lu ai ganawng n-gun langai re.

English: Its existence is known only because of its effects on the expansion of the universe.
Jinghpaw: Mungkan ga a dam lada ai lam hpe yu nna shi a nga ai lam hpe chye lu ai.

English: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly.
Jinghpaw: Hpaji rawng ni gaw shata kaw na lobate hkraw ngu shaga ai ga shara gaw angoi sha kaji wa ai hpe mu tam la ma ai.

English: These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent.
Jinghpaw: Ndai dawchyen ni hpe gaw shata a makau hkan kaw mu la ai re nna lamu marang galai sha ai lam a majaw byin pru wa ai lam kaji htum ni kaw mu nga ai re nna ginding a-ga hte seng ai ndai laman sha galaw shapraw dat ai zawn re ai mabyin ni hpe madi madun taw ai re.

English: This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.
Jinghpaw: Dai matsun gaw shata gaw lamu ga zawn nre ngu tsun ai hpe ndang taw nga ai re.

English: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd.
Jinghpaw: La langai mi gaw,bawm kapaw na shajin tawn ai dingsen masum mawdaw hte masha hpawng de gawt shang wa ai.

English: The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast.
Jinghpaw: Bawm kapaw ai kaw na lu na ningma hpe tsi tsi lajang ngut ai hpang bawm kapaw ai hte seng nna shadu hkrum ai masha hpe rim da lai wa sai re.

English: His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.
Jinghpaw: Ahkang nga ai ni shi mying hpe nchye shi ai re, raitim shi gaw Uighur myu re hpe shanhte chye ai.

English: Nadia, born on September 17, 2007, by Cesarean section at a maternity clinic in Aleisk, Russia, weighed in at a massive 17 pounds 1 ounce.
Jinghpaw: Nadia hpe gaw Russia mung dan, Aleisk mare kaw na ma kanu tsi gawk kaw, shata man chyhku 17 ya, shaning 2007 ya shani ga lajang hku shangai la ai re nna numnak pound 17 hte aung za langai myi nga lai ai re.

English: We were all simply in shock, the mother stated.
Jinghpaw: Anhte yawng gaw dai hku sha kajawng mat ai, ngu kanu gaw tsun ai.

English: When asked what the father said, she answered "He couldn't say a thing - he just stood there blinking."
Jinghpaw: Kawa hpe tsun ai hpe san ai shaloi, shi tsun ai gaw, "Shi hpa mung nlu tsun ai - shi myi grip nna sha tsap nga ai."

English: It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is.
Jinghpaw: Dai gaw hka zawn shamu shamawt na ra ai. Dai gaw hka a sa ai ladat zawn sha asan sha mu lu ai.

English: So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom.
Jinghpaw: Nang panglai makau kaw tsap taw yang, nang gaw npu kaw nga taw ai nlu dai nrai laga rai ni hpe mu lu na re.

English: As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth, added Stofan.
Jinghpaw: Anhte chye ai daram gaw, Titan hta grau n-gun atsam nga ai masa hku madun lu ai shara gaw langai sha nga ai, dai gaw Mungkan ga re nga Stofan kahtap tsun ai.

English: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards.
Jinghpaw: Jau man nga ai ni shi lahkawng re ai uhpung ni Obanazawa Laika Shagun Rung hpe shanhte ni shanhte na htunghking hte seng ai hte ayan lu ai shaning ningnan kat pa nlu lai wa hte seng nna shawk shana ai lam hpang dat ai aten shata man langai 1 ya shani ndai manghkang gaw hpang lai wa sai re.

English: Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.
Jinghpaw: Laika sa dap ni kaw nna dai la kasha makoi da ai ga shaka laika 600 hta 429 gaw shaning ningnan sumla shagun laika rai nna yaw shada da ai hkap la ai ni de nlu sa sa ai hpe lu sagawn la ai majaw mani tawng ban laika hpe mungdan masha ni kaw shapraw dat ai.

English: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole.
Jinghpaw: Masha nmai galaw ai orbiter Chandrayaan-1 gaw shi a Moon Impact Probe (MIP) hpe ndang kau ai, dai gaw shata hta 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 mile per hour) hte sa dik hkrat wa ai ngut nna shata a dingdung pole makau kaw hkrat yu sai.

English: Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.
Jinghpaw: Bai nna ahkyak ai hpungtang hpaji hte seng ai shadawn hkingrai masum jai lang yu yang, lunar sakse gaw maga shagu de na Kala myu sha dawng hkawn a sumla hta mung mu lu rawng ai.

English: Thanks for those who supported a convict like me, Siriporn was quoted as saying at a press conference.
Jinghpaw: Shiga sanglang hpawng langai kaw Siriporn hpe la kap nna tsun taw ai lam gaw, "ngai zawn re bawng masha hpe madi shadaw lai wa ai ni hpe chyeju dum ai lam re."

English: Some may not agree but I don't care.
Jinghpaw: Nkau mi gaw myit nhkrum na re raitim ngai ahkyak nda n-ngai.

English: I am happy that there are people willing to support me.
Jinghpaw: Ngai hpe madi shadaw mayu ai masha ni nga ai majaw ngai myit pyaw ai.

English: Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed Political Agents" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas.
Jinghpaw: Shaning 1947 kaw British ni up hkang ai kata kaw na Pakistan ni shang lawt lu hpang kaw na gaw, Pakistan Gumsan magam gaw "Mung masa dat kasa ni hpe" ginra ni hpe madu hku na up hkang taw FATA hpe up hkang na matu shatsam dat ai.

English: These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution.
Jinghpaw: Ndai dat kasa ni gaw Pakistan mungdan gaw da tara a daw kaji 247 npu na asuya hte tara na matu lit nga ai.

English: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time.
Jinghpaw: Islam ni a chyoi pra ai mare kaba, Mecca na manam jarawp langai gaw buga ten jahpawt hkying 10 daram hta run hkrat mat ai.

English: The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage.
Jinghpaw: Dai nta htingtsip gaw hajj pilgrimage kaw na chyoi pra ai mare de nawku na matu du sa ai bu hkawm ai ni hpe nga shara jaw da ai.

English: The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates.
Jinghpaw: Ndai manam jarawp kaw na manam law malawng gaw United Arab Emirates mungdan kaw na masha ni re.

English: The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.
Jinghpaw: Si hkrung si htan hkrum ai gaw yawm dik 15 re, ruhkum ndai hta grai law na re ngu myit mada ai.

English: Leonov, also known as "cosmonaut No. 11", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts.
Jinghpaw: Leonov, "cosmonaut No. 11" ngu chye da ai gaw Soviet Uhpung a cosmonaut a mi na hpung a daw chyen re.

English: On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or "spacewalk", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes.
Jinghpaw: 1965 ning na Wut shata 18 ya shani hta shi a shawng jahtum "EVA" lamang shing nrai, lamu hpungtang kaw langai hkrai hkawm sa ai lam hpe minit shi lahkawng jan hkra galaw lai wa sai.

English: He received the "Hero of the Soviet Union", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work.
Jinghpaw: Shi gaw Soviet Union kaw na madan tsaw dik Hero of the Soviet Union hpe shi bungli a majaw lu wa ai.

English: Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over.
Jinghpaw: Shi ning na ai hpang, she gaw Apollo-Soyuz lit la lamang na Soviet daw hpe masat dingsat let Lamu ganghkau Gashun ai lam htum sai ngu woi awn mat ai.

English: She said, "There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently.
Jinghpaw: Shi tsun ai gaw, "Gasat gala lam gaw du wa na re ngu myit mada taw na hpe hpaji jaw na matu hpaji ngu gaw nnga ai.

English: However, the reduction of the threat level to severe does not mean the overall threat has gone away."
Jinghpaw: Kaning raitim, ndai jahkrit shama hkrum ai lam loi yawm mat ai gaw ndai lam nnga mat ai nre ai hpe chye ra nga ai."

English: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI.
Jinghpaw: Daru magam lu ai uhpung ni gaw jahkrit shama ai lam a shimlum lam hpe hkrat nchye lu shi ai shaloi, Maryland htaw wa htaw sa hte seng nna darum magam lu ai uhpung ni gaw FBI a madi shadaw n-gun hte ni htep sa wa lu hkra galaw lai wa sai.

English: Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours.
Jinghpaw: Mawdaw jahten ni hpe gaw shangna tingrat ni hpe pat na matu lang ai rai nna balik 80 daram gaw kaga lam hku sa lu na matu garum ya nga ai.

English: There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.
Jinghpaw: Mare a kaga lam rai nga ai Beltway maga de gaw mawdaw htinglet na matu aten na ai lam n nga ai hpe chye lu ai.

English: Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit.
Jinghpaw: Nigeria mungdan gaw du na bat hta galaw hkyen ai AfCFTA zuphpawng de shang lu na matu hkyen lajang lai wa ai lam hpe ndau shana lai wa sai.

English: AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join.
Jinghpaw: AU hpaga yumga lam hte jak rung a komishin salang Albert Muchanga gaw Benin mungdan mung ndai hpung kaw lawm wa na re ngu shana dat ai.

English: The commissioner said, "We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020".
Jinghpaw: Ginwang du wa tsun ai gaw " ritkawp ni hpe anhte myit nhkrum shi ga ai, raitim anhte kaw nga ai hkrang nhprang gaw 2020 July shata 1 ya shani hta bungli galaw hpang na matu mai nga ai."

English: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk.
Jinghpaw: Dabang gaw shawng daw de lamu hpungtang laksan magam gun ai hpung dabang kaw nbungli n leng lau hkra makawp ya ai hkringrai shamat kau ai raitimung, lamu hpungtang hkawm sa ai lam ngut du hkra shi a sat lawat hpe hkang zing lai wa sai re.

English: Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters.
Jinghpaw: Chiao hte Sharipov gaw jet jak kanawng n-gun shapraw jak garam lajang ai kaw na shim lum nna tsan ai share kaw nga nga ai lam hpe shiga shana lai wa sai re.

English: Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.
Jinghpaw: Russia masha ni gaw jet pyenli hpe ga kaw na gau mai hkra galaw sai, pyenli daru a myit masa lam hpe mi na hku bai lu la sai.

English: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges.
Jinghpaw: Virginia kaw dai amu hpe tara jun ai lam galaw lai wa ai hpa majaw nga yang ndai gaw mungkan kumpyuta hkridun galaw lajang ya ai lam a ning shawng shapraw ai lam a nta re nga nna, tara jun na lam hpe kasu alun ya ai kampani mung rai nga ai.

English: This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.
Jinghpaw: Ndai gaw laika pung jai lang ai ni hpang de nra sharawng ai lam shabra ai kaw na aka spam, law law hpa sa ai e-mail hpe shingdang na matu shaning 2003 na upadi tara jahkrat masat da ai lam hpe jai lang ai gaw shawng nnan lang na mara dam hpe lu hkam la sai re.

English: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million.
Jinghpaw: 21 ning re ai Jesus gaw maning 2017 ning, January shata hta Brazilian club Palmeiras kaw na pru nna Manchester City de shabrai wan £27 hte shang wa sai.

English: Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.
Jinghpaw: Dai ten kaw na, Brazil masha ni gaw shingjawng hpawng lamang shagu hta kalap mung a matu shingjawng lamang 53 lajang da nna shang ai bawlung htihkum 24 lu lai wa sai re.

English: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill.
Jinghpaw: Matut nna, tsi du Lee gaw Turkey mungdan na ma ni machyi makaw ai lam n nga ai sha A(H5N1) uli ana kanu shang hkrum ai lam hpe mung tsang nga ai lam sumtang kaw na tsun ai.

English: Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted.
Jinghpaw: Nkau hka ja la ai lam ni hpaji jaw ai gaw, shi ka matsing lai wa ai gaw mungkan ting kap bra ana hpe nlu shabyin shi ai shaloi ana zinli gaw si shangun lu ai lam yawm mat ra ai re.

English: There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.
Jinghpaw: Mak hkalawng ana kumla nau n madun shi yang, kaja machyi nga ai masha ni nchye ai a majaw kaga masha ni hpe hkan shakap ya na tsang nga ai.

English: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation.
Jinghpaw: Leslie Aun ngu ai Komen Foundation a ga shaga ahkaw ahkang nga ai wa gaw shanhte a uhpung uhpawng hku nna tara masa npu e san jep hkrum ai hpung ni hpe karum gumhpraw shing nrai, gumhpraw htuk jaw na lam ni n galaw na ngu ai hkangda tara nnan galaw da sai ngu nna tsun ai.

English: Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns.
Jinghpaw: Masing nga Kanu kawa prat hpung a jai gumhpraw hpe Cliff Stearns Dak kasa hku na jai lang hparan da ai sumtang hte Masing nga Kanu kawa prat hpung gara hku gumhpraw lang da ai hpe sawk sagawn ai lam jahkring da hkrum ai majaw Komen a policy gaw Masing nga Kanu kawa prat hpung a matu rip kawp tara nshang ai.

English: Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.
Jinghpaw: Stearns gaw dat n-gun rung hte hpaga yumga komti hpung a npu kaw na re nga ai yu hpareng na lit hte sam jep sagawn na matu komti kasha a tingyang up hku shara hku nna ahkum hkangse ni hpe kanu kawa prat masing hku nna me ma shabrai ai lam hta lang nga nlang nga hpe jep jen nga ai re.

English: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote.
Jinghpaw: Massachusetts a up hkang du dingsa Mitt Romeny gaw Shanun ya shani hta Florida Republican Pati a tingnyang up lata ai lamang hta tsa lam shadang 46 hte me dang wa sai.

English: Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent.
Jinghpaw: Galoi mung na U.S Rapdaw Tingnyang up Newt Gingrich gaw tsa lam shadang 32 hte nambat lahkawng kaw hkan ai.

English: As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.
Jinghpaw: Dang ai wa mungdaw yawng la nga hte maren, Florida gaw Republikan Pati mying tang shawng lam a matu Romney hpe yawng a shawng hta woi awn na hku na, de a ahkang aya yawng manga shi ting hpe Romney hpang de shagrau sai.

English: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover.
Jinghpaw: Ninghkap hpung a woi awn zinlum ai ni gaw 100,000 daram re masha ni gaw Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg hte Hanover zawn re Germani na mare kaba ni de nhtang gayin sa wa sai nga tsun ai.

English: In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors.
Jinghpaw: Berlin kaw pyada ni gaw ninghkap masha 6,500 daram nga na re ngu tak ma ai.

English: Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland.
Jinghpaw: Paris, Bulgaria ga na Sofia, Lithuania ga na Vilnius, Malta ga na Valetta, Estonia ga na Tallinn hte Edinburgh hte Scotland ga na Glasgow ni kaw masha n-gun madun ninghkap ai lam ni galaw lai wa sai.

English: In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices.
Jinghpaw: London kaw masha 200 ram wa mi gaw madung laika hkrang madu ahkang tek jum ai masha ni a rung nta shinggan kaw masha n-gun madun ninghkap ai lam galaw wa sai re.

English: Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now.
Jinghpaw: Lai wa sai shata hta, Polish mangdan aup ni gaw myit hkrum da ai lam hpe ngalaw ai, ACTA hpe seng htu wa ai hta Poland kaw myit nhkrum masha ni grai law wa ai.

English: Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.
Jinghpaw: Latvia hte Slovakia lahkawng yang gaw ACTA kaw shang ai lam hta hpang hkrat ma ai.

English: Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs.
Jinghpaw: Dusat Zingri Makawp na matu Dusat Shalawt hpung hte Royal Society (RSPCA) ni gaw Australian shan sat dap ni yawng hta CCTV camera ni shakap shagrin sa wa na matu kalang bai hpyi lajin nga ma ai.

English: RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia.
Jinghpaw: RSPCA Dingda Wales a jep maran ningbaw nnan David O'Shannessy ABC hpe tsun ai gaw jep maran ai lam ni hpe Australia mung ting kaw malawng nga ra ai.

English: The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority.
Jinghpaw: Shanhte a nam dusat ni hpe tsaw dik ai hku madung da hkrum lu na matu dusat ni hte amu bungli galaw nga ai masha ni a matu CCTV kaw na atsawm sha yu maram lu na re.

English: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior.
Jinghpaw: United State Lamu ga Shadawn Hpung mung shagu na nnang nawn lamu ga hta gaw ndai bat hta Iceland hta nnang nawm na lam madun da ai.

English: The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours.
Jinghpaw: Iceland a lamu marang hte seng ai rung kaw na mung lai wa sai hkying hkum 48 hta Hekla kaw n-nang nawn ai lam n-nga lai wa ai lam hpe shiga shapraw lai wa sai re.

English: The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera.
Jinghpaw: Alak mi re ai nnang nawn shamu ai byin yan shai wa ai mahtai gaw wan bum pungding matu na sinpraw dingdung maga hta shata man matsum 10 ya kaw byin hpang wa sai.

English: Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain.
Jinghpaw: Sum moi chyang ni gaw wan bum a majaw byin wa ai nre ngu hpe bum lagaw hpe yu nna masha ni tsun shana ma ai.

English: The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.
Jinghpaw: Sum mwi ni gaw kaja wa wan bum kapaw wa na n kapaw na lam byin wa mai masa hpe tang madun ai re.

English: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater.
Jinghpaw: Luno gaw daw mat ai, nbung grai bung ai hte dai hpe hka leng shinggang ganawng wa yang, sau cubic meter 120-160 nga ai.

English: Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose.
Jinghpaw: Ji grawng pyenli ni hte magam gun jahku hpe hkyen lu ai, hkala hkrum ai gaw ladi daw ai langai sha re.

English: The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.
Jinghpaw: Ndai mita 100 nga ai sanghpaw gaw shi a namhpun gunrai hpe sa htaw la ai lam kaw re majaw shawng shaloi e masha kaba ni gaw sanghpaw na wansau manu mana hkaw wa na hpe hkrit tsang ma ai.

English: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011.
Jinghpaw: Rapdaw nta lahkawng yan gaw yaw shada ai garam lajang ai lam ni hpe shaning 2011 kaw shagrin da lai wa sai re.

English: A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday.
Jinghpaw: Dai galai shai ai lam hpe House of Representative kaw na shawng luttaw lahkawng hpe chyhten ai kaw na tara galaw ai hpe galaw wa ai ngut nna luttaw kaw langai ya shani tha dai zawn laika hpe jaw wa ai.

English: The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future.
Jinghpaw: Num, la shada hkungran hkat ai lam hpe pat na matu tsun ai ga yan nambat lahkawng n awng dang ai lam gaw htawm hpang de mung shawa pawng hpawm lam a matu ahkaw ahkang hpaw ya na lam byin wa chye ai.

English: Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.
Jinghpaw: Lawu na bungli mahkrun hku nga yang, shaning 2015 shaning 2016 hpang e lata san tawn ai upadi ka lajang rapdaw kawn amu lam yan kata kaw naw matut nga taw na matu HJR-3 hpe bai jep maram yu ai lam bai galaw sa wa na re.

English: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship.
Jinghpaw: Dai hta lai nna Vautier na awng dang ai lam gaw mungdan lam hta pat ai ni hpe ginsat ai shaning 1973 hta malu shagam nna myit nhkrum lam madun ai ni lawm ai.

English: French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II.
Jinghpaw: French ni a tara hpe galai shai kau sai. Shi a prat hpe bai yu yang shi gaw asak 15 hta World War II shaloi French tara galaw ai de shang wa ai.

English: He documented himself in a 1998 book.
Jinghpaw: Shaning 1998 laika buk kaw shi lam shi ka da ai re.

English: In the 1960s he headed back to newly-independent Algeria to teach film directing.
Jinghpaw: Shaning 1960 hta shi gaw shanglawt sai Algeria hpe sumla hkrung gayet ai lam hpe sharin na matu bai galaw wa ai.

English: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54.
Jinghpaw: Olympic hta ja dazik lahkawng madu da ai wa, Japan masha Judoka Hitoshi Saito gaw asak 54 hta si mat ai.

English: The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer.
Jinghpaw: Dai tsi I ni gaw intrahepatic cancer majaw ngu shana wa ai.

English: He died in Osaka on Tuesday.
Jinghpaw: Shi gaw Chanun shani hta Osaka hta asak si mat ai.

English: As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.
Jinghpaw: Moi na Olympic hte Mungkan ningtawn ninghkrin wa rai nga ai Saito gaw shi si ai aten hta Japan Judo ginjaw hpaji shakat jawng kompti yawng a tingyang up galaw nga lai wa ai re.

English: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year.
Jinghpaw: Lamang kaw masha shau htum latsa dang sa du shang lawm ma ai. Lai wa sai shaning hta hkungran lamang galaw ai yan la a laning mi ladu hkrum poi hpe shapyaw ya na matu du sa ai re ma ai.

English: A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said.
Jinghpaw: Tara shang ladu hkrum nhtoi lamang hpe du wa aten ladaw langai hta matsat da lam tara sha sharna sai re.

English: The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives.
Jinghpaw: Dai yan la gaw lai wa sai laning mi shaloi Texas mungdaw hta hkungran ga shaka la da sai rai nna manaw manang ni jinghku ni hte arau poi galaw na matu Buffalo de sa wa ai re.

English: The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.
Jinghpaw: Buffalo kaw shangai ai, asak 30 rai sai madu wa gaw sanat hkra na tsi ai mali kaw na langai re, raitim shi madu jan gaw hpa nbyin ai.

English: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career.
Jinghpaw: Karno gaw grai mying kaba ai, raitim tsun na yak ai Ingalik sharin sara re, shi gaw shi prat a awngdang dik shara du hkra jawngma 9,000 ram ra ai King's Glory hte Prat dep Hpaji ngu ai hpe sharin ai wa re.

English: In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class.
Jinghpaw: Shi na matsing laika kaw nkau kanu kawa ni gaw kahtak ai hku myit shalawm ya ai ngu ga si ni hte jawng gak kata masai marai ga si ni ka lai wa ai ngu ka matsing da ai.

English: Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor.
Jinghpaw: Prat dep hpaji hpung gaw shi gaw Inglik sharin sara kaba re nga masu hkawm ai hte ahkang nlu ai sha shawa jawn mawdaw kaba hkan shi bungli ndau laika hkan shakap hkawm ai majaw tara jun da ma ai.

English: He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged.
Jinghpaw: Shi hpe mung ndai laman laika hkrang madu ahkang tawt lai ai wa hku mara madi shagun da ai, raitim tara gaw njun ma ai.

English: A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'
Jinghpaw: Lai wa sai jawng ma tsun ai gaw shanhte gaw laika sharing gawk kaw nkaja ai nga lang ai, laika buk kaw na shani ni hpe sharin ai, ngut nna jawng ma manang ni zawn re.

English: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy.
Jinghpaw: Hpang jahtum sumshi ning lapran hkan gaw, kummyunit mungdan hku tara shang ngam nga ai hpang, Miwa gaw sut masa hpe gaw sharawt lai wa sai.

English: The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping.
Jinghpaw: Alat ningshawn na sut masa garam ai lam hpe gaw Deng Xiaoping wa ningbaw galaw ai kata kaw galaw lai wa sai re.

English: Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times.
Jinghpaw: Dai aten kaw na, myuwa hpaga gaw 90 lang daram kaba wa ai.

English: For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry.
Jinghpaw: Shawng nnan lang a matu, lai wa sai shaning hta Miwa gaw Germany hta grau nna mawdaw ni hpe maigan de shapraw ya ai lam galaw lai wa nna ndai jak magam bungli a kaba htum ai gat lawk hku nna United States hpe lai kau da sai re.

English: China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.
Jinghpaw: Shaning hkun ning daram hta Miwa a GDP gaw United States na hta grau law wa chye ai re.

English: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean.
Jinghpaw: Shaning 2010 na Atlantic laru shata kaw Kahtet mungkan daw hte seng ai nbung laru ngu mying ai nbung laru gaw Alantic pang lai a sinpraw hkran maga de byin lai wa sai re.

English: The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph).
Jinghpaw: Dai nbung laru gaw Florida, Maimi kaw na deng 3,000 daram tsan nna yawm dik nbung bung shadang 40 mph (64 kph) nga ai.

English: Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday.
Jinghpaw: Amyu sha nbung laru ginjaw kaw na hpung tang hpaji ninghkring ni shadu ai gaw Danielle gaw bat hpang masum ya hta nbung laru langai byin wa na matu n-gun shaja dat ya na re.

English: As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.
Jinghpaw: Dai nbung laru gaw ga galapran taw ai hte tsan taw ai majaw shi gaw United State dai nrai Caribbean de shang na amtu yak taw ai re.

English: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade.
Jinghpaw: Croatia a muklum, Zagreb kaw shangai ai, Bobek gaw Partizan Belgrade a matu gasup ai kaw na mying kaba wa ai.

English: He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958.
Jinghpaw: Shi gaw shanhte hte 1945 hta ta gin dun nna 1958 du hkra rau nga lai wa sai.

English: During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances.
Jinghpaw: Shi a ginsup hpung hte rau re ai shaloi gaw, 468 lang ginsup ai kaw na goal 403 lu htawng bang da lu ai.

English: No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek.
Jinghpaw: Bobek hta lai nna dai uhpung a matu kadai mung goal nlu galaw ai dai nrai mying nkaba ya ai.

English: In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.
Jinghpaw: 1995 hta shi hpe Partizan a labau hta ningtawn dik ginsup masha langai hku na lata da sai.

English: The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil.
Jinghpaw: Shakawn shagrau lamang hpe mungkan ting mying gumhkawng ai uhpung Cirque du Soleil ni a alak mi re ai madun ai lamang hte hpang lai wa sai re.

English: It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses.
Jinghpaw: De a hpang kaw gaw Istanbul mungdaw a Symphony madum sumpyi hpung, Janissary dum sumpyi hpung hte mahkawn ninghkring Fatih Erkoç hte Müslüm Gürses ni rai nga ai.

English: Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage.
Jinghpaw: Dai hpang Whirling Dervishes hpung ni gaw pyinra ntsa shara la mat ai.

English: Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou.
Jinghpaw: Turkish diva Sezen Aksu gaw Italy Alessandro Safina hte Greek kaw na yung ngoi ning hkring Haris Alexiou hpe hkrang shala ai.

English: To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show "Troy".
Jinghpaw: Shangut shakre na matu, Anatolia a wan ngu mying ai Turkish ka uhpung ni gaw "Troy" madun dan ai lam hpe hkrang shala lai wa sai re.

English: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway.
Jinghpaw: Peter Lenz, asak 13 re ai sengke shingjawng ai wa gaw Indianapolis sengke jawn lam kaw adawt hkrum ai kaw lawm nna si mat ai.

English: While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat.
Jinghpaw: Shi sai shalum ginsup taw ai laman e Lenz gaw shi a lagaw leng ntsa kaw na di hkrat mat ai, ngut na shi hte arau shingjawng ai wa Xavier Zayat hte adawt hkrup ai.

English: He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died.
Jinghpaw: Shi gaw kalang ta lam ntsa na tsi magam gun e gawn lajang ai lam hkrum nna, hpang e shi si mat ai shara, buga tsi rung de htaw sa da hkrum ai re.

English: Zayat was unhurt in the accident.
Jinghpaw: Ndai mabyin hta Zayat gaw hkala nba nhkrum lai wa ai re.

English: Regarding the global financial situation, Zapatero continued by saying that "the financial system is a part of the economy, a crucial part.
Jinghpaw: Mungkan ting a sut masa hpe mahta nna Zapatero matut tsun ai gaw "sut gumhpraw hte seng ai gawda hkrang gaw sut lu nga mai lam a ahkyak dik ai daw langai mi rai nga ai.

English: We have a year-long financial crisis, which has had its most acute moment in the past two months, and I think now the financial markets are beginning to recover."
Jinghpaw: Anhte hta shaning tup na ja gumhpraw ginchyum chyat mat wa ai, lai wa sai shata lahkawng hta gaw grau nna laja lana sawng mat ai, dai hpang de she ngai shadu ai, ja gumhpraw gat lawk ni bai kaja hpang wa ai."

English: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts.
Jinghpaw: Lai sai bat hta Naked Shiga dap kaw na shanhte gaw gau ngwi ngwi hte shanhte a shi shana dap nnan masum hte rau shiga ni hpe mungkan ga gada hte seng ai aga ni hte shapoi sa na matu masing jahkrat masat sa wa mai ai lam ndau shana dat ai.

English: Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.
Jinghpaw: English hte Japan hku gaw mi kaw na shiga shapoi taw sai re nna mungkan ting hte seng ai uhpung uhpawng ni gaw Spain ga, Italy ga, Korea ga lamang ni hpe hkrangmu shiga, internet laika man ni hte gun hkawm mai ai jak ni a matu shabra hpang taw sai re.

English: Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out.
Jinghpaw: Gam kaja ai majaw ngai kaw hpa nbyin ai, raitim si mat sai masha ni wa shinggan de lu le na matu hku wawt ni hpe adup ga taw ai lam hpe shingran pra pra mu ai.

English: People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable.
Jinghpaw: Masha ni gaw hkuwawt pat maka hpe lahkum hte gayet ma timung hkuwawt chyinghka ni gaw daw hten ai lam nnga ai.

English: One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window, said survivor Franciszek Kowal.
Jinghpaw: Hpang jahtum hta pat langai ga mat nna shanhte ni gaw hku wawt kaw nna le hpang wa masai, ngu nna asak lawt wa ai Franciszek Kowal tsun lai wa ai re.

English: Stars give off light and heat because of the energy made when hydrogen atoms are merged (or fused) together to form heavier elements.
Jinghpaw: Hydrogen atom ni gaw grai li ai nhprang jet ni hpe hkrang shapraw na matu rau sha majaw (sh gahkying) mat ai shaloi shagan ni gaw tsam n-gun na majaw nhtoi hte kahtet ai hpe shapru ai.

English: Scientists are working to create a reactor that can make energy in the same way.
Jinghpaw: Hpungtang hpaji ninghkring ni gaw tsam n-gun hpe bung ai lam hku na lu galaw ai nuclear bunghkrawng langai hpe shapraw na matu galaw taw nga ma ai.

English: This, however, is a very hard problem to solve and will take many years before we see useful fusion reactors built.
Jinghpaw: Kaning rai timung, ndai manghkang gaw loi loi hte hparan mai ai manghkang nrai nga ai. Kaja nan akyu rawng ai shingja dat kabaw bunghkrawng hpe mu lu na matu gaw shaning loi naw na na re.

English: The steel needle floats on top of the water because of surface tension.
Jinghpaw: Dai hpri sumri gaw hka ntsa kaw nga taw ai re hpa majaw nga yang hka gaw lagi ja taw na re.

English: Surface tension happens because the water molecules at the surface of the water are strongly attracted to each other more than they are to the air molecules above them.
Jinghpaw: Hka ntsa man na hka molecule ni a majaw ntsa man ja dingkang lam byin ai gaw de lahta na nbung molecule ni hta langai hte langai ngang ngang matut da ai lam a majaw re.

English: The water molecules make an invisible skin on the water’s surface that allows things like the needle to float on top of the water.
Jinghpaw: Hka bungshi ni gaw samit zawn re arai ni hpe hka ntsa waw taw shangun lu ai baw hka ntsa man kaw na nmu lu ai hpyi ni hpe galaw ya ai re.

English: The blade on a modern ice skate has a double edge with a concave hollow between them. The two edges allow for a better grasp of the ice, even when tilted.
Jinghpaw: Ya prat na hkyen pa din hkyepdin ni a ningshang hta nten lahkawng lawm nna, shanhte a ka'ang hta e hku zawn re lawm chye ai. Ndai nten lahkawng gaw hkyen pa ntsa e ding yau mat yang pi n galau hkra magra da ya lu ai.

English: Because the bottom of the blade is slightly curved, as the blade tilts to one side or the other, the edge which is in contact with the ice also curves.
Jinghpaw: Nhtu a htum pa maga gaw magaw taw ai majaw, nhtu a lahkawng yan maga nchyan de, ndung gaw hkyen hte hkra taw ai majaw magaw taw nga ai.

English: This causes the skater to turn. If the skates tilt to the right, the skater turns right, if the skates tilt to the left, the skater turns left.
Jinghpaw: Ndai a majaw leng jawn ai wa gayin mat ai re. Lama na leng jawn ai wa gaw lahkra maga she gayin yang gaw hkra maga de sa mat na re, lama na lapai maga de gayin ai rai yang pai maga de yawng mat na re.

English: To return to their previous energy level, they must get rid of the extra energy they got from the light.
Jinghpaw: Kaja ai ngun level bai lu na matu shanhte gaw wan kaw na lu ai jan taw ai ngun ni hpe shayen kau ra na re.

English: They do this by emitting a tiny particle of light called a "photon".
Jinghpaw: Dai hpe shanhte gaw sumla ngu ai wan kaw na kaji ai ayun ya ni hpe shapraw nna galaw wa ai.

English: Scientists call this process "stimulated emission of radiation" because the atoms are stimulated by the bright light, causing the emission of a photon of light, and light is a type of radiation.
Jinghpaw: Hpaji rawng ni gaw dai lam hpe radio shapraw na matu ngun jaw ai ngut shaga ma ai hpamajaw nga yang atom ni hpe wan ni kaw na ngun kaw ai, wan na photon shapraw ai hpe byin shangun ai majaw re ngut nna wan gaw radio myu mi re.

English: The next picture shows the atoms emitting photons. Of course, in reality photons are a lot smaller than those in the picture.
Jinghpaw: Dai laga sumla gaw atom shapraw ai lam hpe madun ai re. kaja nang yang, photon ni gaw dai kaw madun da ai hta grau kaji ai re.

English: Photons are even smaller than the stuff that makes up atoms!
Jinghpaw: Photo ni gaw atom hpe galaw ai ri ni hta grau kaji ai re.

English: After hundreds of hours of operation the filament in the bulb eventually burns out and the light bulb no longer works.
Jinghpaw: Hking latsa hku bungli galaw ngut ai hpang wan pu kaw na wan sumri ni gaw hkru wa ai ngut nna wan pu mung bungli ngalaw mat sai.

English: The light bulb then needs replacing. It is necessary to be careful in replacing the light bulb.
Jinghpaw: Ndai wan pu hpe galai kau ai lam galaw ya ra sai. Wan pu galai ai shaloi sadi sahka ai la gaw ahkyak la nga ai.

English: First, the switch for the light fixture needs to be turned off or the cable disconnected.
Jinghpaw: Shawng nnan, wan hkalok hpe byeng mayu yang wan shawng sat kau u dai nrai wan sumri hpe shawng dik kau u.

English: This is because electricity flowing into the socket where the metallic part of bulb sits can give you a severe electric shock if you touch the inside of the socket or the metal base of the bulb while it is still partly in the socket.
Jinghpaw: Dai gaw wan ngun gaw wan pu kaw na gumhpaw de sa wa nna wan ngu hpe jaw ai majaw re nang dai socket kata kaw na gumhpraw hpe sa jum yang dai kaw wan ngun naw nga taw na re.

English: The major organ of the circulatory system is the heart, which pumps the blood.
Jinghpaw: Hkum kaw na sai hpe gayin ya ai gaw salum re, shi gaw dsai hpe tu ya ai re.

English: Blood goes away from the heart in tubes called arteries and comes back to the heart in tubes called veins. The smallest tubes are called capillaries.
Jinghpaw: Salum kaw na tube kata sai hkawm mat ai hpe sai dat lasa ngu tsun nna tube kata hku salum de bai wa ai hpe sai ginhtan lasa ngu tsun ai. Grai kaja ai tube ni hpe gaw kara zawn grai kaji ai sai lam ni ngu ai.

English: A triceratops' teeth would have been able to crush not only leaves but even very tough branches and roots.
Jinghpaw: Triceratop a wa gaw namlap sha nre hpun hte aru ni hpe ma dang gawa ai re.

English: Some scientists think Triceratops ate cycads, which are a type of plant that was common in the Cretaceous.
Jinghpaw: Hpungtang hpaji ninghkring ni gaw cycads ngu mying ai Cretaceous kaw mu mada lu ai hpun ni hpe Triceratop ni sha ma ai ngu shadu ma ai.

English: These plants look like a small palm tree with a crown of sharp, spiky leaves.
Jinghpaw: Ndai hpun ni gaw lap masen ai, jan mau hkrang zawn re namhtan hpun kaji zawn san ai.

English: A Triceratops could have used its strong beak to strip off the leaves before eating the trunk.
Jinghpaw: Triceratop ni gaw dai hpun mat hpe nsha shi yang alap ni hpe shi ngup masen hte yeng kau lu ai.

English: Other scientists argue that these plants are very poisonous so it is unlikely that any dinosaur ate them, even though today the sloth and other animals like the parrot (a descendant of the dinosaurs) can eat poisonous leaves or fruit.
Jinghpaw: Kaga hpungtang hpaji ninghkring ni dang rang ai lam gaw ndai hpun ni gaw gung grai rawng ai baw rai nga ai, dai majaw ndai prat hta na sangang ni hte hkai ke (moi prat na dusat ni kaw na yu hkrat wa ai) zawn re ai kaga dusat ni gung rawng ai namlap namsi ni hpe sha ai raitim pyi moi prat na dusat ni shanhte hpe sha lai wa ai lam gaw nau nmai byin na re.

English: How would Io's gravity pull on me? If you stood on the surface of Io, you would weigh less than you do on Earth.
Jinghpaw: Lo a ginding aga gang n-gun gara hku na ngai hpe gang da ai kun? Lama nang lo ntsa man hta tsap yang, Mungkan ga kaw nga ai hta joi si grai tsang na ra ai.

English: A person who weighs 200 pounds (90kg) on Earth would weigh about 36 pounds (16kg) on Io. So the gravity, of course, pulls less on you.
Jinghpaw: Mungkan ga kaw pound 200 (90kg) li ai masha gaw lo kaw pound 36 (16kg) sha li ai. Dai majaw ginding ga n-gun nang hpe nau n-gang da lu ai.

English: The Sun doesn't have a crust like the Earth that you can stand on. The whole Sun is made out of gases, fire, and plasma.
Jinghpaw: Jan kaw gaw mungkan ga kaw na jawn nang mai tsap ai ntsa lam n-nga ai. Jan yawng hpe gaw dat nsa, wan hte dat yi la n-gun bung ai dat nsa ni rau galaw da ai re.

English: The gas becomes thinner as you go farther from the center of the Sun.
Jinghpaw: Dat nsa gaw Jan ka'ang kaw na tsan magang grau hpa wa magang re.

English: The outer-part we see when we look at the Sun is called the photosphere, which means "ball of light".
Jinghpaw: Jan hpe yu ai shaloi mu lu ai shinggan maga daw hpe gaw nhtoi shing "photosphere", nga ma ai. Nhtoi bawlung ngu mung lachyum mai shapraw nga ai.

English: About three thousand years later, in 1610, Italian astronomer Galileo Galilei used a telescope to observe that Venus has phases, just as the moon does.
Jinghpaw: Shaning hkying masum na ai shaloi, 1610 ning hta, Itali amyu sha lamu shagan hpaji ninghkring wa Galileo Galilei gaw shata zawn sha Venus mung rawt jat taw ai lam hpe sumtsan yu myiset lang nna maram yu ai.

English: Phases happen because only the side of Venus (or of the Moon) facing the Sun is lighted. The phases of Venus supported the theory of Copernicus that the planets go around the Sun.
Jinghpaw: Byin yan ni gaw byin ai hpa majaw nga yang Venus (sh Shata) a maga mi de sha Jan htoi nga ai hpe man hkrum ai. Venus a byin yan ni gaw gintawng ni gaw Jan hpe shinggrup ai ngu ai Copernicus a myit ningmu hpe wa madi shadaw da ai.

English: Then, a few years later in 1639, an English astronomer named Jeremiah Horrocks observed a transit of Venus.
Jinghpaw: Bai shaning kachyi myi na mat ai hpang shaning 1639 kaw, Jeremiah Horrocks mying ai Englik hpungtang lamu hkam jak gawt masha gaw Venus a lai sa ai lam hpe bai mu sagawn la lu ai.

English: England had experienced a long period of peace after the reconquest of the Danelaw.
Jinghpaw: England gaw Dane ni uphkang ai upadi e bai padang dip la ngut ai kaw na sim sa ai aten galu hpe hkrum sha lai wa sai re.

English: However in 991 Ethelred was faced with a Viking fleet larger than any since Guthrum's a century earlier.
Jinghpaw: Kaning rai nme law, 991 ning hta Ethelred gaw lai wa sai Guthrum a shaning ladaw shaloi na hta grau kaba ai panglai damya ni hte hkrum hkra wa ai.

English: This fleet was led by Olaf Trygvasson, a Norwegian with ambitions to reclaim his country from Danish domination.
Jinghpaw: Ndai chyang lawa ai hpung hpe Olaf Trygvasson kaw na woi awn ai, yaw shada lam kaba ai Norwegian wa gaw Danish ka'up tawn ai kaw na shi mungdan hpe bai hpyi la na matu re.

English: After initial military setbacks, Ethelred was able to agree to terms with Olaf, who returned to Norway to try to gain his kingdom with mixed success.
Jinghpaw: Shawng na hpyen dap hpang de htingnut mat ai hpang Ethelred gaw Norway mungdan de bai wa nna shi a hkawhkam mungdan hpe lapran madang awng dang lam hte bai lu la na matu shakut taw nga ai Olaf hte myit hkrum lu ai.

English: Hangeul is the only purposely invented alphabet in popular daily use. The alphabet was invented in 1444 during the reign of King Sejong (1418 – 1450).
Jinghpaw: Hangeul gaw mying gumhkawng ai shani shagu jai lang ai hta yaw shada nna gyin shalat da ai laika kanu re. Dai laika kanu hpe gaw hkawhkam Sejong uphkang ai shaning (1418-1450) lamang, shaning 1444 hta gyin shalat lai wa sai re.

English: King Sejong was the fourth king of the Joseon Dynasty and is one of the most highly regarded.
Jinghpaw: Sejong hkawhkam gaw Joseon hkaw dung ladaw a mali lang na hkawhkawm rai nna na chying hkungga ging ai hkawhkam langai rai nga ai.

English: He originally named the Hangeul alphabet Hunmin Jeongeum, which means "the correct sounds for the instruction of the people".
Jinghpaw: Hangeul laika kanu hpe Hunmin Jeongeum ngu nna mying jaw dat ai, lachyum gaw "masha ni a matsun madun lam a matu jaw ai nsen ni" rai nga ai.

English: There are many theories to how Sanskrit came into existence. One of them is about an Aryan migration from the west into India who brought their language with them.
Jinghpaw: Sanskrit gara hku nga nga wa ai lam hte seng nna myit jasat ai lam grai law wa myi nga ai. Shanhte kaw na langai myi gaw, sinna kaw na India de shanhte a a-ga ni hpe la wa ai Aryan buhkawmg htawtsit hpung langai a lam rai nga ai.

English: Sanskrit is an ancient language and is comparable to the Latin language spoken in Europe.
Jinghpaw: Sanskrit gaw moi na aga langai re nna dai hpe Uropa a Latin aga hte mai shingdaw yu ai.

English: The earliest known book in the world was written in Sanskrit. After the compilation of Upanishads, Sanskrit just faded due to hierarchy.
Jinghpaw: Mungkan hta jau dik htum ai ngu chye lu ai laika buk hpe Sanskrit hku ka da ai re. Upanishad rau pawng ngut ai hpang kaw na gaw, aya nem tsaw madang hkan ai masa a majaw Sanskrit gaw hkoi mat lai wa ai re.

English: Sanskrit is a very complex and rich language, which has served to be the source for many modern Indian languages, just like Latin is the source for European languages like French and Spanish.
Jinghpaw: Sanskrit ga gaw prat dep Kala ga hpan law law a npawt mahta ai ga, ga si grai law ai hte hkum ai a ga langai re, French hte Spanish ga zawn sha Uropa dan a ga hpan npawt madung re nga ai Latin ga zawn sha re.

English: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain.
Jinghpaw: Germani mungdan gaw France mungdan hte majan kasat ngut ai hpang Britain mungdan a zunlawng de hpyen n-gun hte shang na matu shajin ma ai.

English: Germany code-named the attack “Operation Sealion”. Most of the British Army's heavy weapons and supplies had been lost when it evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was fairly weak.
Jinghpaw: Germany ni gaw dai hpe Operation Sealion ngu shamying ma ai. Dia hpe Dunkirk kaw na yen kau ai shaloi British hpyen dap na lengnak kaba ni law malawng hten mat ai, dai majaw dai hpyen dap ni gaw chyi mi ngun yawm mat ai.

English: But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (“Kriegsmarine”) and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel.
Jinghpaw: Raitim Hkawhkam amyu a Hka dap gaw German hka dap ("Kriegsmarine") hta grau n-gun ja ai majaw Inglik maga de shana nna shang gasat na matu nmai byin chye ai.

English: However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack.
Jinghpaw: Kaning nga tim, shanhte a ningbaw ni gaw German ni a pyenli hte htim gasat na hpe hkrit ai majaw, Hkawhkam Amyu Hka dap sanghpaw ni hpe hpyen htim mai ai lam kaw loi mi shada da ma ai.

English: Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the "little brother" of Germany and Japan.
Jinghpaw: Italy a masing ni hpe sanglang dan ai lam kaw na shawng hpang wa ga. Italy gaw Germany hte Japan a madung hku na "kanau kaji" rai lai wa sai.

English: It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war.
Jinghpaw: Shanhte ni majan hpang ai hte sanghpaw nnan mali gaw shachyaw ngut ai rai tim shanhte kaw grau n-gun nrawng ai hpyen dap hte hka dap hpe lu lai wa sai.

English: Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa.
Jinghpaw: Italy ni a awngdan ai lam gaw African mungdan ni kaw re. dai mungdan ni hpe shanhte gaw masha law law hte Mediterranean panglai hpe lai nna Africa hpe aup hkang na re.

English: For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else.
Jinghpaw: De a matu, shanhte gaw British sanghpaw ni, daru ni hpe Egutu kaw na shapraw kau ra na. Dai hku hkrang shapraw ai hta, Itali a hpyen sanghpaw ni hpe hpa nan nmai galaw ai.

English: Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain.
Jinghpaw: Ya na Japan mung gaw panglai kata na Britain zawn re ai zinlawng mungdan kaji langai re.

English: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time.
Jinghpaw: Hka npu kaw chye hkawm ai sanghpaw ni gaw hka kata hkawm na matu shapraw da ai sanghpaw ni re, ngut na ngam ai aten ni hta gaw dai kaw nga nga na matu re.

English: Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range.
Jinghpaw: Hka shang sanghpaw ni hpe Mungkan Majan I hte II hta lang ma ai. Dai ten ni hta dai ni gaw grai naw lanyan nna tsan de gap shading ai lam mung shadawn sharam de naw re.

English: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.
Jinghpaw: Majan shawng maga de gaw shanhte ni panglai ntsa hku sha malawng hkrun lam hkawm ai, raitim radar hpe gin shalat hpang wa ai hte grau tup hkrak byin wa ai hte gaw hka shang sanghpaw ni hpe hka kata nmu lu shangun mayu ai majaw lang shaja wa ma ai.

English: German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines.
Jinghpaw: Germany ni a hka npu kaw hkawm ai sanghpaw ni hpe gaw U-Sanghpaw ni ngu nna shaga lai wa sai re. Germany masha ni gaw hka lam hkawm sa ai lam hte shanhte na hka shang sanghpaw hte hpyen gasat ai lam hta grai kung kyang lai wa ai re.

English: Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.
Jinghpaw: Hka shang sanghpaw hte awngdang lam lu la ai majaw, majan ngut ai hpang Germani ni hpe grai naw nga na re ngu nkam ma ai.

English: Yes! King Tutankhamun, sometimes referred to as "King Tut" or "The Boy King", is one of the most well known ancient Egyptian kings in modern times.
Jinghpaw: Rai sa! Hkaw hkam Tutankhamun hpe kalang lang hkaw hkam Tut dai nrai hkaw hkam kasha ngut tsun dan ma ai, shi gaw ya prat hta ram ram chye ai Egypt hkaw hkam ni kaw na langai re.

English: Interestingly, he was not considered to be very important in ancient times and was not recorded on most ancient king lists.
Jinghpaw: Myit shang sha hpa gaw shi hpe moi prat na aten hta grai ahkyak ai masha hku nsawn la hkrum nna moi prat na hkaw hkam jahpan hta mung n-matsing da hkrum nga ai.

English: However, the discovery of his tomb in 1922 made him a celebrity. While many tombs of the past were robbed, this tomb was left virtually undisturbed.
Jinghpaw: Hpa mi raitim 1922 hta shi a lup hpe mu sawk tam ai gaw shi hpe masha law law hpe chye wa shangun ai. Lup law law hpe lagu la nga ai laman ndai lup gaw dingbai dingna nnga ai sha ngam taw nga ai.

English: Most of the items buried with Tutankhamun have been well preserved, including thousands of artefacts made from precious metals and rare stones.
Jinghpaw: Manu dan ai gyu ni hte lung seng ni hte galaw da ai masha lang rung rai hkying hku lawm ai rai law malawng hpe Tutankhamun hta atsawm lup makoi da ai.

English: The invention of spoke wheels made Assyrian chariots lighter, faster, and better prepared to outrun soldiers and other chariots.
Jinghpaw: Spoke dingsen leng byin shalat ai Assyrian leng gaw grau tsang hkra, grau lawan hkra hpyen ni hpe atsawm shingle kau hkra hte kaga hpyen leng ni hta grau kaja hkra byin shalat da ai.

English: Arrows from their deadly crossbows could penetrate the armor of rival soldiers. About 1000 B.C., the Assyrians introduced the first cavalry.
Jinghpaw: Hkrit na zawn re ai ndan pala ni gaw hpyen wa a n-gang palawng kata du hkra lu shang ai re. 1000 B.C ram hta Assyrian ni gaw shawng na ndan sinat hpe madun lai wa sai re.

English: A cavalry is an army that fights on horseback. The saddle had not yet been invented, so the Assyrian cavalry fought on the bare backs of their horses.
Jinghpaw: Gumra dap ni gaw gumra hte hpyen kasat na matu re. Gumra hking hpe gin shalat ai lam rai nnga shi ai. Dai majaw Assyrian gumra dap ni gaw gumra ntsa hpa nlawm ai dai hku dung nna gasat ma ai.

English: We know many Greek politicians, scientists, and artists. Possibly the most known person of this culture is Homer, the legendary blind poet, who composed two masterpieces of Greek literature: the poems Iliad and Odyssey.
Jinghpaw: Anhte gaw Greek mung masa la ni, hpungtang hpaji ninghkring ni hte shingni masha law law hpe chye ai. Ndai ni kaw na chye dik masha gaw Homer,Greek laili laika hta reng dik ai ga shagawp lahkawng: Iliad hte Odyssey hpe shagawp da ai mying gumhkawng ai myi nmu ga shagawp sara re.

English: Sophocles and Aristophanes are still popular playwrights and their plays are considered to be among the greatest works of world literature.
Jinghpaw: Sophocle ni hte Aristophane ni gaw mying naw gumhkawng nga ai kamung naura ka sara ni rai nna shanhte a kamung naura ni gaw mungkan laika a hkik hkam htum ai lata bungli ni ngu na sawn la hkrum ma ai.

English: Another famous Greek is a mathematician Pythagoras, mostly known for his famous theorem about relations of the sides of right triangles.
Jinghpaw: Kaga mying gumhkawng ai Greek masha langai mi gaw shi a mying gumhkawng ai man masum jut a la hkra maga man ni matut mahkai ai lam ni hte seng nna shaleng dan ai gashawn ni a majaw law malawng e chye lai wa ai sawn hpan hpaji ninghking Pythagoras re nga ai.

English: There are varying estimates for how many people speak Hindi. It is estimated to be between the second and fourth most commonly spoken language in the world.
Jinghpaw: Masha kade ram wa mi Hindi ga hpe amyu myu hku shaga ai ngu ai hku tau sawn yu ai lam ni nga ai re. Ndai gaw mungkan hta nambat lahawng hte nambat mali law htum law malawng shaga hkrum ai ga hpan re ai ngu tau sawn da hkrum lai wa sai re.

English: The number of native speakers varies depending on whether or not very closely related dialects are counted.
Jinghpaw: Jauman ga shaga ai masha jahpan ni gaw buga ginra ga ni htep ai hta hkan nna shai mat wa ai.

English: Estimates range from 340 million to 500 million speakers, and as many as 800 million people can understand the language.
Jinghpaw: Sawn yu ai daram, ga shaga ai marai wan 340 kaw na wan 500 lapran hte wan 800 daram gaw tsun shaga ga hpe chye na ma ai.

English: Hindi and Urdu are similar in vocabulary but different in script; in everyday conversations, speakers of both languages can usually understand each other.
Jinghpaw: Hindi hte Urdu gaw ga bungai raitim laika nbung ai; ga shagu, shaga ai lahkang yang shada da chye na ma ai.

English: Around the 15th century, northern Estonia was under great cultural influence of Germany.
Jinghpaw: Tsa ban 15th daram hta, Estonia dingdung gaw Germany a htunghking grai nan ka'up da ai ten re.

English: Some German monks wanted to bring God closer to the native people, so they invented the Estonian literal language.
Jinghpaw: Nkau Germany hpunggyi ni gaw Karai Kasang hpe masha ni hte grau ni htep hkra la wa mayu ma ai, dai majaw shanhte gaw Estonian laika hpe galaw shapraw lai wa ai re.

English: It was based on the German alphabet and one character "Õ/õ" was added.
Jinghpaw: Dai hpe German laika kanu kaw na la da ai re ngut nna "Õ/õ" hpe kahtap bang da ai re.

English: As time passed, many words that were borrowed from German coalesced. This was the beginning of enlightenment.
Jinghpaw: Aten ni lai wa sai zawn, German kaw na la da ai ga ni yawng gayau wa sai. Dai gaw chye wa ai a ningpawt re.

English: Traditionally, the heir to the throne would go straight into the military after finishing school.
Jinghpaw: Jawng ngut ai hpang hkaw hkam aya hpe hpyen dap de shap da na re.

English: However, Charles went to university at Trinity College, Cambridge where he studied Anthropology and Archaeology, and later History, earning a 2:2 (a lower second class degree).
Jinghpaw: Raitim, Charles gaw Cambridge kaw na Trinity dakkasu hta Anthropology hte Archaeology hpe sharing wa sai, ngut nna hpang de labau, 2:2 (madang nem ai jam mau) hpe lu wa ai.

English: Charles was the first member of the British Royal Family to be awarded a degree.
Jinghpaw: Hkaw hkam kasha Charles gaw British hkawhkam nta masha ni kaw na shawng nnan jam mau gup lu ai wa rai nga ai.

English: European Turkey (eastern Thrace or Rumelia in the Balkan peninsula) includes 3% of the country.
Jinghpaw: Europa na Turkey (Balkan zundawn na sinpraw Thrace Rumelia) gaw mungdan a 3% lawm ai.

English: The territory of Turkey is more than 1,600 kilometres (1,000 mi) long and 800 km (500 mi) wide, with a roughly rectangular shape.
Jinghpaw: Turkey madu ai ginwang ni gaw 1,600 kilometers (1,000 mi) galu nna 800 km (500 mi) hta grau dam nga nna rectangular hkrang zawn rai nga ai.

English: Turkey's area, including lakes, occupies 783,562 square kilometres (300,948 sq mi), of which 755,688 square kilometres (291,773 sq mi) are in south west Asia and 23,764 square kilometres (9,174 sq mi) in Europe.
Jinghpaw: Nawng ni ma lawm, Turkey mungdan a shara gaw, 783,562 square kilometres (300,948 sq mi) kaba ai re nna, 755,562 square kilometres (291,773 sq mi) gaw Asia dan a dingda sinna maga re nhktawm 23,764 square kilometres (9,174 sq mi) gaw Europe maga hkran de re.

English: Turkey's area makes it the world's 37th-largest country, and is about the size of Metropolitan France and the United Kingdom combined.
Jinghpaw: Turkey shara gaw mungkan hta 37th kaba dik re, ngut nna dai gaw Metropolitan France hte the United Kingdom pawng da ai daram re.

English: Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.
Jinghpaw: Turkey mungdan hpe panglai masum gaw shinggrup tawn ai: sinna maga de gaw Aegean panglai, ding dung maga de gaw Panglai Chyang hte dingda maga de gaw Hkarang panglai ni rai nga ai.

English: Luxembourg has a long history but its independence dates from 1839.
Jinghpaw: Luxembourg gaw grai galu ai ahtik labau lu ai rai timung shi a shang lawt lu ai nhtoi hpang ai gaw shaning 1839 kaw na she re.

English: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
Jinghpaw: Belgium na ya aten ni gaw Luxembourg na moi na aten ni re raitim Belgian gaw shaning 1830 Belgian Revolution hpang byin wa ai re.

English: Luxembourg has always tried to remain a neutral country but it was occupied in both World War I and World War II by Germany.
Jinghpaw: Luxembourg gaw galoi mung ka-ang ai mungdan langai hku nga shakut ai, raitim Mungkan Majan I hte Mungkan Majan II hta gaw Germany ni shi hpe aup hkang wa sai.

English: In 1957 Luxembourg became a founding member of the organization which is today known as the European Union.
Jinghpaw: Shaning 1957 hta Luxembourg gaw dai ni Uropa Munghpawm ngu mying ai uhpung uhpawng a gaw sharawt hpung malawm byin wa sai re.

English: The Drukgyal Dzong is a ruined fortress and Buddhist monastery in the upper part of the Paro District (in Phondey Village).
Jinghpaw: Drukgyal Dzong gaw hten mat sai numhkap dap ba hte Paro ginwang a ntsa daw kaw na Budha hpungki jawng gaw (Phondey mare kaw) re nga ai.

English: It is said that in 1649, Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel created the fortress to commemorate his victory against the Tibetan-Mongol forces.
Jinghpaw: Dai gaw shaning 1649 hta, Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel gaw Tibentan-Mongol ni hpe dang wa ai hpe bai myit dum na matu dai dap hpe galaw wa ai re.

English: In 1951, a fire caused for only some of the relics of the Drukgyal Dzong to remain, such as the image of Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal.
Jinghpaw: Shaning 1951 kaw gaw, wan gaw Drukgyal Dzong a sali wunli nkau myi sha, Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal a sumla jawn re ai ni hpe sha ngam mat hkra galaw lai wa sai.

English: After the fire, the fortress was preserved and protected, remaining to be one of Bhutan's most sensational attractions.
Jinghpaw: Wan hkru katut ai hpang dai ninghkap dap ba hpe Bhutan a labau shang ai myit agang shara langai rai wa hkra atsawm sha kyem zing makawp maga da ma ai.

English: During the 18th century Cambodia found itself squeezed between two powerful neighbors, Thailand and Vietnam.
Jinghpaw: 18th century hta Cambodia gaw mungdan kaba lahkang Thailand hte Vietnam lapran kaw na shi hkrai shapru wa ai.

English: The Thais invaded Cambodia several times in the 18th century and in 1772 they destroyed Phnom Phen.
Jinghpaw: Thai masha ni gaw tsa ban 18 hta Cambodia mungdan hpe hpyen n-gun hte grai lang shang gasat wa sai, 1772 ning hta Phnom Phen hpe jahten kau ma sai.

English: In the last years of the 18th century the Vietnamese also invaded Cambodia.
Jinghpaw: Tsa ban 18 jahtum na shaning ni hta Vietnam gaw Cambodia de hpyen n-gun hte shang gasat ai.

English: Eighteen percent of Venezuelans are unemployed, and most of those who are employed work in the informal economy.
Jinghpaw: Venezuelan a tsa lam shadang shi matsat gaw bungli nnga ma ai, dai kaw na malawng gaw tara nshang ai bungli dabang hkan bungli shang ma ai.

English: Two thirds of Venezuelans who work do so in the service sector, nearly a quarter work in industry and a fifth work in agriculture.
Jinghpaw: Venezuela masha yawng kaw na law malawng gaw lajang ya ai bungli hta galaw ma ai, nkau mi gaw rai ni shapraw ai kaw galaw ma ai ngut nna kaang hkup gaw hkai lau hkai sha bungli hta galaw ma ai.

English: An important industry for Venezuelans is oil, where the country is a net exporter, even though only one percent work in the oil industry.
Jinghpaw: Venezuela masha ni a ahkyak ai jak rung langai gaw sau shapraw ai re, sau jak rung gaw tsa lam shadang langai sha nga tim mungdan jashang gunrai ni hta na grau ai mungdan shapraw gunrai re.

English: Early in the nation's independence, Singapore Botanic Gardens' expertise helped to transform the island into a tropical Garden City.
Jinghpaw: Mungdan shang lawt lu ai a shawng daw de, Singapore hpun kawa hpaji hte seng ai nam pan sun a kungkyang ai ni gaw dai zinlawng hpe kahtet ai nam pan sun mare de galai shai lu wa hkra garum ya lai wa sai re.

English: In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, an orchid hybrid, was chosen as the nation's national flower.
Jinghpaw: Shaning 1981 hta Vanda Miss Joaquim, hpan kayau wa madai pan hpe mungdan a myu sha nam pan hku lata masat da sai.

English: Every year around October nearly 1.5 million herbivores travel towards the southern plains, crossing the Mara River, from the northern hills for the rains.
Jinghpaw: Hpun lap sha dusat wan 1.5 ram gaw shaning shagu marang ra ai majaw dingdung kawng mayan kaw na Mara Hka nu lai di nna dingda pa layang de hkawm sa ma ai.

English: And then back to the north through the west, once again crossing the Mara river, after the rains in around April.
Jinghpaw: Dai hpang sinna maga hpe laidi nna dingdung maga bai wa ai shaloi, kalang bai Mara hka nu hpe shata man mali shata hkan na marang tawng ai hpang bai rap lai ra na re.

English: The Serengeti region contains the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.
Jinghpaw: Serengeti ginwang kaw Tanzania na Maswa Ginsup Ginra, Ngorongoro Gawn hkang Ginra hte Seregeti Myusha Nampan sun hte Kenya kaw Maasai Mara Myusha Ginra ni lawm ai.

English: Learning to create interactive media requires conventional and traditional skills, as well as tools mastered in interactive classes (storyboarding, audio and video editing, story telling, etc.)
Jinghpaw: Hti htang akyu jaw ai shi ga dap hpe shalat shapraw na matu hka ja la ai lam hta htung lai hkan ai hte htung hking hte seng ai hpaji kunglet ai lam, hti htang akyu jaw ai lam hte seng ai jawng gawk kata na hkingrai ni hpe kung kyang ai lam (sumla ni hte seng ai lam hpe zinlum ai lam, nsen hte sumla hkrung hpe jep shagrin ai lam hte mau mwi tsun ai lam) ni hpe ra ahkyak nga ai.

English: Interactive design requires that you re-assess your assumptions about media production and learn to think in a non-linear ways.
Jinghpaw: Nang media shapraw ai lam hpe nang maram masam da ai lam hpe nang bai jep maram na hte dingyang lam hku nre ai baw myit na matu kahti galai shalat maka gaw ra nga ai.

English: Interactive design requires that components of a project connect to each other, but also make sense as a separate entity.
Jinghpaw: Hti htang akyu jaw ai shalat maka ni gaw masing ni hpe langai hte langai matut mahkai na matu dawchyen ni ra nga ai raitimung garan ai hku kri namta ni zawn mung akyu pru nga ai.

English: The disadvantage of zoom lenses is that the focal complexity and number of lens elements required to achieve a range of focal lengths is much greater than for prime lenses.
Jinghpaw: Sumla ni hkra, tsan hkra galaw ya ai jan nhpai ni a nkaja ai akyu gaw maju jung yak ai lam, jan nhpai law law ra ai lam ni rai nga ai.

English: This is becoming less of an issue as lens manufacturers achieve higher standards in lens production.
Jinghpaw: Man balu galaw ai lam hta awngdan tsaw ai hte maren dai kaw manghkang ni yawm wa ai.

English: This has allowed zoom lenses to produce pictures of a quality comparable to that achieved by lenses with fixed focal length.
Jinghpaw: Ndai gaw ka'ang galu masat da ai pat nhpai hte rau ningja rawng shadawn la mai ai sumla ni hpe shapraw lu na matu zoom pat nhpai ni bang da ai.

English: Another disadvantage of zoom lenses is that the maximum aperture (the speed) of the lens is usually lower.
Jinghpaw: Laga grau kaba mai ai rai na nkaja ai lam gaw kaba dik (lawan) ai rai gaw nkaja ai re.

English: This makes inexpensive zoom lenses hard to use in low-light conditions without a flash.
Jinghpaw: Ndai lam ni gaw manu hkyem sa ai sumla ni tsan galaw ai pat ni hpe nsin shau ai masa hta kemara kaprip wan nlawm ai sha lang na matu yak shangun ai re.

English: One of the most common problems when trying to convert a movie to DVD format is the overscan.
Jinghpaw: Sumla hkrung langai hpe DVD hkrang de galai na matu shakut ai shaloi, law malawng madung re ai manghkang langai mi gaw, kompyuta hte sumla dem shakap shalai mat ai lam rai nga ai.

English: Most televisions are made in a way to please the general public.
Jinghpaw: TV lamang law malawng gaw yu maya masha ni hpe shapyaw na matu sha lajang da ai.

English: For that reason, everything you see on the TV had the borders cut, top, bottom and sides.
Jinghpaw: Dai madi madun ai a matu, nang TV kaw mu ai lam yawng gaw shi shingwang kata rep, lahta, npu, maga ga de ni sha re.

English: This is made to ensure that the image covers the whole screen. That is called overscan.
Jinghpaw: Pat man ting hta dai sumla atsawm mu na matu ndai hpe shateng galaw da ai. Dai hpe scan lai ai nga ma ai.

English: Unfortunately, when you make a DVD, it's borders will most likely be cut too, and if the video had subtitles too close to the bottom, they won't be fully shown.
Jinghpaw: Gam nkaja ai hku, nang DVD galaw ai shaloi, shi a makau ndung ni hpe di kau na zawn re nga ai hte lama na sumla hkrung kaw laika madun ai shaloi npu de grai kap taw nna shanhte hpe yawng nmai madun na ra ai.

English: The traditional medieval castle has long inspired the imagination, conjuring up images of jousts, banquets and Arthurian chivalry.
Jinghpaw: Htung hking hte seng ai ka-ang prat na lang gyi ni kaw myit n-gun lu na myit nshat, marai lahkawng gumra jawn let gasat hkat ai, hkik hkam ai lu sha lamang ni hte Hkaw Hkam Arthur a share shagan ai lam hpe shingran pra mu lu hkra galaw da ai lam ni law law nga nga ai.

English: Even standing amidst thousand year-old ruins it is easy to bring to mind the sounds and smells of battles long gone, to almost hear the clatter of hooves on the cobbles and to smell the fear rising from the dungeon pits.
Jinghpaw: Moi shaning hking hku kaw na chyahten re ni lapran kaw tsap taw yang moi na hpyen kasat wa ai ntsen hte shingran ni hpe bai lu na re, nlung lam kaw lam hkawm ai zawn ntsen ni ngut nna ga hku kaw na pru wa ai shingran zawn re ni pi lu wa na daram re.

English: But is our imagination based on reality? Why were castles built in the first place? How were they designed and built?
Jinghpaw: Raitim, anhte a myit ai lam ni gaw ta tut mabyin hta mahta ai re kun? Langchyi ni hpe hpa rai nambat langai shara hta gaw gap lai wa ai kun? Shanhte gara hku shalat maka ni galaw nna gaw gap ma ai kun?

English: Typical for the period, Kirby Muxloe Castle is more of a fortified house than a true castle.
Jinghpaw: Kaja aten hta, Kirby Muxloe Castle gaw castle majing ni hta pi grau hkrak ai re.

English: Its large glazed windows and thin walls would not have been able to resist a determined attack for long.
Jinghpaw: Dai a kaba ai pat hku hte hpa ai bunghku gaw atsawm myit shatawng gasat ai hpe na na hkam jan lu na nre.

English: In the 1480s, when its construction was begun by Lord Hastings, the country was relatively peaceful and defense was only required against small bands of roving marauders.
Jinghpaw: 1480 ning hta, ndai gaw sharawt lam hpe Lord Hastings wa e woi galaw hpang wa ai shaloi gaw ndai mungdan kaw gaw simsa lam nga wa nna shim lum lam a matu gaw ajawt hkawm nna sa hkawm ai masha uhpung kaji ni hpe dinghkap gasat ra lai wa ai re.

English: The balance of power was a system in which European nations sought to maintain the national sovereignty of all European states.
Jinghpaw: Daru magam rap ra lam ngu ai gaw Uropa mungdan ni yawng a awmdawm daru magam lu na matu jai lang ai lai ladat rai nga ai.

English: The concept was that all European nations had to seek to prevent one nation from becoming powerful, and thus national governments often changed their alliances in order to maintain the balance.
Jinghpaw: Ndai lai ladat a ningmu gaw Uropa mungdan yawng hta na mungdan langai ngai n-gun ja, shingkang shingwang lu wa na hpe tau hkrau makawp maga nhtawm, mungdan Asuya ni hku nna yawng rap rap ra ra byin tai na matu tinang mungdan a jinghku mungdan hpe loi hkring hkring galai na hku rai nga ai.

English: The War of Spanish Succession marked the first war whose central issue was the balance of power.
Jinghpaw: Spain a Majan dang hkring htawng dagraw ai lam gaw shawng nna majan hta gin jaw a masing re ai ahkang aya shingdaw shangang ai lam hpe masat da sai.

English: This marked an important change, as European powers would no longer have the pretext of being religious wars. Thus, the Thirty Years' War would be the last war to be labeled a religious war.
Jinghpaw: European ngun ni gaw dai makam masham majan a nkaja ai lam ni nga ai zawn dai gaw ahkyak ai langai rai wa sai. Dai majaw, shaning sumshi majan gaw makam masham majan a hpang chyhtum rai wa sai re.

English: The temple of Artemis at Ephesus was destroyed on July 21, 356 BCE in an act of arson committed by Herostratus.
Jinghpaw: Ephesus kaw na Artemis nawku jawng gaw shata ma hkru 21 ya, 356 BCE hta Herostratus e galaw shut hpyit lai wa ai wan nat ai amu kaw jahten jaza hkrum lai wa sai re.

English: According to the story, his motivation was fame at any cost. The Ephesians, outraged, announced that Herostratus' name never be recorded.
Jinghpaw: Dai mau mwi hku tsun ga nga yang, shi myit rawt ai lam gaw kaja nan mying gumhkawng lai wa sai. Ephesians gaw maroi nni ai hte Herostratus ngu ai mying hpe galoi nna yu ai nga ndau dat ai.

English: The Greek historian Strabo later noted the name, which is how we know today. The temple was destroyed on the same night that Alexander the Great was born.
Jinghpaw: Greek labau ka sara Strabo gaw hpang e mying ni hpe matsing da lai wa sai, dai gaw ndai prat hta anhte gara hku na chye la lu lam rai nga ai. Nawku jawng gaw Alexender the Great shangai ai shana kaw sha jahten shabyak kau ai hkrum lai wa sai.

English: Alexander, as king, offered to pay to rebuild the temple, but his offer was denied. Later, after Alexander died, the temple was rebuilt in 323 BCE.
Jinghpaw: Alexander gaw hkawhkam langai hku na nawku htingnu gaw gap na ga gumhpraw jaw na matu tsun ai raitimung shi tsun ai ni hpe ningdang kau ya ma ai. Dai hpang, Alexander si mat ai hpang, shaning 323 BCE kaw nawku htingnu hpe bai gaw gap lai wa sai re.

English: Make sure your hand is as relaxed as possible while still hitting all the notes correctly - also try not to make much extraneous motion with your fingers.
Jinghpaw: Nang na lata hpe yungwi nsi note ni yawng hpe jaw hkra dum ai shaloi mai byin ai daram shayawm da na matu sadi u. bai nna nang na lata layung ni hpe tingtawk nseng n-ang ai hkam sha lam ni nlaw na matu mung shakut u.

English: This way, you will tire yourself out as little as possible. Remember there's no need to hit the keys with a lot of force for extra volume like on the piano.
Jinghpaw: Ndai ladat gaw, na hkum nang gau ngwi gau gwi hki ba shangun na re. Piano kaw nsen shaja na matu ja ja dip ra ai zawn gaw Jaw hpe n-gun law law hte ndip ra ai hpe dum u.

English: On the accordion, to get extra volume, you use the bellows with more pressure or speed.
Jinghpaw: Accordion madum sumpyi hta nsen shaja na matu bellow ni hpe n-gun grau shadat nna (sh) grau lawan ai hku pat let dum ra ai.

English: Mysticism is the pursuit of communion with, identity with, or conscious awareness of an ultimate reality, divinity, spiritual truth, or God.
Jinghpaw: Wenyi masa gaw poi daw sha ai lam hkan galaw ai, teng sha Karai a hpung shingkang, wenyi lam ni hpe ta tut hkan sa ai lam rai nga ai.

English: The believer seeks a direct experience, intuition, or insight into divine reality/the deity or dieties.
Jinghpaw: Kam sham ai ni gaw Nat (sh) nat shayi ni a mau na zawn re ai shingra tara ni hpe tatuk hkrum kadut na matu, chye chyang ai lam lu na matu (sh) myithtoi nyan lu na matu sawk tam ma ai.

English: Followers pursue certain ways of living, or practices that are intended to nurture those experiences.
Jinghpaw: Nampan ni gaw lai nli re ai kan bau lam hpe hkan shachyut ai (sh) shaman ai a madung gaw dai mahkrun madup ni hpe bau maka na matu re.

English: Mysticism can be distinguished from other forms of religious belief and worship by its emphasis on the direct personal experience of a unique state of consciousness, particularly those of a peaceful, insightful, blissful, or even ecstatic character.
Jinghpaw: Wenyi masa hpe gaw laga nawku htung hte seng ai makam hpan ni hte laklai re ai mabyin masa hpe dingtawk re ai tingkyen mahkrum madup a machye machyang hte alak myi re nna ngwi pyaw sim sa ai, myi htoi nyan lu ai lam, grai kabu pyaw ai lam kajawng kaja atsam n-gun lu wa ai laklai kumla zawn pyi re ai ni hpe nawku daw jau ai lam hpan ni kaw na mai garan ginghka la mai nga ai.

English: Sikhism is a religion from the Indian sub-continent. It originated in the Punjab region during the 15th century from a sectarian split within the Hindu tradition.
Jinghpaw: Sikhs htung gaw Kala dan daw na makam masham langai re. Dai gaw tsa ban 15th laman Hindu htung hking kata uhpung garan mat ai kaw na Punjab ginra kaw na madung pru wa ai re.

English: Sikhs consider their faith to be a separate religion from Hinduism though they acknowledge its Hindu roots and traditions.
Jinghpaw: Sikhs gaw Hindu makam hkring htawng hpe hkam la da tim Hindu htung hking kaw na nbung ai makam masham hpung langai ngu sa ai.

English: Sikhs call their religion Gurmat, which is Punjabi for "way of the guru". The guru is a fundamental aspect of all Indian religions but in Sikhism has taken on an importance that forms the core of Sikh beliefs.
Jinghpaw: Sikhs ni gaw shanhte a nawku hpung hpe Punjabi na "hpung sara ni a lam" re nga ai Gurmat ngu shaga tsun ma ai. Hindu, Sikh hung sara ni gaw India nawku hpung ni yawng a rudi npawt dawsang rai nga ai raitimung Sikh nawku hpung kaw gaw Sikh makam masham a grai ahkyak ai hkrang kumla pru na matu la kau ai rai ma ai.
