Jinghpaw: Shara law law masa gaw labau shang nta dingsa langai hte moi moi na manu dan ai rai ni hte nta hkinghku shachying tawn ai lam, lamu ga ni hpe lamyin rep shatsawm ai lam hte hka hpung yawt hka lawng ni hte mai byin wa ai.

English: Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity.
Jinghpaw: Madu a mawdaw hte hkrun lam galu sa ai lam gaw grai sang lang ai myit kata kaw nna ra sharawng ai lam re.

English: Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations.
Jinghpaw: Madaw kaba zawn nre sha, na madaw hpe nang atsawm chye gau taw sai re majaw de a shadawn masat hpe chye u.

English: Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention.
Jinghpaw: Shara laga kaw nta kasha galaw ai dai nrai myit shang sha nra ai ni hpe myu shagu hta aloi sha lu galaw ai.

English: In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to "camp".
Jinghpaw: Kadun ai hku tsun ga nga yang, sumtsan bu hkawm ai lam hpe na a mawdaw hte sa yang gaw hkrak ai raitim, camp sa na matu gaw kalang marang n hkrak chye ai.

English: Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down.
Jinghpaw: Lama na nang dung lahkum mai jahkrat ai minivan kaba, SUV, Sedan (sh) Station Wagon ni lu ai re yang mawdaw kaw yup nna bu hkawm ai lam mai galaw nga ai.

English: Some hotels have a heritage from the golden age of steam railways and ocean liners; before the Second World War, in the 19th or early 20th centuries.
Jinghpaw: Manam jarawp nkau mi gaw tsa ban 19 (sh) 20 ning jau jau hkan Mungkan Majan Nambat Lahkawng n hpang shi ai ten, salu n-gun hte gau ai wanleng lam ni hte nammuk dara rap sanghpaw ni nga ai ja prat na sali wunli ni hpe lu la da ai re.

English: These hotels were where the rich and the famous of the day would stay, and often had fine dining and nightlife.
Jinghpaw: Dai manam jarik ni gaw lutsu ai ngut nna mying kaba ai shani kaw nga wa ai shara kaw nga ai re, ngut nna dai kaw shana shat ni kaja ai ngut nna shana mung grai pyaw ai re.

English: The old fashioned fittings, the lack of the latest amenities, and a certain graceful agedness are also part of their character.
Jinghpaw: Moi na mawn sumli hking, hpang jahtum pru ra sharawng na zawn re ai arung arai n-nga ai lam hte ningja rawng nna laklai ai ugut gu ai lam ni mung shahte a sari sadang nkau myi rai nga ai.

English: While they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other dignitaries.
Jinghpaw: Shanhte gaw shanhte nan ayan na dinghkrai hku na madu da ai lam ni nga tim kalang lang gaw shanhte ni mungdan a ningbaw ni hte arawng aya nga ai ni hpang de sa chyai na myit shalawm ma ai.

English: A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.
Jinghpaw: Gumhpraw law law hte hkrum lam hkawm yang mungkan ting hpe nbungli hte sha sa nna, manam jarik law law hta nga na re.

English: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit.
Jinghpaw: Galai yu gawn ai zinghkri ngu ai gaw buga na bu hkawm ni shanhte sa chyai ai shara ni hpe lapran na matut mahkai ya ai uhpung uhpawng langai re.

English: Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification.
Jinghpaw: Kaga nkau internet hkridun ni kaw gaw shajan tengman ai lam madun ai lam ni galaw ra ai rai tim law malawng gaw dai zawn re ai internet hkridun de matut mahkai na re yang internet kaw na jahpan hpe sha ka chyahpring na sha ra ai.

English: A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers.
Jinghpaw: Hkap tau la ai ni a jahpang hpe kalang lang hkum lam hkawm ai ni a madi shadaw laika ni hte shaw da ai laika dai nrai onlin hta lajang da ya ma ai.

English: Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay.
Jinghpaw: Komputa lamang galaw ai wa Casey Fenton gaw Iceland de sa na nbungli gaw manu hkyemsa ai hpe mu tam ai, raitim nga shara nmu tam ai hpang 2004 January shata hta Couchsurfing hpe gin shapraw dat sai.

English: He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.
Jinghpaw: Shi gaw buga dakkasu kaw na jawngma ni hpe email sa dat ai, dai hpang nga shara majoi mai nga na hte seng na msha grai nan she law hkra hpyi shawn wa ai hpe hkamla lu la ai.

English: Hostels cater primarily to young people – a typical guest is in their twenties – but you can often find older travellers there too.
Jinghpaw: Jarawp ni gaw madung hku na ramma ni a matu lajang ya ai - shawoi na manam langai gaw shanhte hkun hta lawm ai - raitim nang gaw hkrun lam hkawm ai asak kaba masha ni hpe mung dai hta jahkring hkring mu ai.

English: Families with children are a rare sight, but some hostels do allow them in private rooms.
Jinghpaw: Ma nga ai dinghku ni gaw yu hpa shara atsawm nmu ma ai, raitim jarawp nkau mi gaw shanhte hpe laksan gawk ni hta nga na ahkang jaw ma ai.

English: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics.
Jinghpaw: Miwa mungdan a Beijing muklum gaw 2022 na Olympic Nshung ta Ginsup poi a nta madu re na re, ndai mungdan gaw ginhtawng hte nshung ta Olympics lahkawng hpe nta madu hku hkam la ai shawng nnan mare kaba re wa na re.

English: Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events.
Jinghpaw: Beijing kaw gaw hpawng hpaw hte hpawng ginchyum dat lamang hpe galaw na re nna nta kata kaw hkyen jawn ai lamang hpe ma galaw wa na re.

English: Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.
Jinghpaw: Laga skiing lamang ni hpe Beijing hte 220 km daram tsan ai Zhangjiakou shara kaw galaw na re.

English: Most of the temples do have an Annual festival starting from November end to Mid of May, which varies according to each temple's annual calendar.
Jinghpaw: Nawku jawng law malawng gaw November kaw na May shata ka-ang hkra Shaning shagu na lamang nga ai re nna nbung ai nawku jawng shagu hta mahta nna shaning shagu na ladaw shana ni mung nbung ma ai.

English: Most of the temple festivals is celebrated as part of temple's anniversary or presiding deity's birthday or any other major event associated with the temple.
Jinghpaw: Nawku jawng law malawng a poi hpe jawng a shaning hpring langai ngai (sh) dai nawku jawng a lamu kasa num a shangai nhtoi (sh) nawku jawng hte seng ai poi lamang ni hta galaw ma ai.

English: Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting to see, with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.
Jinghpaw: Kerala nawku jawng gaw magoi sumla ni hte mawn nna yung ngoi lamang ngut nna lang lamang ni hte grai yu pyaw ai re.

English: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences.
Jinghpaw: A mungkan lamang (mungkan hpe sang lang ai ngu mung sha ga ai, dai nrai Expo) gaw mungkan ting hkang hte hpaji lamang re.

English: Participating countries present artistic and educational displays in national pavilions to showcase world issues or their country's culture and history.
Jinghpaw: Shingni hte seng ai hta shang lawm ai mungdan ni hte laili laika ni hte myu sha lam yan galaw ai shara kaw shanhte a mungdan na htunghking ni hte labau ni hpe madun dan lai wa masai.

English: International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants.
Jinghpaw: Mungdan ga daga de seng nna Horticultural hte seng ai shaleng dan ai lam ni gaw nampan kasi madun ai lam, hpun kawa hte seng ai nampan sun hte hpun kawa ni hte seng ai galaw na lam amyu myu hpe madun dan ai lamang hpe laksan hkaja lai wa sai re.

English: Although in theory they can take place annually (so long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not.
Jinghpaw: Myit masat hta gaw shanhte ni shaning shagu lu galaw ai re tim mung (shanhte ni nbung ai mungdan ni kaw nga taw ai majaw grai na ai) tatut hta gaw shanhte ni nlu galaw ai.

English: These events normally last anywhere between three and six months, and are held on sites no smaller than 50 hectares.
Jinghpaw: Shawoi hku na ndai lamang ni gaw shata masum hte kru lapran shara shagu hta na chye ai, dai lamang hpe hekta 50 hta n yawm ai shara ni hta galaw lai wa sai.

English: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest.
Jinghpaw: Shingning law law hta nbung ai sumla hkrung gayet ai hkrang ni hpe jai lang wa sai. Kasi madang 35 mm sumla hkrung (24 mm negative kawn 36) gaw malawng grau lang ma ai.

English: It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR.
Jinghpaw: Ndai ni gaw nang ma mat ai rai tim aloi sha bai mai chyahpring nga ai rai nna DSLR hte shingdaw nna mahtai lu jaw nga ai.

English: Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative.
Jinghpaw: Nkau camera kasha ni gaw 6 by 6 cm format hpe lang ma ai, 56 by 56 mm negative gaw grau hkrak ai re.

English: This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).
Jinghpaw: Ndai gaw 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 hte 864) hta na htam mali daram dan leng ai lam nga ai.

English: Wildlife is among the most challenging motifs for a photographer, and needs a combination of good luck, patience, experience and good equipment.
Jinghpaw: Nam dusat ni gaw sumla gayet ai ni a matu myit grai sang sha ai lam re, ngut nna gam kaja ai, myit galu ai, mahkrum madup ngut nna rai kaja ni mung ra ai re.

English: Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words.
Jinghpaw: Nam dusat dumyeng sumla gayet ai lam gaw manu grai hkrak ai, raitim sumla gayet ai lam hpe law malawng tsun ai gaw, sumla langai gaw ga si hkying mi hte dan ai.

English: Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, though things like a flock of birds or a tiny creature need other lenses.
Jinghpaw: Dusat dumyen sumla gayet ai hpaji hta u hpung mi dusat kaji ai hku hpan da ai baw zawn re ni hpe kaga pat nhpai baw hte mai gayet tim, ayan na galu ai baw sin-yu sumla pat nhpai gaw ra nga ai.

English: Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photographs for commercial purposes.
Jinghpaw: Laklai nna tsam ai dusat ni hpe mu tam na matu yak la nga ai re nna nampan sun ni gaw kalang marang gaw hpaga yumga a matu yaw shada nna sumla gayet ai lam a matu rit kawp tara ni hpe chyahkrat da chye ai.

English: Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile.
Jinghpaw: Nam kaw na dusat dumyeng ni gaw gaya chye ai (sh) jahte tam chye ma ai. Makau grup yin masa ni gaw katsi ai, kahtet ai (sh) kaga hku nga yang hpyen tai chye nga ai.

English: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers.
Jinghpaw: Mungkan gaw nbung ai ga hpan 5,000 ram nga nna, wan 50 tsun ai ga grau ai hte re hpan hkun hta grau nna lawm ai re.

English: Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly.
Jinghpaw: Laika ka da ai ga si ni gaw shaga ai ga si ni hta grau chye na loi ai. Grau nna gaw ndai gaw grai jaw ai ga re, chye na hkra nsen shapraw na yak nga ai.

English: Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people.
Jinghpaw: Mungdan law malawng gaw Inglik ga hpe hkrak chye ma ai, ngut na machye machyang mung chyoi ai - grau nna gaw asak kaji ai ramma ni rai nga ai.

English: Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto.
Jinghpaw: Shingran yu ga, nang kam yang, Mancun masha, Boston masha, Jamaica masha hte Sydney masha ni arau Toronto kaw nga ai lusha seng langai hta shana shat arau dung sha taw nga ai.

English: They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.
Jinghpaw: Shanhte gaw shada da shanhte a dai daw buga na mau mwi ni hkai nna shanhte a lak lai ai ga nsen hte tsun sha a taw ma ai.

English: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get fed. Without cooking opportunities, choices are however limited to ready-made food.
Jinghpaw: Gat seng kaba hkan malu masha ni mari la na sha ai gaw manu hpa dik htum re. Shadu sha na ahkaw ahkang nnga yang gaw, ready-made lusha ni sha sha ra na malawng ai.

English: Increasingly supermarkets are getting a more varied section of ready-made food. Some even provide a microwave oven or other means to heat food.
Jinghpaw: Gat seng kaba ni gaw alu tsu re lusha hpang law law grau nna law lu wa ma ai. Nkau hkan gaw lawan shadu myihprap wanhtung lajang ya ma ai nkau hkan gaw lu sha hpe shalum sha na matu re.

English: In some countries or types of stores there is at least one on-site restaurant, often a rather informal one with affordable prices.
Jinghpaw: Mungdan nkau mi kaw nga ai seng kaba kata hkan dang di lu ai manu hte dut ya ai lusha seng yawm htum seng langai nga ai.

English: Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you.
Jinghpaw: Na a asak pahkam hkrang tara ni hte rau pahkam hkam ya ai wa hpe matut mahkai mai na ahkri ahkrai ni hpe atsawm galaw da na dai laika ni a kanan ni hpe mung gun hkawm u.

English: They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims.
Jinghpaw: Shanhte gaw hpyi lajin lam galaw ai hte hpaji jaw/ahkaw hkang jaw na matu mungkan ga daga hte seng ai ga shaga jak nambat hte pahkam hkam ai wa a e-mail hkringdat hpe madun ra na.

English: Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the "cloud").
Jinghpaw: Na rungrai bang ai baw hte online kaw kanan langai tawn u (na email kaw dai hpe kapyawn sa u (sh) "clooud" kaw zing da u).

English: If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet).
Jinghpaw: Lama laptop (sh) tablet hte hkrun lam hkawm yang, de a memory (sh) jak pa (internet nlu tim mai lang ai) hta kanan bang lang u.

English: Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help.
Jinghpaw: Polisi/matut mahkai hkring dat kanan ni hpe dum nta de bai wa na rau manaw manang ni hte jinghku ni shing nrai, manang ni hpe karum na matu mung jaw da u.

English: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat.
Jinghpaw: Shan krang kaba (zau nyi kaba ngu mung chye da ai) gaw mi kaw nna jahte ntam chye ma ai, raitim shanhte hpe jahkrit shama wa yang gaw bai htim wa chye ai.

English: When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.
Jinghpaw: Masha ni shan krang kaba hpe hkrit hpa re ai ngu nmu mada na makau de nau shani sa yang shanhte ni hkrit hpa hkrum sha chye ai.

English: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important.
Jinghpaw: Tsa lawm lu hpa ni hpe shadawn sharam hte lu u. Tsa chyaru gaw masha shagu hpe nbung ai hku akyu jaw nga ai rai nna nang na masat shadang hpe chye ai lam gaw grai ahkyak nga ai.

English: Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol.
Jinghpaw: Grai lai nna tsa lu ai lam kaw na aten galu hkamja lam hta byin mai ai mabyin ni kaw gaw sin hten za ai lam hte myi nmu mat ai mung lawm nna si hkrum si htan du wa hkra lawm nga ai. Mai byin ai hkrit tsang hpa ni gaw tara nshang ai hku shapraw tawn ai tsa ni hpe lu sha ai shaloi grau law wa ai.

English: Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.
Jinghpaw: Tara hte nhtan shai ai wenyi ni gaw kaji timung myi di ai (sh) si ai hpe shabyin chye ai methanol lawm ai hkrit tsang ra ai nsan nseng ai baw amyu myu lawm nga chye ai.

English: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower.
Jinghpaw: Myit set ni gaw maigan mungdan hkan gaw manu hkyem sa na re, grau nna gaw bungli galaw manu jahpu shau nna shang gumhpraw manu nkaba ai mungdan re nga ai.

English: Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere.
Jinghpaw: Myi jep ai lam hpe nta kaw galaw ai rai yang, grau nna gaw pahkam gumhpraw ram ai rai yang, shara mi kaw tsi matsun hpe mai galaw la ai.

English: High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.
Jinghpaw: Ndai shara kaw nga ai mying kaba ai brand ni hpe sadi ra ai lam lahkawng nga ai. Nkau mi gaw nau njet ai arai ni mai byin nna, nkau jet ai arai ni chyawm gaw nta kaw nga ai arai hta nan grau hpu chye ma ai.

English: Coffee is one of the world's most traded commodities, and you can probably find many types in your home region.
Jinghpaw: Kahpi gaw mungkan hta hpaga yumga ga dik htum ai hpaga rai langai mi re nna nang na buga ginra hkan mung hpan amyu myu hpe nang mu lu na re.

English: Nevertheless, there are many distinctive ways of drinking coffee around the world that are worth experiencing.
Jinghpaw: Shingrai timung, mungkan ntsa hta chye ging ai kahpi lu ai ladat amyu myu lak lai hkra nga ai.

English: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water.
Jinghpaw: Canyoning ((sh) canyoneering) ginsup hpan gaw hka hpring taw ai (sh) hkun hkraw ai hkrung sinwa htum pa du hkra sa ra ai baw re.

English: Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).
Jinghpaw: Canyoning gaw hka hpung yawt ai, bum lung bum yu ai zawn re ni hpe gahkin ginsup ai lam re - raitim nnan hpang na matu gaw hkum hkrang hkrang sa hkra (sh) wunkat loi mi gaw galaw ra na re (ga shadawn, lung rawk bum lung ai, hka kata hpung yawt ai (sh) hkyen pa jawn ai ni hte shingjaw u).

English: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails.
Jinghpaw: Lagaw lam bu hkawm ai gaw nta shinggan shamu shamawt lam rai nna shingra grupyin masa ni hta hkawm chyai ai lam lawm nga ai.

English: Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day.
Jinghpaw: Shani hkan bum lung ai lam ni gaw deng mi hta shau nna lani mi hta lu hkam na daram hkawm sa mai ai tsan shadang rai nga ai.

English: For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them.
Jinghpaw: Lani mi lung ra ai bum de lung na matu shaman shakyang ai lam galaw ra nga ai rai nna hkam ja ai masha ni sha mai shang lawm nga ai.

English: Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.
Jinghpaw: Ma kasha nga ai nta masha ni gaw grau lazang da ra ai, raitim jawng lung sai ma nga ai ni gaw lani mi shingan prau ai gaw grai loi na re.

English: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently.
Jinghpaw: Mungkan ga hku na gaw, mungkan hta lagat shingjawng uhpung uhpawng 200 daram nga ai. Law malawng gaw kadai kaw mung shamyet shanat nnga ai sha bungli kri nga ma ai.

English: The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours networks dozens of sightrunning providers on four continents.
Jinghpaw: Mungkan Lagat Shingjawng hpung a ninghkring wa, sa lagat uhpung ni gaw dan mali hta na gat shingjawng lawm masha law law hte zinghkri nga ai.

English: With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.
Jinghpaw: Shawa n-gun jaw ai lam ni hte rau Barcelona kaw Barcelona gat shingjawng poi hte Copehagen na Copenhagen gat shingjawng poi kaw Prague kaw galaw ai Prague gat shingjawng lamang hte laga sha ra kaw na ni lawan shakap wa ma ai.

English: There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere.
Jinghpaw: Shara mi de hkrunlam n hkawm shi yang hte hkawm taw ai ten nang hta sadi ra ai lam ni law law nga ai.

English: When you travel, expect things not to be like they are "back home". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live.
Jinghpaw: Tinang bu hkawm ai shaloi gara shara hta e mung, tinang na nta zaawn rai na ngu myit mada lam n tawn ga. Sat lawat, jahkrat da ai tara ni, malu masha, mawdaw htinglet, nga jarawp, madang, ga hte kaga lam ni gaw tinang nga ai shara hte shai na re.

English: This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things.
Jinghpaw: Dai gaw jauman masha ni nra ai hpe n galaw hkrup na matu (sh) myit npyaw na lam koi gam na matu na myit hta galoi mung matsing da ra ai lam re.

English: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries.
Jinghpaw: Hkrun lam bungli dat kasa hpung ni gaw tsa ban 19 ning hkan na nga taw sai re. Bu hkawm bungli dat kasa wa gaw tinang atsawm n chye ai shingra maka ni, htunghking ningli ni, tsun shaga ga ni nga ai mungdan shing nrai, matsan ai mungdan ni de sa mayu ai nga yang gaw bu hkawm bungli dat kasa ni hpe lata ging ai.

English: Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations.
Jinghpaw: Hkrun lam lajang hpung law malawng gaw man man tau htet ai hpe sharawng ma timung, kaga ni gaw bu hkawm shara, hkrat ang ai gumhpraw hte hkrun lam hpan ni hpe madung da galaw ma ai.

English: It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours.
Jinghpaw: Nang na hkum lam zawn lajang ya ai agent hpe lang ai gaw grau kaja na re.

English: Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.
Jinghpaw: Website kaw rai rai madun da ai seng kaw rai rai hkrun lam lajang ai ni hpe ni ndau shabra da ai hpe yu yu u.

English: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that.
Jinghpaw: Lama na nang mungkan ga hpe manu hpa ai aprat hku (sh) shingjawng nga ai aprat hku mu mayu yang, dai hpe galaw na matu ladat ni nga ai re.

English: Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter.
Jinghpaw: Malawng hku na gaw, hkrang lahkawng hku sha re taw ai: Hkrun lam hkawm let bungli galaw na kun ja gumhpraw hpe shayawm shakut na kun. Ndai sumrai gaw hpang na wa hpe mahta ai re.

English: For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to push expenses down close to zero, see minimum budget travel.
Jinghpaw: Myit htep nga, aten, tau maram mai ai lam ni hpe machyi hkam gwi ai ni a matu, manu laja nkam ma ai sha hpa nma mayu ai ni a matu, gumhpraw jahpan budget shau dik hte hkrun lam hkawm na nga yang npu de yu u.

English: The advice assumes that travellers do not steal, trespass, participate in the illegal market, beg, or otherwise exploit other people for their own gain.
Jinghpaw: Dai shana laika gaw hkrun lam hkam ni tara nshang ai gat hkan n lagu na, n tawt lai na, n shang lawm na hte nhpyi sha hkawm na matu kaga hku na gaw kaga masha ni a madu rai ni ntsa amyat n tam sha na matu re ngu maram lu ai.

English: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle.
Jinghpaw: Masha htawt shang jepjoi shara langai mi gaw law malaw gaw pyenli langai ngai, sanghpaw li langai ngai (sh) kaga madaw ni kaw yu jang shawng hkring ra ai shara re.

English: In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains.
Jinghpaw: Mungdan lai di wanleng nkau ni hta, jep ai lam ni hpe wanleng ding yang lagat let sha galaw ai, wanleng langai gaw jarik langai du ai ten nang hta tara shang ID nang hte rau nga taw ra na.

English: On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.
Jinghpaw: Shana yup wanleng ntsa kaw gaw, maigan pru hkawm lakmat ni hpe wanleng hpareng wa e zing la da ya na re dai shaloi she nang yup ai shaloi gin jang ai lam nhkrum na re.

English: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities.
Jinghpaw: Mungdan shang lakmat galaw yang mying chyahpan bang ai gaw shajan galaw ra ai lam re. Nkau mungdan hkan gaw, nang nga ai shara kaw na ginra ahkaw ahkang lu hpung ni hte nang nga ai lam hpe jahpan bang ra nga ai.

English: This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices.
Jinghpaw: Dai kaw na pya da dai nrai masha jahpan hta ai rung kaw na laika form hpe htai na ra ai.

English: In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask).
Jinghpaw: Ndai tara nga ai mungdan law malawng hta gaw, mying matsing masat ai lam ni hpe buga ginra na manam jarawp ni galaw ya na re (san na matu hkum malap).

English: In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.
Jinghpaw: Laga lam hta, sa chyai ai ni nga ai shara a shin gan kaw nga ai ni sha mying chyhpang ra ai. Raitim, dai gaw tara hpe grau nkaja shangun wa ai, dai majaw shawng tam u.

English: Architecture is concerned with the design and construction of buildings. The architecture of a place is often a tourist attraction in its own right.
Jinghpaw: Htingnu gap hpaji gaw nta htingtsip a gaw sharawt lam hte shalat maka hpaji hte seng ai. Dai htingnu gap hpaji hte gaw gap da ai shara gaw shi nan shi byin taw ai lam hpe a yan na bu hkawm masha ni a matu myit shang sha hpa tai ai.

English: Many buildings are quite beautiful to look at and the view from a tall building or from a cleverly-positioned window can be a beauty to behold.
Jinghpaw: Nta law law gaw yu chyai na matu grai tsawm ai re, ngut na nta tsaw kaw na yu chyai shara (sh) hku wat pat kaw na yu mada ai mung grai tsawm nga ai.

English: Architecture overlaps considerably with other fields including urban planning, civil engineering, decorative arts, interior design and landscape design.
Jinghpaw: Htingnu gap hpaji gaw mare gaw de ai, mare lang jak hpaji, mawn sumli, kata maka shatawm ai lam hte pa layang maka shatsawm ai lam ni lawm ai kaga bungli dabang ni hte bungli kahtap taw ai.

English: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe.
Jinghpaw: Spain ga ga ai masha law law nnga mat ai hpang, nang gaw Albuquerque (sh) Santa Fe de ndu hkawm ai sha shana poi ginra lak lai ai namchyim hpe nlu hkam sha na re.

English: However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe).
Jinghpaw: Kaning rai nme law, hpaida wang ni yawng ngu na daram gaw luhpa ni daw jaw ai hte nkau mi gaw mying loi gumhkawng ai shangwi shapyaw ai baw ni jashawn da ma ai (grau kaba ai ni mahtang gaw Albuquerque hte Santa Fe hpe shing grup da ai).

English: Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out.
Jinghpaw: Sadi u: mare kaji ni hta nga ai tsa seng ni gaw maigan masha ni sa chyai na matu ayan n htap htuk ai shara ni re.

English: For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.
Jinghpaw: Lam langai a matu, nna dingdung Mexico Nnan kaw tsa lu nna madaw gau ai gaw manghkang kaba re, tsa nang ai madaw gau ai ni gaw mare kahtawng kaw na tsa seng kasha kaw sha myit du ma ai.

English: Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti.
Jinghpaw: Masha nra ai shadaw kaw ai dai nrai lung kaw ka ni hpe graffiti ngu chye ma ai.

English: While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint.
Jinghpaw: Ndai gaw daini na prat mabyin masa ni kaw na tsan mat wa ai aten hta masha law malawng gaw ndai hpe ramma ni a shawa hte seng ai arung arai dum nta ni hpe jahten kau ya ai lam hte dinghkrai hte seng ai arung arai ni hpe dumtsit tsi hte sumla tsi chya ai lam hta jai lang ai lam ni hte shabung kau ya nhten.

English: However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and "legal" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags.
Jinghpaw: Raitim, ya ten hta graffiti ninghkring, graffiti lamang ngut nna tara shaing ai shakum ni hpe hpang wa ai. Graffiti sumla ka ai gaw tara nshang ai hta sumla hpanji ni hpe mahkawng wa ai.

English: Boomerang throwing is a popular skill that many tourists want to acquire.
Jinghpaw: Gawngwai laknak gabai ai lam gaw mungkan bu hkawm masha grai law wa hkaja la mayu ai mying gumhkawng ai kungkyang lam langai mi rai nga ai.

English: If you want to learn throwing a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for returning.
Jinghpaw: Lama na nang, gawngwai laknak kabai sharin mayu ai rai yang, kaja htap hkuk manu ai hpe lang u.

English: Most boomerangs available in Australia are in fact non-returning. It is best for beginners to not try throwing in windy
Jinghpaw: Australia hta mai lu ai Boomerang malawng gaw kaja nga yang bai nhtang nwa ai baw re. Nnan lang hpang ai ni a matu kaja dik gaw nbung bung ai ten nkabai yang kaja na re.

English: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground.
Jinghpaw: Hangi Lusha langai hpe ga kata na kahtet ai nhkun kaw shadu ai.

English: The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot.
Jinghpaw: Dai nhkun gaw wan hte kahtet ai nlung hte nat kahtet da ai nhkun mi rai yang, dai nrai lamu ga nan shi shi kahtet ai shara re taw ai nhkun re.

English: The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner.
Jinghpaw: Htunghking hte seng ai kakang da ai malu masha shana shat hpe shadu kachyawng ai hta law malawng gaw hangi hpe lang ai.

English: Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.
Jinghpaw: Kaga hangi ni hpe X'stu Naw ku jawng, Wellington hte kaga shara hkan sha mai lu ai rai tim, Rootua a shara law law kaw geothermal hangi ni hpe jaw nga ai.

English: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class).
Jinghpaw: MetroRail hta dingyang hkawm wanleng hte Cape Mare kaba grup hkawm ai wan leng ngu dum hkum hpan lahkawng nga ai: MetroPlus (Nambat langai Dum hkum ngu mung tsun ai) hte Metro (Nambat masum Dum hkum ngu tsun ai).

English: MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe.
Jinghpaw: MetroPlus wanleng gaw zing ai re nna masha nau nhpring chyat ai re rai timung, Europa dan na yu maya metro lakmat ni hta grau nna manu hkyem sa ai re tim, shi gaw kachyi myi grau gaw manu hpu ai re.

English: Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.
Jinghpaw: Wanleng shagu gaw MetroPlus hte wanleng gawk ni nga ai re; Metroplus gawk ni gaw galoi mung Cape Town hte ni dik htum ai wanleng a hpang jahtum de nga ai re.

English: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders.
Jinghpaw: Kaga ni a rai hpai karum yang, grau nna gaw mungkan ga daga hte seng ai lamu ga jarik ni hpe lai ai shaloi tinang a rai ni hpe tinang myi npu na galoi hkum shamat kau u.

English: You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble.
Jinghpaw: Nang pi n chye dat ai sha nang hpe nanghpam tsi shabra ai wa hku jamjau jamhkau byin hkra jai lang katut ai lam ni byin chye ai.

English: This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice.
Jinghpaw: Namhpan chye manam ai gwi hpe shana ai lam nnga ai gara ten kaw tim mai lang ai zawn ndai gaw kata ta taw ai kaw lawm ai.

English: Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death.
Jinghpaw: Nkau mungdan hkan gaw alat shingshawng hku nna ninghkap gasat ai raitimung ari kaba jaw ma ai, dai mara kaw 10 ning hta jan nna htawng jahkrat ai lam (sh) si ari ni du hkra lawm nga ai.

English: Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.
Jinghpaw: Madu nnga ai nhpye ni gaw lagut ni a masat rai nga ai. Dai hta sha n-ga seng ang ai magam ni hpe bawm hte jahkrit shama na hpe hkrit tsang ai lam byin pru na matu myit gang ya nga ai.

English: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them.
Jinghpaw: Ginra shara hkan na ana ni hpe matut manoi tam shapraw wa ai a majaw, nta hkan nang dang hkam jan ngut sai re nga ana zingli ni hpe n-gun jaw ai lam gaw grau tsaw wa nga ai.

English: But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems.
Jinghpaw: Raiti mung na a matu bacteria jep lam hte seng nna ginra pra dusat nnan naw re nga ai mungkan ga a laga daw chyen ginra ni kaw gaw nang mang hkang kata de grau gat bang katut na zawn re nga ai.

English: Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body.
Jinghpaw: Kahtet ai du hkra ladaw hta bacteria ni gaw grau gaba lawan ai ngut nna masha hkum kaw nrai yang grau na hkra hkrung ma ai.

English: Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends.
Jinghpaw: Dai majaw Delhi Belly a damhkawn shingna, Pharaoh a dagam dala, Montezuma a matai htang ai lam hte shanhte a manang grai law wa mi.

English: As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.
Jinghpaw: Grau kashung ai du hkra ladaw ni hta nsa sa lam manghkang nga chye ai zawn, kahtet ta hta mung pu hte seng ai ana ni law law byin chye nga ai, ngut na mabyin law malawng gaw myit ru hpa rai tim nau gaw ntsang ra ai.

English: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock.
Jinghpaw: Lama na galu kaba sai mungdan ni de alat ningshawng mungkan ga a ginra nnan de bu hkawm ai re yang mai byin wa na htunghking kajawng kaja ai lam ni hpe hkum yu kaji.

English: Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly.
Jinghpaw: Ngang kang ai ai hte atsam rawng ai bu hkawm masha grai law hpe htunghking hte seng ai jahkaw la ai lam kasha ni law law wa hpe lawan ladan bang la mai ai mungkan a rawt jat galu kaba wa ai bu hkawm ai lam ning nan ni gaw badang dip la kau sai re.

English: Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize.
Jinghpaw: Grau nna gaw anhte a nnan hpang wa ai nhtoi ni hta, Sinna hkran ni a prat lai kasi lang ai lam hte madang tsaw ai manam jarawp ni, lu sha ni hte nga man wa hkra garum ya na matu galaw daw jau ya ai lam ni a matu gumhpraw jai wa ra na lam hpe myit sawn shalawm ra nga ai.

English: Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna.
Jinghpaw: Nang nchye ai jau man ginra ni hkan na ga ntsa na si htun panep wawp wawp re ai panep hkan e nmai yup ai.

English: If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.
Jinghpaw: Lama nang camp pru hkawm na re yang, lapu, n-gaw gawk zawn re kaw na makawp lu na matu yup ku kaji sing goi hpai gun u.

English: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night.
Jinghpaw: Jahpawt hta na nta ting manu dan ai kaphi lu nna shana gaw chamomile hpalap lu nna shalan shabran u.

English: When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special.
Jinghpaw: Nta makau hkan ban sa la ai lam galaw nga ai shaloi, tinang hkrai nga chyai na matu aten ni grai law nga nna, hpalap hpe laksan lak lak lai lai gayau chyai na matu mung aten nga ai re.

English: If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies:
Jinghpaw: Lama na nang grau nna nhkrit ntsang byin mayu ai zawn nga yang, namsi ntsin galaw namsi ntsin ni hpe gayau na ahkaw ahkang hpe la dat u.

English: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine.
Jinghpaw: ayan na bungli hkrang masa hku bai galaw sa wa ai shaloi, manap lusha a matu tinang hkyen lajang la mai ai yu maya luhpa hpe byin mai yang mu tam wa na re.

English: If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.
Jinghpaw: Nang tsa chye lu ma ai ladat nga ai myu kaw nga yang, nta makau kaw na tsa seng de sa ai nau nga na re.

English: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings.
Jinghpaw: Tsi hpaji hte seng ai laksan ga ni hpe nmawn shi ai wa a matu gaw, ana kap loi ai (infectious) hte ana kap chye ai (contagious) ngu ai ga si lahkawng gaw lachyum shai ma ai.

English: An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites.
Jinghpaw: Kap bra ana langai gaw hkrung kanu, bacterium, kamu (sh) kaga hkan kap latung zawn re pathogen ana hpe shabyin ya mai ai.

English: A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person.
Jinghpaw: Kap chye wa ai ana zinli langai gaw ana kap taw ai masha langai ngai a makau kaw nga nga ai shaloi aloi sha kap wa chye ai baw ana re.

English: Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases.
Jinghpaw: Asuya law law gaw mungdan shang wa ai ni (sh) mungdan na pru ai ni hpe dai mungdan ni hta ana amyu hpan a matu makawp maga tsi tsi ra nga ai.

English: These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.
Jinghpaw: Ndai ra ahkyak ai lam ni gaw bu hkawm masha wa sa na mungdan (sh) sa mayu ai mungdan ni hta mahta ai re.

English: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families.
Jinghpaw: Carolina a dingdung maga rai nga ai Charlotte a hkrak dik htum ai lam ni kaw na langai mi gaw dinghku ni a matu madang tsaw ai lata hpa law law nga ai rai nga ai.

English: Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around.
Jinghpaw: Laga shara kaw na masha ni dai myu de htawt ai a lachyum gaw, ngut nna sa chyai ai nigaw dai kaw ma ni hte grai pyaw ma ai.

English: In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially.
Jinghpaw: Lai wa sai shaning 20 hta, Charlotte myu kaba hta ma ni pyaw mai ai hpan ni grau grau lawan ladan law htam wa ai.

English: Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances.
Jinghpaw: Taxi mawdaw ni hpe Charlotte na nta masha ni masa lam loi mi hkan sha lang ai raitim, malawng maga gaw nlang ma ai.

English: There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.
Jinghpaw: Bu hkawm masha lahkawng a matu manu shahpu grau hkrat na re, dai majaw ndai hpe lata la ai lam gaw ra ai hta jan nna gumhpraw grau ma na re.

English: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole.
Jinghpaw: Antarctica gaw mungkan ga ntsa e katsi dik htum ai shara langai rai nna, shi gaw dingda maga de na matu hpe shinggrup tawn da ai re.

English: Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea.
Jinghpaw: Bu hkawm ai ni gaw ja gumhpraw ma ai, hkum hkrang hkam kaja ra ai, ginhtawng ta Nov-Feb laman sha mai hkawm ai, ngut na zundawn, zunlawng, Ross panglai hkan de sa chyai na matu shadawn masat lam nga ai.

English: A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter.
Jinghpaw: Ginhtawng ta hta dai shara malawng shara mali shi jan hkan bungli galaw masha hking hku na nga ma ai; nshung ta hta gaw masha kachyi mi nga ma ai.

English: Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice.
Jinghpaw: Hkyen 2-3 km hte ka'up da ai Antarctika kawng lam gaw shingran katsi ai bumpa layang langai re.

English: Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.
Jinghpaw: Nbungli mahkrum madup hkrun lam hpe bum lung ai ni a matu (sh) grai kaba ai dap nga ai mungkan jahtum du na matu kawng kaw sha galaw wa ai.

English: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole.
Jinghpaw: Dingdung Pole Traverse (dai nrai lam kaba) gaw Ross panglai a McMurdo shara kaw na Pole duhkra 1600 km tsan ai re.

English: It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies.
Jinghpaw: Dai shara gaw hkyen ni hte hkyen hka lwi hkang ni hte chyu hpring chyat nga nna dawnghkawn hte masat tawn da ai. Dai kaw gaw hpang kaw sau ni gunrai ni htaw na matu leng matut da ai baw hte laksan galaw shapraw da madaw jak ni rau sha mai hkawm sa nga ai.

English: These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.
Jinghpaw: Ndai ni gaw nau n lawan ai majaw hkrun lam gaw kawng tsaw bumpa de du na matu Transantarctic bum ni makau kaw grai galu hkra magaw kau ra ai.

English: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps.
Jinghpaw: Nshung ta na hkala nba byin chye dik ai lam gaw lam maw hkan, manep lam (masha hkawm lam) hkan, grau nna ninggam ni hta gashawt chye ai re.

English: At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient.
Jinghpaw: Nlaw htum gaw hkyepdin hte htap htuk ai hkyepdin pa hpun ra na re. Ginhtawng ta hkyepdin ni gaw hkage hte hkyen ni kaw manen ai kashung ta hkyepdin ni pyi gaw naw ningra ai.

English: The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures.
Jinghpaw: Maka kumla gaw 5 mm (1/5 letma) hta jan yang ram la sai, rungrai gaw katsi ai masat shadang hta re yang anya nga sai.

English: Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole.
Jinghpaw: Nkau buk hkyep din ni gaw hkyepdin laju ni lawm nna kashawt ai ginra matu hte hkyepdin lahtin ni yawng a matu htap htuk manu ai laksan shakap la na hkyepdin laju ni mung nga nga ai.

English: Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.
Jinghpaw: Lagaw lahtin ni gaw nem nnga dam dam re ging ai. Zaibru, lung sha jum (calcium chloride) ni gaw gang dun n-gun grau nga na matu lam nmaw lam kaji hkan de jahkring hkring bra taw ai.

English: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches.
Jinghpaw: Bum ntsa kaw na numri tawng gaw shihkrai numri bum ntsa kaw na dik hkrak wa chye ai baw re.

English: The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest.
Jinghpaw: Manghkang gaw numri grai hkrat ai lam rai nga ai, dai majaw hkawm sa na matu lam ni hpe galaw la ra nga ai hte kalang marang nuri hkrat ai lam ni gaw lam byin taw chye ai.

English: Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.
Jinghpaw: Kalang lang dai lamang ni gaw numri ni hpe jan hte shalum ya ai, kalang lang numri grau hkrat ai, kalang lang langa lamang ni hpe masha ni galaw ma ai.

English: A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward.
Jinghpaw: Bunghpoi laru gaw nbung na kata de ntsa de na grup yin ma hkra hpe chyup la nna dip n-gun grai nem ai nbung gayin shadawn langai re.

English: They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves.
Jinghpaw: Shanhte gaw nbungl grai gawut ai (ayang 100-200 miles/hking) ngut nna rai kaba hpe pi hpai mat ai, magoi ladi nbung laru hkawm ai hta hpai mat ai.

English: They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become "tornadoes" when they touch the ground.
Jinghpaw: Shanhte gaw nbung laru kaw na summwi ni hti zawn yu wa ai hku hpang wa nna shanhte ni ga de hkra ai hte gaw bunghpoi laru byin wa ai re.

English: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering.
Jinghpaw: Tingkyeng hte seng ai VPN (Kompyuta matsun hte nga ai dinghkrai kompyuta hkridun) galaw shapraw ya ai ni gaw mung masa jep joi ai lam hte hpaga IP-geofiltering lahkawng yan hpe kaja htum ai hku koi yen ai ladat re.

English: They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http.
Jinghpaw: Shahte gaw web galaw ai lam hta madi madun lam law law hku na awng dang ai ni re: Shahte gaw http sha n-ga Internet hting let sa taw ai lam yawng hpe bai byeng la ma ai.

English: They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.
Jinghpaw: Ayan shanhte ni grau kaja ai galaw jaw ai hte grau tsaw ai bandwidth jaw ai. Shanhte ga makoi da ai, dai majaw kin-yu yu na yak ai.

English: The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to "prevent piracy".
Jinghpaw: Shiga dap ni gaw "masha ni a laksan shiga lamang ni hpe makawp maga na matu" ngu nna tsun let galoi mung masu nga ai.

English: In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will.
Jinghpaw: Kaja sha, dai shara kaw na code gaw tara nshang ai re; laga galaw da ai ni ningpawt galaw da ai hpe mai hpaw ai jak kaw mai na re.

English: The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning.
Jinghpaw: Teng sha yaw shada lam gaw hpaga hpung ni hpe shanhte a gat lawk ni ntsa ahkang aya grau jaw lu na matu re; ja gumhpraw hpe kyi da shangun ai lam re.

English: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel.
Jinghpaw: Shaga na matu internet hte sha lajang da ai majaw re, nang sa chyai ai shara dai nrai nga ai shara kaw na hpung hte nshaga ra ai re.

English: There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona.
Jinghpaw: Nang nga ai shawa uhpung na buga nambat hpe hkam la pyi nra ai; Alaska, Chicken bum karing na jak shagan jodu internet connection hpe nang mai lu ai dai hpang nang jan pru ai Arizona kaw nga taw ai ngu hpe hpaw tsun ai nambat langai hpe lata u.

English: Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.
Jinghpaw: Chyhkring hkring nang hpe shaga na matu PSTN ga shaga jak ahkang jaw da ai san san garan da ai mungkan nambat hpe nang mari ra na. Nang hpe masha ni shaga wa na matu dai nambat gaw jashai da ai shara kaw na du wa ai.

English: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another.
Jinghpaw: Real-time ngu ai ga shalai ai apps-applications gaw ga langai kaw na langai de laika yawng hpe lu shalai ya ai.

English: Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects.
Jinghpaw: Ndai amyu hpan kaw lawm ai app nkau mi gaw smartphone lang ai wa arai ni hpe dai phone hte shayawng ai ten hta pru wa ai kum ni (sh) arung arai ni hpe maigan ga hku ka da ai laika ni hpe ga gale ya lu nga ai.

English: The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong.
Jinghpaw: Ga shalai ya ai gaw grai hkrak taw sai re, ngut nna chyhkring hkring jaw ai ni nga ai (ngut nna lachyum npru ai ni law law hpe), raitim shut ai ni yawng nga mat sai majaw nkau mi shpe naw tsang ra ai.

English: One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.
Jinghpaw: Ndai amyu bawhpan kaw na dan dawng htum app ni kaw na langai gaw, internet kaw na ra sharawng ai ga hpan jahpan lamang ni hpe kaga de htawt la da ngut ai hpang ai internet nra ai sha ga gale ai lam galaw la lu na ahkang jaw ya ai Google ga gale ai lam re.

English: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country.
Jinghpaw: Na a smartphone kaw GPS lam madun ai app hpe jai lang ai gaw na mungdan na pru mat wa ai ten htawng madun lu n amatu loi dik ai hte manu dik ai app langai re.

English: It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company.
Jinghpaw: Dai gaw GPS a matu lamu ga sumla nnan mari na gumphraw mai mahkawng la ai mawdaw shap sha hpaga hpung kaw na shap mai ai langai hkrai lang GPS mari na matu gumhpraw mai mahkawng la ai.

English: If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.
Jinghpaw: Lama na nang na phone kaw internet hte matut ya ai lam nnga yang gaw, masat da ai a shinggan de rai taw yang gaw shanhte a bungli galaw ai lam ni gaw shadang masat tawn hkrum mai ai nlu lang wa chye ai re.

English: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones.
Jinghpaw: Jut seng shagu kaw gumhpraw shawng bang na mai lang ai phone hte mi na telephone ni hta tau gumhpraw bang sha hta nchye na na daram hpring taw ai.

English: While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries.
Jinghpaw: Kat pa yawng ngu na daram shara shagu kaw phone shaga na matu hkrak nga ai shaloi, nkau mungdan uhpung ni gaw grau shaga pyaw na matu phone shaga masat shadang hpe alak mi galaw da ma ai.

English: Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.
Jinghpaw: Ndai galaw jaw ya ai lam ni hpe lu na matu gaw jahpu manu nla ai sha ga shaga jak law malawng kaw na mai shaga ai manu jahpu njaw ra ai ga shaga jak ni hku nna kalang marang mai re.

English: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so.
Jinghpaw: Ayan dem ai sumla dem hpaji hte seng ai rip kawp ni mung sumla hkrung dem ai hta mai byin yang grau nna pyi jai lang ai.

English: If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it.
Jinghpaw: Sumla pi ngayet shangun yang, sumla hkrung gayet na amtu myit pi hkum myit.

English: If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required.
Jinghpaw: Lama na jak pyen kem ra lang na re yang, nang hpa sumla ni hpe gayet na ahkang nga ai hte hpa ahkang jaw lakmat (sh) kahtap nna hpa ahkang jaw lakmat ni lu ra ngu ai lam hpe shawng atsawm jep maram yu u.

English: Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.
Jinghpaw: Drone (lamu ntsa pyen hkawm ai jak) ni hpe nang nga taw ai shara kaw tara nshang yang pi, nbungli daru makau hkan shing nrai, shawa hpawng ntsa hkan pyen hkawm ai gaw n galaw ging ai lam re.

English: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices.
Jinghpaw: Ya prat hta pyenli hku hkawm sa ai hta pyenli company na manu hte ading tawk shawng sawk tam nna manu shing daw ai lam nnga ai daram kalang ta lakmat htet la ma ai.

English: Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.
Jinghpaw: Kalang lang gaw internet kungpani law ai majaw pyenli manu grai shai hkat ma sai, sawk tam mahtai ni hpe shingdaw nna nhtet shi yang dai pyenli kungpani na website kaw na hte shingdaw nna gumhpraw jaw ai.

English: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist.
Jinghpaw: Kaga mungdan nkau mi ni de bu hkawm (sh) amu bungli a matu jahkring jahkra hkawm ai rai yang visa nra ai rai tim jawng ma hku nna sa du na rai yang gaw nga na aten grau galu na rai nga ai.

English: In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance.
Jinghpaw: Law malawng, laga mungdan kaw grai na nga yang visa shawng galaw na matu ra ai.

English: Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas.
Jinghpaw: Jawng ma visa ni gaw laga hpaga dai nrai sa chyai ai visa galaw ai lam ngut nna ra ai madi shadaw laika ni nbung ma ai.

English: For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course.
Jinghpaw: Mungdan law malawng kaw gaw, nang gaw nang hka ja na matu yaw shada ai hpung kaba kaw na shaga laika hpe lu ra na re nna shau htum alat ningshawng shaning hpe madi shadaw na ja gumhpraw sakse mung ra na re.

English: Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.
Jinghpaw: Ahkri ahkrai ra ahkyak ai lam ni hpe nang sa mayu ai mungdan a masha htawt shang dap hte arau hpung kaba ni hku nna jep yu ra ai.

English: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in.
Jinghpaw: Nang sumtsan kasa sha nre yang gaw, mungdan shinggan kaw bungli galaw yang nang nga ai mundan hta hkan nna shang gumhpraw a ahkun hpe jaw bang ra ngu lachyum re.

English: Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another.
Jinghpaw: Shang gumhpraw ahkun hta ai lam gaw mungdan langai hte langai nbung ai re, ngut nna ahkun manu ni gaw mungdan hte langai grai shai ma ai.

English: In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.
Jinghpaw: Ginjaw asuya hte mungdaw ni lapran ahkang aya karan masat la ai mungdan, United States hte Canada zawn re ai mungdan nkau mi hkan gaw, shang ai hkangse hpe gaw ginjaw asuya hte seng ai madang hte jau man hte seng ai madang lahkawng yan kaw na hta ai re, dai majaw masat manu hte masat ai lam ni gaw ginra hte ginra shai hkat na re.

English: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle.
Jinghpaw: Na mungdan de bai du wa ai shaloi mying jahpan jep ai lam hta jep ai nga ai (sh) njep ai ma ga ai, ahkun jep shara gaw ndang kalang mai byin wa ai.

English: Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.
Jinghpaw: Nang lu galaw ai hte nlu galaw ai hpe chye hkra galaw nna hpa hpe mung tara shang masat masa hku nna ndau shana u.

English: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website.
Jinghpaw: Bu hkawm laika ka ai hpaga yumga hpe hpang lu na matu grai loi dik ai lam gaw nang na kungkyang ai lam hpe hpang tawn da sai bu hkawm ai lam hte seng ai blog internet laika man hkan garang na la matu rai nga ai.

English: After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.
Jinghpaw: Nang gaw web ntsa format jahkrat ai hte jep sharai ai hpe manu ai hku chye wa ai hpang de gaw, na a website hpe nang nang gin shalat wa mai ai.

English: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving.
Jinghpaw: Hkrum lam hkawm let daw jau ai lam gaw sak jaw ai lam sha nre shai ai lam ni hpe mung galaw lu ai re.

English: Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills.
Jinghpaw: Maigan mungdan kaw shanu nga ai hte ap nawng dawjau ai lam galaw ai gaw nbung ai htunghkring ni hpe chye chyang na matu, masha ningnan ni hpe hkrum shaga lu na matu, tinang hkum tinang hkaja la lu na matu, ningmu chyechyang ai lam lu na matu hte hpaji hta kunglet ai lam ningnan ni lu na matu pyi grai laklai ai ladat re.

English: It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.
Jinghpaw: Dai gaw gumhpraw njaw ra ai sha grau na hkra lu nga na matu shara langai ngai mai lu nga ai rai nhtawm bungli galaw na nga na gawk jaw ai lam ni hte nkau mi hkan gaw shata shabrai kachyi mi pyi jaw nga ai.

English: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get.
Jinghpaw: Viking ni gaw Black Sea hte Caspian sea de du hkra sa na matu Rusia hka lam hpe jai lai wa ai re. Ndai lam a dawchyen nkau myi gaw naw mai jai lang ai re. Lu na matu grai yak ai baw laksan ahkang jaw lakmat a matu byin mai ai jep jen ai lam ni gaw galaw ra na re.

English: The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes.
Jinghpaw: Panglai Hpraw - Baltic Canal gaw hka nu hte nawng malawng kaw na lwi wa ai Onega Nawng, Ladoga Nawng hte Saint Petersburg hkan na sha re nna Arctic Nammuk dara kaw na Baltic Panglai hte matut da ai.

English: Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.
Jinghpaw: Onega nawng gaw Volga hte matut da ai majaw Caspian panglai hpe lai nna Russia de sa wa ai lam gaw byin mai nga ai.

English: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you.
Jinghpaw: Kaja wa teng hkra di u, nang li daru hpe dip hkra dat sai hte gaw yawng yawng gaw grai dan dawng wa na re. Nang laga sanghpaw hkan jawng ai masha ni hte hkrum wa na re ai hte shanhte ni shanhte a shiga ni hpe nang hpe garan gachyan ya na ra ai.

English: Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc.
Jinghpaw: Madung gaw nang garum ningtum jaw ya ai lam ni, sanghpaw li hpe madun dan ai lam ni, masha ni shanhte na sanghpaw li hpe kashin shatsawm taw ai lam ni, seng ni hkan shanghpaw li masha ni hte matut mahkai na shakut nga ai lam zawn re ni hpe madun ai ndau laika ni hpe nang law law galaw wa ra na re.

English: Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.
Jinghpaw: Byin mai ai daram masha law law hte ga shaga lu na matu shakut u. Kachyi mi na ai hpang masha shagu gaw nang hpe chye wa nna gara sang hpaw li gaw masha tam nga ai lam ga machyan ni hpe nang hpe jaw wa na re.

English: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully.
Jinghpaw: Nang ayan jawn ai nbungli hpe sha nang a tsawm sha lata ra ai re.

English: Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.
Jinghpaw: Nang ayang jawn ai nbungli hpe nang chye la ta tim, shanhte gaw ai lam ni gaw shai ai hpe chye ra ai ngut nna lam langai sha sa ai nbungli nbung ai hta jawn ai ni gaw grau ahkyak ai re.

English: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines.
Jinghpaw: Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways hte Turkish Airlines zawn re pyenli hpaga hpung ni gaw Africa de shanhte galaw lajang ai lam ni hpe grai nan maden jat wa ai, re nna Africa mare kaba ni de kaga Uropa pyenli hpaga hpung ni hta shingjawng nna manu ni grau hkyam sa ai hku galaw wa ma sai.

English: Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014.
Jinghpaw: Turkish Ailines gaw 2014 ning hta Afrika mungdan 30 na shara 39 de htaw sa pyen hkawm lu sai.

English: If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare.
Jinghpaw: Lama na nang hkawm chyai na aten shajan lu ai rai yang, Afrika de sa hkawm ai jarit hte mungkan ting gayin hkawm ai jarit shingdaw yu na matu sa wa yu u.

English: Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.
Jinghpaw: Africa shingan na dai shara yawng a matu mungdan shang lakmat, pru wa hkang se, ga ntsa htaw wa htaw sa lam, sh.r.n a matu shajan hkrat na manu ni hpe bang shalawm na hkum malap.

English: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes.
Jinghpaw: Southern Hemisphere hte mungkan ting pyan mayu ai rai yang, nbungli hte sa na shara hpe grai lata ra na re hpajaw nga yang transoceanic lam nau nga ai majaw re.

English: No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings).
Jinghpaw: Gara pyenli hpung mung dingda maga na Hemisphere kaw na panglai matsum hpe nlu lai ma ai (hte SkyTeam hpung mung nlu lai ma ai).

English: However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight.
Jinghpaw: Hpa wa rai rai, Star Alliance gaw Santiago de Chile to Tahiti ngu ai LATAM mungkan nbungli kaw na Dingda Pacific a sinpraw maga hta lai nna shara shagu de shara la da ai.

English: This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)
Jinghpaw: Lama na nang dingda pacific hte dingda amerika a sinna hkinggau mayan hpe lai kau mayu ai rai yang, lata la mai ai lam gaw ndai pyenli hkawm ai lam sha nre. (Lawu kaw yu u)

English: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris.
Jinghpaw: 1994 hta, Azerbaijan a Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh ginra na myu bawng sang gaw Azeris hpe majan baw masai.

English: With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it.
Jinghpaw: Amenian a madi shadaw ai n-gun hte gumsan magam mungdan ningnan langai gaw de sa lai wa ma ai. Rai timung, daw de hpang na n-ngut ai mundan, Armenia tara shang nmasat ai mungdan rai nga ai.

English: Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
Jinghpaw: Armenia hte Azerbaijan ni a shara kashun hkat ai lam gaw grai yu ntsawm wa nga ai.

English: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam.
Jinghpaw: Canal Ginwang (Dutch: Grachtengordel) gaw Amsterdam a Binnenstad grup yin hkan tsa ban 17 na mying gumhkawng ai ginwang langai re.

English: The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.
Jinghpaw: Dai ginra yawng UNESCO mungkan Sali Wunli a matu shalat maka da hkrum ai lam gaw dai shara a laklai ai htunghking labau a manu ni gaw dai mungdan hta tsaw dik htum ai sutgan arung arai ni rai nga ai majaw mung rai nga ai.

English: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria.
Jinghpaw: Kawng Manga ngu lachyum pru ai Cinque Terre gaw Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza hte Italy ginra a Liguria kaw nga ai Monterosso ni ngu ai hkinggau mayan mare kaji manga pawng hpawm da ai mare re.

English: They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List.
Jinghpaw: Ndai shara ni gaw UNESCO Mungkan a Sali wunli Jahpan hta lawm nga ai.

English: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
Jinghpaw: Lai wa sai century law law hta, masha ni gaw hkraw ni hpe atsawm lung mai ai shara ni shachyaw, lung mai ai lakang ni galaw nna panglai hpe mu lu na matu galaw ma ai.

English: Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.
Jinghpaw: Dai tsawm htap ai lam gaw rawt jat wa ai hpe mu na yak ai lam mung langai rai nga ai. Lam ni, wanleng ni hte hkali ni dai mare ni hte matut tawn ai rai nna mawdaw ni chyawm gaw shinggan hku nmai du nga ai.

English: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible.
Jinghpaw: Belgium hte Switzerland mungdan kaw shaga ai French ga gaw France mungdan kaw tsun ai French ga hte kachyi mi shai ma ai, raitim atsawm sha chye na hkat ma ai.

English: In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different.
Jinghpaw: Tup hkrak hta gaw Belgium hte Switzerland na French ga shaga ai ni gaw France mungdan na French ga shaga ai hte kaji mi shai hkat nna gasi nkau nsen shapraw ai hta mung loi shai ma ai.

English: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
Jinghpaw: Raitim mung, French ga tsun ai Belgian hte Swiss ni yang jawng kaw French madang jat jat hpe sharin ra ai re, dai rai jang she shanhte gaw nang lang ai French madang nambat ni hpe chye na ra re.

English: In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating "hello."
Jinghpaw: Mungkan a daw chyen grai law wa mi hta gaw lata ding si ai lam gaw hku hkau ai hku kumla madun ai re nna "hello" ngu nna shakram ai lam hpe mung madi madun nga ai.

English: However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means "come over," similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose.
Jinghpaw: Raitimung, Malaysia kaw, buga ginra hkan na yawm htum Malay masha ni lapran hkan gaw, yunglat hpe hkum maga magaw dan ai de lachyum gaw "sa wa u le" ngu nna, Sinna mung hkan gaw dai hpe lama ma yaw shada ai hku sha lang ging ai re.

English: Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back.
Jinghpaw: Maren sha, British kaw na Spain de sa chyai ai ni mung lata man hpe shawng de nada nna wa sa na yaw ngu chye tsun ma ai (ta madun ai wa hpe lata galam dan ai hta) bai sa wa na matu lata galam dan ai.

English: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating.
Jinghpaw: Auxiliary laika gaw galaw dai ai dai nrai shachyaw da ai laika gaw ga chye na hkat na yak taw ai masha lapran hta chye na hkat na matu galaw da ai re.

English: They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.
Jinghpaw: Shanhte hpe gaw ga apai ai ngu ai kaw na garan da ma ai, dai ni gaw shaga ai wa hte kaga ga ni lapran chye na hkat na matu lam langai (sh) lahkawng nga ai ningpaw ga ni re.

English: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things).
Jinghpaw: Jan kahtet ai shani hta, bu hkawm masha ni gaw hka ( (sh) kaga arai ni) a myit hkalem ai lam hpe byin shangun ai nbung kahtet nna shingna galai ai lam ni hpe hkrum katut wa chye nga ai.

English: These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water.
Jinghpaw: Hkrun lam hkawm ai ni gaw, manu dan ai n-gun ni hpe shama kau nna hka hpe ngam da ai lam gaw hkrit tsang hpa re.

English: Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.
Jinghpaw: Kahtet dik ai zai bru jang hkan pyi gaw shana rai yang na chying katsi chye ai. Hkum lum shadang mala la yawm ai lam gaw palawng lum nlawm yang kaja nan hkrit tsang ra ai.

English: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest.
Jinghpaw: Ginhtawng ta hta marang maling hkan lagaw lam hku bu hkawm yang gaw jigrawg ni hpe sadi ra na re.

English: Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.
Jinghpaw: Lama na nang gaw kahtet yawm ginra re ai marang maling de mawdaw gau wa yang, mawdaw kata shang wa ai ten second sha chyinghka gan hpaw da ai gaw dai mawdaw kata ji grawng ni atsawm shang mai nga ai.

English: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals.
Jinghpaw: U waw waw ai (sh) grau malawng tsun ai u li mak hkalawng gaw u ni hte chyu jaw dusat dumyeng hta kap chye ai.

English: Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal.
Jinghpaw: Shinggyim masha ni hta gaw ndai ana ni hkying hku pi n du ai hpe mu lu ai, rai timung, nkau mi gaw si wa mai ai baw ni re.

English: Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.
Jinghpaw: Law malawng gaw u hkai byek rem ai bungli galaw ai ni lawm ai, raitim u yu ai bungli hta hkrit ra ai baw nkau mung lawm ai.

English: Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau.
Jinghpaw: Norway gaw kadawng ai panglai hkai gai hte kadit hkam wam lai lai nna, grau nna gaw bumpa layang hta grau tsaw ai shara re.

English: These plateaus are often referred to as "vidde" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse.
Jinghpaw: Kalang maran ndai bumpa layang ni gaw dam lada ai, hpun ni n-nga na mahka taw ai ginra, shadawn masat nlu ai dam lada shara ngu na lachyum nga ai "vidde" zawn re ai hpe madi madun ya nga ai.

English: In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called "hei" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather.
Jinghpaw: Rogaland hte Agder hta shanhte gaw ayan na "hei" ngu shaga ai, lachyum gaw heta hpun ka'up da ai hpun ntu ai prang ga ngu ai re.

English: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges.
Jinghpaw: Hkyen hka ni gaw zim sha nnga ai nna bum ntsa kaw lwi hrat wa chye ai. Ndai lam ni gaw hkyen mahkrai ni hpe lim kau nna ga ai lam ni, ga kaprang ai lam ni byin wa chye ai.

English: The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed.
Jinghpaw: Hka ge lung pu a shakum ni, n-gaw ni gaw hkrat kadawng daw mai ai hte de a ga hkang ni gaw rau majaw mat mai ai.

English: At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.
Jinghpaw: Hkatawng mali hka ndung kaw na tawng kaba kaw ga hkrat ai, dik hkrat ai ngut nna ndung kaw na gumhtawn dai nrai taleng wa ai rai na re.

English: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer.
Jinghpaw: India kaw na kahtet ta hta sa chyai ai ni a matu bum nta kaw na shara de sa ai.

English: However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.
Jinghpaw: Raitm imung, shanhte gaw kashung ta hta hkyen hkrat shadang hkrak ai bum dabang ni hte hkyen pa ntsa hpun pyen jawn ai lam hte hkyen jawn ai lam zawn re ai ra sharawng awng bungli ni jaw ya ai lam ni rau nbung ai tsawm ai lam hte ra sharawng hpa hpan ni lu ma ai.

English: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel.
Jinghpaw: Nkau nbungli ni sha manu naw hpu taw ma ai, masha tsi ai hkrum lam a hpang chyhtum aten a manu sha kachyi mi shayawm ya ai.

English: Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet.
Jinghpaw: U.S dai nrai Canada, ngut nna WestJet kaw na npawt wa ai Air Canada, Delta Air Line, Lufthansa ni lawm ai ni hpe jaw da ai nbungli bungli.

English: In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.
Jinghpaw: Lam shagu hta, tau hkrau lakmat mari ai lam hpe sin-yu ga (phone) hte dantawk tau htet ra ai.
